Container.name: 070_am_radio_broadcast_news_sugar_company
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: The Tanoa Sugar Company reopened its main refinery yesterday after a group of armed men stormed the building and rigged the machinery with explosives.
Key.Chinese: 昨天，一批武裝人士襲擊了塔諾雅製糖公司的主煉糖廠，並在機械上裝上炸藥；今天，煉糖廠再度重整開業。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一群武装分子袭击了塔诺亚糖业公司的工厂，并在设备上安放了炸药，但昨天该公司的糖厂主车间已恢复生产。

Key.Original: It was the second time the site has been targeted by criminals, holding production quotas to ransom, and is now under police protection.
Key.Chinese: 這是此建築第二次被罪犯列為目標；他們希望透過控制生產配額來索要贖金；目前，警方已在煉糖廠建立其嚴密的防護設施。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是该公司第二次成为犯罪分子的目标：他们试图控制生产配额来索要赎金。目前，该公司处于警方保护之下。

Container.name: 069_am_radio_broadcast_news_ied
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A military convoy was stopped on the Regina-Lifou coast road yesterday by an improvised explosive device.
Key.Chinese: 一支軍事車隊昨天在瑞金納-Lifou 沿海道路上遭土製炸彈攻擊攔截。
Key.Chinesesimp: 昨天，一支军用车队在瑞吉纳至利福的海岸公路上被一个简易爆炸装置困住。

Key.Original: A CSAT officer told reporters no-one was killed and said anti-government insurgents were clearly responsible for the attack.
Key.Chinese: 一名 CSAT 官員告知記者，此事故無人死亡，且此舉明顯出自反政府暴民之手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一名广协官员告诉记者，没有人员丧生，并表示反政府叛乱分子显然要对此次袭击负责。

Container.name: 068_am_radio_broadcast_news_smugglers
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Two men have been killed in a violent confrontation with gendarmes in Lami after stealing supplies from an International Development and Aid Project depot.
Key.Chinese: 兩名男子在 Lami 國際開發與救助計畫的倉庫中盜取補給後，與國家憲兵對峙並遭擊斃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 两名男子盗窃国际发展和援助项目仓库的补给品，之后在拉米与宪兵队发生暴力冲突并被击毙。

Key.Original: A short chase ended with the pair barricading themselves in Le Toucan Hotel. Fortunately, according to police sources, no bystanders were hurt during the incident.
Key.Chinese: 在短暫的追逐後，兩人將自己關在 Le Toucan 旅館中，所幸，根據警方稱述，此事件中並沒有其他人受到波及。
Key.Chinesesimp: 经过一场短暂的追捕之后，两人最终被堵在了 Le Toucan 酒店。据警方称，在此事件中无旁观者受伤。

Container.name: 067_am_radio_broadcast_news_power_plant
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A man was injured yesterday in an explosion at the Lifou Diesel Power Plant.
Key.Chinese: 一名男子昨晚在 Lifou 柴油發電廠的爆炸中受傷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 昨天，利福柴油发电厂发生爆炸，一名男子受伤。

Key.Original: The Tanoa Energy Company has stated that the accident was caused by a defective motor and ruled out external factors or operator error.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅能源公司聲稱，此意外是因缺陷馬達而起，並排除了外部因素或是操作失誤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚能源公司声称，事故由马达故障引起，并排除了外部因素或操作失误的可能性。

Container.name: 066_am_radio_broadcast_news_idap
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Workers from the International Development and Aid Project have established a new emergency centre on Wednesday in the town of Regina.
Key.Chinese: 國際開發和救助計畫的員工在週三於瑞金納小鎮建立了新的緊急中心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 国际发展和援助项目的工作人员周三在瑞吉纳镇新建了一处紧急救援中心。

Key.Original: A volunteer from the organization explained that the camp would be distributing anti-malarial medication seven days a week - and offering supplies to those in need.
Key.Chinese: 來自組織的義工解釋，此基地將每天分發抗瘧疾藥物並提供醫療用品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该组织的一名志愿者解释说，该营地将一周七天分发抗疟疾药物，并向难民提供补给品。

Container.name: 065_am_radio_broadcast_news_hostels
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Tanoa Accommodation, a hotel company with properties across the archipelago, faces legal action after an aggressive marketing campaign.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅旅館是一家旅館公司，他們在群島四處皆有產業，然而他們一場聲勢浩大的營銷宣傳後吃上了官司。
Key.Chinesesimp: Tanoa Accommodation 是一家酒店企业，其房产遍布群岛各地，然而在一场声势浩大的营销活动后，该公司面临着法律诉讼。

Key.Original: Reams of leaflets, advertising budget rooms to rent, were dropped en masse from drones over popular tourist areas last weekend, contravening national litter laws.
Key.Chinese: 上週末，大量廉價住宿傳單透過無人機被投放至熱門的觀光地區，這觸犯了國家的垃圾處理法規。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上周末，几架无人机在热门旅游区上空集体投放了大量经济房出租广告传单，违反了国家垃圾法。

Key.Original: Owner, Arnaud Leroux, said he was deeply sorry for the stunt and thanked those involved in the clean-up effort.
Key.Chinese: 此公司的老闆阿爾諾德‧勒盧向大家致歉並感謝那些協助清掃工作的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 酒店老板 Arnaud Leroux 表示，他对这一过分的行为深感抱歉，并感谢那些参与清理工作的人们。

Container.name: 064_am_radio_broadcast_news_weapons
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A former dock worker at Blue Pearl Industrial Port received a generous cash reward two days ago after leading gendarmes to a large weapon stash in the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 兩天前，一名前任 Blue Pearl 工業碼頭的工人向國家憲兵透露了大批藏於叢林中的武器庫存位置，並獲得了大筆獎金。
Key.Chinesesimp: 两天前，Blue Pearl 工业港一名前码头工人给宪兵队领路，前往丛林里的一处大型武器存放点，之后拿到了一笔丰厚的现金奖励。

Key.Original: Jean-Paul Delacroix from Georgetown discovered the hidden stockpile after hearing gunshots several nights before, when walking on a nearby trail.
Key.Chinese: 幾天前的夜晚，喬治鎮的金保羅‧德拉克洛瓦在附近的道路上步行時聽見了槍聲，他也因此找到了隱藏的武器庫存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几天前的一个晚上，来自乔治敦的 Jean-Paul Delacroix 在附近的一条小路上行走，听到几声枪响，随后，他发现了这个隐蔽的武器库。

Key.Original: CSAT counter insurgency operatives removed the weapons and congratulated Mr. Delacroix on his vigilance.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 反暴動專員移走了武器，並表彰了德拉克洛瓦先生所表現出來的警覺性。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协平叛作战人员取走了武器，并对 Delacroix 的警觉性表示赞赏。

Container.name: 063_am_radio_broadcast_news_warnings_c
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Former president of the Horizon Islands, Benjamin Hope, has condemned government decisions regarding CSAT's militarization of Tanoa.
Key.Chinese: 前任 Horizon 島總統班傑明‧哈普譴責了政府讓 CSAT 在塔諾雅部署軍力的決定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 地平线岛前总统 Benjamin Hope 谴责了广协对塔诺亚实施军事化管制的政府决策。

Key.Original: Speaking at a fundraising event for Nouveaux Horizons, he condemned both foreign intervention and militant groups affiliated with L'Ensemble for exploiting the nation's current malaria crisis.
Key.Chinese: 在新視野的募款活動中，他譴責了外國干涉與和 L'Ensemble 有牽連的軍事組織利用目前國內的瘧疾危機來獲利。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在新视野的筹款活动上发言时，他强烈谴责了外国干预和隶属大帮会的武装组织乘当前疟疾疫情之危捣乱的行为。

Key.Original: La Roche agreed to Canton Protocol demands for combined counter insurgency operations with local gendarmes last week, sparking violent protests in Georgetown, Tanouka, and Ouméré.
Key.Chinese: 上週，La Roche 允諾坎頓協議中和國家憲兵共同進行反暴動行動的要求；這造成了喬治鎮、塔諾卡和 Ouméré 出現暴力抗議。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拉罗歇上周同意了 Canton 协议的要求，答应与当地宪兵队开展联合平叛行动；此举在乔治敦、塔诺乌加和奥默里引发了激烈的抗议。

Container.name: 062_am_radio_broadcast_news_warnings_b
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A driver has been arrested after failing to stop at a checkpoint outside of Georgetown.
Key.Chinese: 一名司機在經過喬治鎮外的檢查站時，因沒有停車而遭到逮捕。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一名司机因在乔治敦城外的一处关卡拒绝停车而被逮捕。

Key.Original: Several shots were fired during the incident.
Key.Chinese: 此事件中，軍方開了數槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事件过程中有人开了枪。

Key.Original: Xu Haifeng, supreme commander of CSAT forces operating in the Pacific region, issued a statement from La Roche and reminded civilians to avoid any actions that might be interpreted as aggressive.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 太平洋部隊總司令徐海豐發佈了來自 La Roche 的聲明，並提醒百姓盡量迴避任何可能會被視為具攻擊性的行為。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在太平洋地区作战的广协部队最高指挥官 Xu Haifeng 从拉罗歇发表了一份声明，提醒平民避免采取任何可能被解读为挑衅的行动。

Container.name: 061_am_radio_broadcast_news_warnings_a
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: In Saint Julien today, a young man was killed, and another seriously wounded by CSAT soldiers.
Key.Chinese: 今天，在聖朱利安，CSAT 士兵造成一名年輕男子的死亡和另一人重傷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天，一名年轻男子在圣朱利安被广协士兵杀害，另有一人遭受重伤。

Key.Original: According to one eyewitness, the pair approached a military vehicle and were fired upon after ignoring repeated warnings, given in both French and English.
Key.Chinese: 根據一名目擊者的說詞，這兩個人接近了一輛軍事車輛，軍方重複以法文與英文警告無果後，便朝兩人開槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据一名目击者称，两人不顾反复用法语和英语发出的警告，靠近一辆军车，随后遭到枪击。

Key.Original: A government spokesman in Georgetown refused to comment until the identity of both men is established.
Key.Chinese: 在識別兩人身份前，喬治鎮政府發言人拒絕做出回應。
Key.Chinesesimp: 乔治敦的一位政府发言人拒绝在两人身份得到确认之前发表评论。

Key.Original: He added that all Tanoans should listen attentively to military personnel and law enforcement officers and to approach only if given explicit permission to do so.
Key.Chinese: 他還補充，塔諾雅人應該仔細聆聽軍方與警方的話，並在獲得明確許可後再接近他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他补充说，所有塔诺安人都应认真听从军事人员和执法人员的指示，只有在得到明确许可的情况下才能接近。

Container.name: 060_am_radio_broadcast_news_checkpoints
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Temporary military checkpoints are now in place along several major roads, so please; drive carefully and allow for the extra journey time.
Key.Chinese: 一些重大道路上架設了暫時性軍事檢查站，因此，開車時請小心，並且別忘了為行程安排額外時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在几条主干道上均设立了临时军事关卡，请小心行驶，并预留更多出行时间。

Container.name: 059_am_radio_broadcast_news_aircraft
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A 31 year-old pilot from Tanouka has gone missing after taking off in a light aircraft from the Saint-George Airstrip near Lijnhaven.
Key.Chinese: 一名 31 歲的塔諾卡飛行員從 Lijnhaven 附近的聖喬治小機場起飛後便失蹤了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一名来自塔诺乌加的 31 岁飞行员驾驶一架轻型飞机从丽音赫文附近的圣乔治机场起飞后失踪。

Key.Original: A search is now underway.
Key.Chinese: 目前，官方正在尋找他的下落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻工作正在进行。

Key.Original: The disappearance coincides with mixed reports of a plane coming down near Tuvanaka.
Key.Chinese: 他的失蹤事件與土萬納卡附近傳出的飛機失事報告相吻合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该失踪事件与一架飞机在突瓦纳加附近坠毁的各种报道相吻合。

Container.name: 058_am_radio_broadcast_news_radar_destroyed
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Two strategic radar buildings, protected by CSAT soldiers, have been destroyed in a series of audacious raids.
Key.Chinese: 兩個受到 CSAT 士兵保護的戰略性雷達建築在一系列大膽的攻勢中被摧毀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在连续的猛攻之下，由广协士兵守卫的两座战略雷达站被摧毁。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble, widely believed to be behind the attacks, denied involvement and instead proclaimed ordinary Tanoans were taking up arms in a spontaneous fight against neo-colonial oppressors.
Key.Chinese: 大多人認為，這些攻擊是由 L'Ensemble 所籌劃，然而他們卻否認牽涉此事，反稱此為塔諾雅人自願起義反抗這些新殖民主義的壓迫者。
Key.Chinesesimp: 人们普遍认为，大帮会是袭击事件的幕后黑手，但该组织否认牵涉此事，而是宣称塔诺安老百姓拿起了武器，与新殖民主义压迫者展开了一场自发的斗争。

Container.name: 057_am_radio_broadcast_news_depot_success_alone
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: CSAT soldiers stationed at a fuel depot, east of Laikoro, were reportedly attacked some hours ago by a lone gunman.
Key.Chinese: 報告指出，駐守在賴可羅東邊的燃料庫中的 CSAT 士兵在幾個小時前被一名槍手攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据报道，几个小时前，驻扎在莱科罗东部一座燃料仓库的广协士兵遭到一名持枪男子的袭击。

Key.Original: Details are unclear, but two large silos have been destroyed and a high number of military personnel killed. Many more are believed injured.
Key.Chinese: 詳細情形不明，不過兩個大型發射井已被摧毀，且大量軍方人士陣亡。受傷人數預計更多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 具体细节尚不清楚，但两座大型发射井被摧毁，大量军事人员丧生。据信还有更多人员受伤。

Key.Original: How the man responsible achieved such destruction is unknown, but authorities speculate he may have had extensive training.
Key.Chinese: 我們尚不知此人究竟如何造成這麼大的破壞，但是，官方人員認為，他應該受過全面訓練。
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前尚不清楚该涉案男子如何实施这种破坏，但当局推测，他可能受过全面的训练。

Key.Original: More on that story when we know more.
Key.Chinese: 關於此事件的更多資訊，我們將及時跟進報道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将在了解更多情况后进行跟踪报道。

Container.name: 056_am_radio_broadcast_news_depot_success
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: CSAT soldiers stationed at a fuel depot, east of Laikoro, were reportedly attacked some hours ago by anti-government insurgents.
Key.Chinese: 報告指出，駐守在賴可羅東邊的燃料庫中的 CSAT 士兵幾個小時前被反政府暴動攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据报道，几个小时前，驻扎在莱科罗东部一座燃料仓库的广协士兵遭到反政府叛乱分子的袭击。

Key.Original: Details are unclear, but two large silos have been destroyed and a high number of military personnel killed. Many more are believed injured.
Key.Chinese: 詳細情形不明，不過兩個大型發射井已被摧毀，且大量軍方人士陣亡。受傷人數預計更多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 具体细节尚不清楚，但两座大型发射井被摧毁，大量军事人员丧生。据信还有更多人员受伤。

Key.Original: More on that story when we know more.
Key.Chinese: 關於此事件的更多資訊，我們將及時跟進報道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将在了解更多情况后进行跟踪报道。

Container.name: 055_am_radio_broadcast_news_depot_fail
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: CSAT soldiers stationed at a fuel depot, east of Laikoro, were reportedly attacked some hours ago by anti-government insurgents.
Key.Chinese: 報告指出，駐守在賴可羅東邊的燃料庫中的 CSAT 士兵幾個小時前被反政府暴動攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据报道，几个小时前，驻扎在莱科罗东部一座燃料仓库的广协士兵遭到反政府叛乱分子的袭击。

Key.Original: Details are unclear, but reports suggest the raid was unsuccessful. A high number of combatants are believed to have been killed in the fighting.
Key.Chinese: 詳細情形不明；不過，報告指出，此次掠奪並不成功。本次戰鬥似乎傷亡巨大。
Key.Chinesesimp: 具体细节尚不清楚，但有报道称突袭行动失败了。据信，大量作战人员在这场战斗中丧生。

Key.Original: More on that story when we know more.
Key.Chinese: 關於此事件的更多資訊，我們將及時跟進報道。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们将在了解更多情况后进行跟踪报道。

Container.name: 054_am_radio_broadcast_news_house_destroyed
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Vagalala was rocked by an explosion recently, when a house on the north side of the town was destroyed.
Key.Chinese: 瓦加拉拉最近發生了一場爆炸，小鎮北方的一棟房子被摧毀了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最近一起爆炸事件震憾了瓦加拉拉，该镇北部的一幢房屋被炸毁。

Key.Original: An eyewitness, Lou Wesir, owner of the independent Wesir Book Centre, said the residence was under investigation by police when the blast occurred.
Key.Chinese: 證人盧‧韋舍是獨立韋舍圖書中心的老闆；他宣稱，爆炸發生時，此住宅正在受到警方調查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 韦斯尔自营图书中心老板 Lou Wesir 是这场事故的目击者；他说，爆炸发生时，警方正在对这所住宅进行调查。

Key.Original: Authorities have yet to comment on the event.
Key.Chinese: 官方尚未對此事件做出回應。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当局尚未对此事发表评论。

Container.name: 053_am_radio_broadcast_news_rescued
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A suspect in the death of Nouveaux Horizons leader, Jean-Guy Devereux, has disappeared from police custody after a bloody gunfight near Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 新視野首領金蓋‧德弗羅兇殺案的嫌疑犯在瓦加拉拉一場血腥的槍戰中成功逃離警方控制並消失。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继瓦加拉拉附近一场血腥枪战之后，新视野领袖 Jean-Guy Devereux 之死的嫌疑人在被警方扣押期间失踪。

Key.Original: Oringo Madaki, a 39 year-old mechanic, is believed to have escaped detention after anti-government insurgents staged a rescue.
Key.Chinese: 歐林哥‧馬達奇是一名 39 歲的機械工，大家認為，他在反政府暴動的營救任務中逃脫了警方的控制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据信，39 岁的机修工 Oringo Madaki 在反政府叛乱分子的营救下逃脱了拘留。

Key.Original: Several gendarmes were killed in the engagement.
Key.Chinese: 一些國家憲兵在戰鬥中被擊殺。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几名宪兵在交战中丧生。

Container.name: 052_am_radio_broadcast_news_execution
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A suspect in the death of Jean-Guy Devereux, a political leader in the pro-CSAT Nouveaux Horizons party, has died in police custody.
Key.Chinese: 支持 CSAT 的新視野政黨首領金蓋‧德弗羅兇殺案中的一名疑犯在警方拘留期間死亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在亲广协的新视野党政治领袖 Jean-Guy Devereux 的死亡案件中，一位嫌疑人在被警方扣押期间死亡。

Key.Original: Oringo Madaki, a 39 year-old mechanic from Vagalala, was found dead in a mangrove swamp near Kotomo.
Key.Chinese: 歐林哥‧馬達奇是一名來自瓦加拉拉的 39 歲機械工；他在屍體在克托摩附近的紅樹林沼澤中被發現。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来自瓦加拉拉的 39 岁机修工 Oringo Madaki 被发现死于科托摩附近的红树林沼泽地。

Key.Original: The director general of the gendarmerie, Roch Robineau, told press in Georgetown a full investigation will ensue, but insisted Mr. Madaki had escaped detention.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵處長，羅克‧羅賓諾告知喬治鎮的記者，他們將展開全面調查，不過，他們聲稱馬達奇先生從他們的拘留所成功潛逃。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵总监 Roch Robineau 在乔治敦对媒体表示，他们接下来将对此事展开全面调查，但他坚称 Madaki 先生在拘留期间逃跑了。

Container.name: 051_am_radio_broadcast_news_arrest
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A man was arrested yesterday in connection with the death of Nouveaux Horizons leader, Jean-Guy Devereux.
Key.Chinese: 昨晚一名男子遭到逮捕，警方指出他和新視野的首領金蓋‧德弗羅的死有所牽連。
Key.Chinesesimp: 昨日一名男子因牵涉新视野领袖 Jean-Guy Devereux 之死而被捕。

Key.Original: 39 year-old Oringo Madaki was detained by gendarmes after the dismembered body of Mr. Devereux was discovered at Croconeel's Ranch last week.
Key.Chinese: 上週，德弗羅先生被肢解的屍體在鱷魚池農場被發現，隨後，39 歲的歐林哥‧馬達奇遭國家憲兵拘捕。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上周，有人在 Croconeel 的农场发现 Devereux 先生的碎尸后，39 岁的 Oringo Madaki 被宪兵队拘留。

Key.Original: He is currently being held under witness protection, at a secure location.
Key.Chinese: 他目前正處於證人保護之下，並位於一處安全地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 依照证人保护条例，目前将他关押在一个安全的地点。

Key.Original: A house in Vagalala was also raided.
Key.Chinese: 瓦加拉拉的一棟房屋也遭到搜查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瓦加拉拉的一所房子也遭到突袭。

Container.name: 050_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_boise_secured
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Port-Boisé on the Lijn islands was placed under quarantine earlier today owing to a new outbreak of Atrox strain malaria.
Key.Chinese: Lijn 群島的 Boisé 港今早因為爆發「阿特洛斯」品系瘧疾而開始隔離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天早些时候，里恩群岛上的博伊斯因新爆发的 Atrox 毒株类疟疾而被隔离。

Key.Original: Access to the village and the surrounding area is prohibited and medical martial law is in effect.
Key.Chinese: 村莊與周遭範圍將禁止進出，並已實施醫療戒嚴法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该村及周边地区禁止入内并实施医疗戒严法。

Key.Original: As with other affected zones, anyone concerned about local residents should call Le Service de Santé de Tanoa on 555-455.
Key.Chinese: 與其他感染區域相同，當地居民如有任何疑慮，請撥打 555-455 聯繫塔諾雅的衛生服務部門。
Key.Chinesesimp: 和其他受感染的疫区一样，关心当地居民情况的人士可拨打 555-455 致电 Le Service de Santé de Tanoa。

Container.name: 049_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_boise
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Another deadly malaria outbreak has occurred in Port-Boisé, just one kilometre from the popular tourist resort of Lijnhaven.
Key.Chinese: Boisé 港最近又爆發了致命的瘧疾案例，此處離林哈文的熱門度假旅館只有一公里的距離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 博伊斯又爆发一场致命的虐疾疫情，该地距热门旅游胜地丽音赫文仅一公里。

Key.Original: Authorities have said it is the super-strain epidemic and are advising non-residents to stay away.
Key.Chinese: 官方人員宣布此為超級品系疫情，並建議所有非本地居民人士遠離此處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当局表示，这是一次超级毒株所致的疫情，建议非当地居民远离该地区。

Key.Original: CSAT medical personnel are working with emergency services to assess the severity of the situation.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 醫療人員正在和緊急部門合作評估目前情況的嚴重性。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协医疗人员正与紧急救援服务机构一起评估疫情的严重性。

Container.name: 048_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_galili_secured
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Recent reports of Atrox strain malaria in a village north of the Tanoa Sugar Company have been confirmed.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅製糖公司北方小鎮的「阿特洛斯」品系瘧疾案例已被確認。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最近，塔诺亚糖业公司北部一座村庄的 Atrox 毒株类疟疾报告已得到证实。

Key.Original: A quarantine has now been declared in Galili and its cocoa bean plantation.
Key.Chinese: 加里里和其可可豆農園現在已經開始隔離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 加利利村和该村的可可豆种植园现已宣布实施隔离措施。

Key.Original: Friends and families of residents are encouraged to contact Le Service de Santé de Tanoa on 555-455.
Key.Chinese: 此地居民的親戚朋友請撥打 555-455 聯繫塔諾雅的衛生服務部門。
Key.Chinesesimp: 建议当地居民的朋友和家人拨打 555-455 联系 Le Service de Santé de Tanoa。

Container.name: 047_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_galili
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Incidents of malaria have been reported in the small village of Galili.
Key.Chinese: 加里里小村傳出了瘧疾病例。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小村庄加利利报告了疟疾病例。

Key.Original: Early reports indicate that it may be another outbreak of the Atrox super-strain.
Key.Chinese: 近期的報告指出，這可能是另一起「阿特洛斯」超級品系瘧疾事件。
Key.Chinesesimp: 早期报告显示，这可能是 Atrox 超级毒株的又一次爆发。

Key.Original: Emergency services are working with CSAT health officials to control the situation.
Key.Chinese: 緊急部門正在與 CSAT 衛生官員合作控制局勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 紧急救援服务机构正与广协卫生官员合作，以控制局势。

Container.name: 046_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_savaka_secured
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A medical quarantine has been issued in Savaka after a deadly outbreak of Atrox strain malaria.
Key.Chinese: 薩瓦卡村在爆發致命的「阿特洛斯」品系瘧疾後，現在已經開始醫療隔離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在致命性 Atrox 毒株类疟疾爆发后，萨瓦加宣布实施卫生隔离措施。

Key.Original: The village is off limits.
Key.Chinese: 任何人皆不可進出此村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该村禁止入内。

Key.Original: Anyone worried about residents should call Le Service de Santé de Tanoa on 555-455.
Key.Chinese: 居民如有任何擔憂，請撥打 555-455 聯繫塔諾雅的衛生服務部門。
Key.Chinesesimp: 担心当地居民安危的人士可拨打 555-455，致电 Le Service de Santé de Tanoa。

Container.name: 045_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_savaka
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A malaria outbreak has hit the village of Savaka in Balavu province.
Key.Chinese: 巴拉夫省的薩瓦卡村傳出瘧疾瘟疫爆發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴拉武省的萨瓦加村爆发虐疾疫情。

Key.Original: According to health officials it is linked to the super-strain epidemic.
Key.Chinese: 衛生官員指出，此案與超級品系瘧疾疫情有關。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据卫生官员称，本次疫情与超级毒株传播有关。

Key.Original: Authorities are urging members of the public to stay clear until more information becomes available.
Key.Chinese: 官方建議大家在更多資訊公布前遠離此區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当局敦促公众远离疫区，等候进一步通知。

Container.name: 044_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_luganville_secured
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Following the recent malaria super-strain outbreak in Luganville, a strict quarantine is now in force.
Key.Chinese: 在盧甘村的超級品系瘧疾爆發後，此地現在已經被強制隔離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最近卢甘威尔爆发了疟疾超级毒株疫情，目前已实施严格的隔离措施。

Key.Original: Access into the town is strictly prohibited.
Key.Chinese: 現在嚴格禁止進出此村。
Key.Chinesesimp: 严禁任何人进入该镇。

Key.Original: Those concerned for residents, friends, and family members should contact Le Service de Santé de Tanoa on 555-455.
Key.Chinese: 各位憂心的居民、朋友與家人可以撥打 555-455 聯繫塔諾雅的衛生服務部門。
Key.Chinesesimp: 关心当地居民、朋友和家人情况的人士，可拨打 555-455，联系 Le Service de Santé de Tanoa。

Container.name: 043_am_radio_broadcast_news_malaria_luganville
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: A malaria outbreak has been reported in the seaside town of Luganville.
Key.Chinese: 沿海的盧甘村傳出了瘧疾瘟疫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据报道，海滨城镇卢甘威尔爆发了疟疾疫情。

Key.Original: Authorities believe it is linked to the super-strain epidemic and are advising all locals to avoid the area completely.
Key.Chinese: 官方相信，此案與超級品系瘟疫有關，並且呼籲所有本地人遠離此區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当局认为，这跟超级毒株传播有关，并建议所有当地人彻底远离这一地区。

Key.Original: Blue Pearl workers, stay off the east coast road.
Key.Chinese: Blue Pearl 員工，請勿靠近東岸的道路。
Key.Chinesesimp: Blue Pearl 的工人们，请不要靠近东岸沿海公路。

Key.Original: CSAT medical units are working with emergency services to contain the situation.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 醫療單位正在和緊急部門一同合作控制疫情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协医疗队正在与紧急救援服务机构合作，防止局势进一步恶化。

Container.name: 042_am_radio_broadcast_news_first_in
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Hello, Tanoa!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，塔诺亚！

Key.Original: This is Radio Horizons, and I'm Leila Allaire.
Key.Chinese: 這是 Horizon 電台，我是莉菈‧阿萊爾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是地平线广播电台，我是 Leila Allaire。

Key.Original: Before we share the news, we have some of our own we'd like to report.
Key.Chinese: 在我們為您帶來新聞前，我們希望帶來一則我們自己的訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在播报新闻之前，我们要报道一下我们自己的一些情况。

Key.Original: Yesterday, our broadcasting station was attacked by non-state actors.
Key.Chinese: 昨天，我們的廣播站遭到非政府單位的攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 昨天，本台遭到非政府组织人员的攻击。

Key.Original: So, on behalf of everyone here, we want to apologize for a long and unexpected day of dead air.
Key.Chinese: 因此，我們希望為昨天的意外停播道歉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因此，我代表全体工作人员为这次长时间的意外停播表示道歉。

Key.Original: Fortunately, no-one here was hurt and we're ready to make it up to you.
Key.Chinese: 所幸，沒有人受傷；因此，我們現在更準備好要好好補償大家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所幸电台内无人受伤，我们会努力给大家做出补偿。

Container.name: 041_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_out_d
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: That's all we've got on the weather. Now, more music...
Key.Chinese: 以上是我們的天氣預報，現在，將播放歌曲…
Key.Chinesesimp: 天气播报完毕。现在请继续欣赏音乐...

Container.name: 040_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_out_c
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: This is Radio Horizons. Let's have some more music.
Key.Chinese: 這是 Horizon 電台，我們再來聽幾首歌吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是地平线广播电台。我们继续欣赏音乐吧。

Container.name: 039_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_out_b
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Stay tuned for further updates and news.
Key.Chinese: 更多新聞與更新，敬請期待。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请继续收听我们的最新消息和新闻。

Container.name: 038_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_out_a
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: And there you have it. This is Radio Horizons and here's another golden oldie.
Key.Chinese: 天氣預報到此為止，您現正收聽 Horizon 電台，我們現在為您帶來一首經典老歌。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了。这里是地平线广播电台，下面再播放一首怀旧金曲。

Container.name: 037_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_temp_e
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Temperature's a little on the cooler side at 10 degrees.
Key.Chinese: 今天氣溫偏冷，只有 10 度。
Key.Chinesesimp: 气温 10 度，有点冷。

Container.name: 036_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_temp_d
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Temperature's at a cool 15 degrees celsius.
Key.Chinese: 今天氣溫是涼爽的攝氏 15 度。
Key.Chinesesimp: 气温 15 摄氏度，感觉凉爽。

Container.name: 035_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_temp_c
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Temperature's hovering on the 20 degree line.
Key.Chinese: 氣溫大約在 20 度左右。
Key.Chinesesimp: 气温在 20 度上下徘徊。

Container.name: 034_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_temp_b
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Temperature's at a pleasant 25 degrees celsius.
Key.Chinese: 今天的氣溫是宜人的攝氏 25 度。
Key.Chinesesimp: 气温 25 摄氏度，舒适宜人。

Container.name: 033_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_temp_a
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Temperature's 30 degrees.
Key.Chinesesimp: 气温 30 度。

Container.name: 032_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_storm_d
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: We're also anticipating some of those pesky cumulonimbus clouds - yes, that's right...
Key.Chinese: 我們預計，會有更多討厭的積雨雲。是的，沒錯…
Key.Chinesesimp: 据预测，还会有讨厌的积雨云过来捣乱 - 是的，没错...

Key.Original: Looks like we're in for another dose of it! Sorry, people!
Key.Chinese: 看來今天又要遭殃啦！真是鬱悶！
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来我们又要迎来新一轮的降雨了！很遗憾，诸位！

Container.name: 031_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_storm_c
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: We've also got a reasonable chance of some storms to boot. Exciting, huh...? No, I know, not if you're a local, right?
Key.Chinese: 還有可能會出現暴風雨。很刺激，對吧…？當然了，除非你是本地人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 另外，很可能会有一场暴风雨。挺刺激的，是吧...？当然啦，如果您是本地人就不会这样觉得了，对吗？

Container.name: 030_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_storm_b
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: We also have an outside chance of storms as well.
Key.Chinese: 還有小機率出現暴風雨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但不太可能出现暴风雨天气。

Container.name: 029_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_storm_a
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: We've also got a tiny chance of some thundershowers too.
Key.Chinese: 此外，還有極小的機率會出現雷陣雨。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也可能会有雷阵雨，但概率不大。

Container.name: 028_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_rain_d
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Unfortunately, we've got a high chance of rain at around 83 percent - good for the plants. Bad for our malaria problem.
Key.Chinese: 很遺憾，今天降雨機率高達 83%，這雖然有助植物生長，但可能會加重我們的瘧疾問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很遗憾，降雨概率极大，约为 83% - 这对植物来说是好事。但不利于疟疾疫情控制。

Key.Original: Do keep those windows closed, people!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请大家务必关好窗户！

Container.name: 027_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_rain_c
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Probability of precipitation is around the 70 percent mark, so, y'know, do be prepared for that.
Key.Chinese: 降雨機率大約在百分之 70，所以請大家做好準備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 降水概率约为 70%，因此，请做好防雨准备。

Container.name: 026_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_rain_b
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: There's a possibility of rain, at 35 percent.
Key.Chinese: 有可能會下雨，降雨機率 35%。
Key.Chinesesimp: 降雨概率为 35%。

Container.name: 025_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_rain_a
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Chance of rain is low, somewhere between 10 and 15 percent.
Key.Chinese: 降雨機率低，大約在 10 到 15% 之間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 降雨概率不大，大约在 10% 到 15% 之间。

Container.name: 024_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_cloud_staying
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Our forecast has another front moving in - cloudy skies, I'm afraid, and, it may be here awhile.
Key.Chinese: 我們的天氣預報顯示，又有個鋒面將至－－恐怕這一陣子都會是陰天。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据预报，另一个锋面正在逼近 - 预计今日阴天，而且可能会持续一段时间。

Container.name: 023_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_cloud_uncertain
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Regarding our forecast, there may be some cloud about but that should clear up.
Key.Chinese: 至於天氣預報，現在可能有些雲朵，但很快就會多雲轉晴。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据预报，可能会有一些云团，但应该会转晴。

Container.name: 022_am_radio_broadcast_forecast_cloud_clearing
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: As for the forecast, we're not anticipating any cloud in the next few hours.
Key.Chinese: 至於天氣預報，幾個小時內預計不會有雲層出現。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于天气预报方面，我们预计未来几小时内晴朗无云。

Container.name: 021_am_radio_broadcast_rain_b
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: And obviously, there's the rain. Drive carefully if you're on a late one.
Key.Chinese: 當然還會下雨。夜間開車時請小心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 显然，现在有雨。如果您误了点，请小心开车。

Container.name: 020_am_radio_broadcast_rain_a
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: And, of course, it's raining.
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，现在正在下雨。

Container.name: 019_am_radio_broadcast_night_stormy
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: There's a lot of storm clouds rolling in, so expect some thunder and lightning.
Key.Chinese: 許多烏雲將至，預計今晚會有閃電雷鳴。
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前乌云滚滚，预计会很快就会电闪雷鸣。

Container.name: 018_am_radio_broadcast_night_very_cloudy
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: It's a cloudy one tonight.
Key.Chinesesimp: 今晚多云。

Container.name: 017_am_radio_broadcast_night_cloudy
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Our night's looking a little cloudy right now.
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前夜空中云朵有点多。

Container.name: 016_am_radio_broadcast_night_some_cloud
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: There's a few clouds around tonight but it's mostly pretty clear.
Key.Chinese: 今晚會有一些雲，不過天空還算月明星稀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今晚有云，但基本上还是月朗星稀。

Container.name: 015_am_radio_broadcast_night_clear
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: It's a clear and starry, starry night tonight.
Key.Chinese: 萬里無雲，今晚會有明亮的星空。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今晚晴空无云，星光灿烂。

Container.name: 014_am_radio_broadcast_day_stormy
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: It's pretty stormy out there.
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在外面是风雨交加。

Container.name: 013_am_radio_broadcast_day_very_cloudy
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: As you can see, it's a bit of a dismal day today. Lots of cloud and only a little sun.
Key.Chinese: 很明顯，今天的天氣很差，烏雲密佈且陽光很少。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大家可以看到，今天有点阴沉沉的。云量较多，只有一点点阳光。

Container.name: 012_am_radio_broadcast_day_cloudy
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: It's looking a little overcast at the moment.
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前天气是阴天，多云。

Container.name: 011_am_radio_broadcast_day_some_cloud
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: It's another gorgeous day. Sunshine, blue skies, and a little scattered cloud.
Key.Chinese: 又一個大晴天。陽光、藍天和零星的雲朵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天仍然是个大晴天。阳光明媚，蓝天中飘浮着几朵白云。

Container.name: 010_am_radio_broadcast_day_clear
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: As I'm sure you can see, it's a beautiful day out there.
Key.Chinese: 毫無疑問，今天天氣風和日麗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 相信大家都能看到，外面是一派风和日丽的景象。

Key.Original: Barely a cloud in sight.
Key.Chinesesimp: 万里无云。

Container.name: 009_am_radio_broadcast_out_d
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Alright. Let's talk about the weather.
Key.Chinese: 好了，讓我們開始天氣預報吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。我们来聊一聊天气。

Container.name: 008_am_radio_broadcast_out_c
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: Next, the weather.
Key.Chinese: 即將播出的是，天氣預報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来报告天气情况。

Container.name: 007_am_radio_broadcast_out_b
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: So, okay, on to the weather.
Key.Chinese: 好，接下來，我們將帶來天氣預報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么，好的，下面说说天气。

Container.name: 006_am_radio_broadcast_out_a
Container.situation: broadcaster gives the weather forecast.

Key.Original: As for the weather, well...
Key.Chinesesimp: 天气方面，嗯...

Container.name: 005_am_radio_broadcast_in_c
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: You're listening to Radio Horizons on 90.3 and 90.7 FM.
Key.Chinese: 您現在正在收聽 Horizon 電台，FM 90.3 和 90.7。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你正在收听地平线广播电台，调频 90.3 和 90.7。

Key.Original: Next up, local news.
Key.Chinese: 即將播出的是，本地新聞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来播报本地新闻。

Container.name: 004_am_radio_broadcast_in_b
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Latest news stories next.
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来是最新消息。

Key.Original: You can find us on 90.3 and 90.7 FM. Radio Horizons.
Key.Chinese: Horizon 電台，就在 FM 90.3 和 90.7。
Key.Chinesesimp: 您可以通过调频 90.3 和 90.7 收听我们的节目。这里是地平线广播电台。

Container.name: 003_am_radio_broadcast_in_a
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: You're listening to Radio Horizons.
Key.Chinese: 您現在正在收聽 Horizon 電台。
Key.Chinesesimp: 您正在收听地平线广播电台。

Key.Original: I'm Leila Allaire, and this is the news.
Key.Chinese: 我是莉菈‧阿萊爾，現在正在播放新聞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是 Leila Allaire，下面播报新闻。

Container.name: 002_am_radio_broadcast_segue_b
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: In other news...
Key.Chinesesimp: 其他新闻...

Container.name: 001_am_radio_broadcast_segue_a
Container.situation: broadcaster reads the latest news stories.

Key.Original: Now, in news elsewhere...
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在播报其他地方的新闻...

Container.name: 013_ex_silo_destroyed_no_operation
Container.situation: boss informs player that the operation launching from cerebu is not happening, because the primary target has already been destroyed.

Key.Original: Hey, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，Képi。

Key.Original: Forget about Cerebu. Our operation. It is a no-go now.
Key.Chinese: 別管什麼西盧布了，我們的任務取消了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别管塞热布了。我们的行动，现在不宜进行。

Key.Original: Some paysans hit our target!
Key.Chinese: 有些農民攻擊了我們的目標！
Key.Chinesesimp: 一伙农民袭击了我们的目标！

Key.Original: The revolution, seems it got a mind of its own, eh?
Key.Chinese: 看來這場革命現在有些失去控制了，是吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 革命，似乎不请自来了，是吧？

Key.Original: Anyway, no matter. The job is done.
Key.Chinese: 不管了，反正目標還是達成了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管怎样，没关系。事情搞定了。

Key.Original: If you find guns, bring them to us. Equipment too. La lutte continue...
Key.Chinese: 如果你找到槍或裝備，把它們通通交給我們。鬥爭還在繼續…
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你找到枪支，就给我们送过来。装备也一样。斗争还在继续...

Container.name: 012_eve_reputation_plus_three_pos
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Heya, mon homme de main!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，我的朋友！

Key.Original: L'Ensemble want you to know, anything you need - you got it, eh?
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 想讓你知道，你要什麼，我們都能提供，知道了吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会想让你知道，你需要什么，就能搞到什么，明白吗？

Key.Original: I make sure we do the lowest price.
Key.Chinese: 我會確保我們以最低的價格賣給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我保证我们能搞到最低价。

Key.Original: You a rising star, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可是个后起之秀，Képi。

Key.Original: And la victoire, it coming, very soon; we will remember such commitment to the cause! Au revoir.
Key.Chinese: 還有，勝利將至，很快啦。我們會記得你的奉獻！再見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，胜利即将来临，不用多久了；我们会记住你的奉献！再见。

Container.name: 011_eve_reputation_plus_two_pos
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Képi, I hear good things about you.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi，我听到了你的光荣事迹了。

Key.Original: Everyone know, you a proper guérillero. A real freedom fighter.
Key.Chinese: 大家都知道，你是個真正的游擊隊員，一名真正的自由戰士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大家都认为，你是个名副其实的游击队员。一个真正的自由战士。

Key.Original: I will see about a better price for you on guns, and médicament.
Key.Chinese: 我們會確保你在購買槍枝和藥物時能夠享有折扣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 枪，还有药品，我都会给你争取个好价钱。

Key.Original: And any place you want to stay, eh?
Key.Chinese: 你想找個地方落腳，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你想有个地方落脚吗，嗯？

Key.Original: Just continuer, vive la révolution.
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续加油，革命万岁！

Container.name: 010_eve_reputation_plus_one_pos
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Salut. It is Samjo.
Key.Chinesesimp: Salut。我是"山姆卓"。

Key.Original: So - you do well, I hear.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯 - 听说你干得不错。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble, it arrange special price for you, on black market.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 會在黑市上為你安排個特殊的折扣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会会帮你在黑市上搞定优惠价格。

Key.Original: Make sure you afford what you need. Talk again soon, mon ami.
Key.Chinese: 記得帶夠錢。我們晚點再聊，我的朋友。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记得带够钱。回头再聊，我的朋友。

Container.name: 009_eve_reputation_zero_pos
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Bonjour, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: Bonjour，Képi。

Key.Original: You make good impression out there.
Key.Chinese: 你給大家留了一個好印象。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在那边表现不错。

Key.Original: Lot of talk, eh?
Key.Chinese: 大家都在談論你做的事呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很多人都在谈论你，嗯？

Key.Original: I guess I still got eye for talent.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我觉得我还是挺能识才的。

Key.Original: You welcome to fight beside us now.
Key.Chinese: 歡迎和我們一起並肩作戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，欢迎你和我们并肩作战。

Container.name: 008_eve_reputation_minus_one_pos
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Képi. L'Ensemble okay with you now.
Key.Chinese: Képi，L'Ensemble 現在對你感覺不錯。
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi。现在大帮会对你很满意。

Key.Original: But we not gonna do you any favors.
Key.Chinesesimp: 可我们不会帮你。

Key.Original: You want respect... earn it. Salut.
Key.Chinese: 你若要我們的尊重…就得努力去贏得尊重。Salut。
Key.Chinesesimp: 想让人服你...就得付出代价。Salut。

Container.name: 007_eve_reputation_minus_two_pos
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Képi blanc...
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi Blanc...

Key.Original: I hear you do good.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听说你干得不错。

Key.Original: But make no mistake, we don't trust you. Still...
Key.Chinese: 不過別搞錯了，我們還不相信你…
Key.Chinesesimp: 但别误会，我们并不信任你。不过嘛...

Key.Original: Keep up the good work.
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续加油。

Key.Original: Maybe you make it through this, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许你能熬过这个难关，嗯？

Container.name: 006_eve_reputation_plus_two_neg
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Képi. Listen.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi。听着。

Key.Original: If you want our help out there, you gonna have to earn respect.
Key.Chinese: 如果你在外頭需要協助，你得先贏得我們的尊重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 想得到我们的帮助，就得让人服你。

Key.Original: My men won't follow some solitaire.
Key.Chinese: 我的人可不會追隨只會單打獨鬥的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的人可不会追随那种独来独往的家伙。

Key.Original: Money talk...
Key.Chinesesimp: 有钱能使鬼推磨...

Key.Original: But dedication to our cause?
Key.Chinese: 但是，對我們目標的堅持？
Key.Chinesesimp: 可也要认真对待我们的事业吧？

Key.Original: That talk a lot louder. Think about it, eh? Salut.
Key.Chinese: 那可比錢更有說服力。你好好想想吧？Salut。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个更重要。好好想想吧，嗯？Salut。

Container.name: 005_eve_reputation_plus_one_neg
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Hey. Samjo here.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。我是"山姆卓"。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble - it not sure about you. People talking.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 對你還抱有些疑心，很多人在說閒話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会 - 对你不放心。大家都在议论。

Key.Original: Bad rumor on you... tu me suis ?
Key.Chinese: 有很多關於你的負面傳聞…你要跟著我嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人说你坏话了...tu me suis？

Key.Original: Remember, we need to work together.
Key.Chinese: 記得了，我們必須一起合作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住，我们需要合作。

Container.name: 004_eve_reputation_zero_neg
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Hey. It is Samjo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。我是"山姆卓"。

Key.Original: Look, I know you with us now, but I got word - you let us down.
Key.Chinese: 聽好了，我知道你現在跟我們在同一個陣營，不過我聽說，你讓我們很失望。
Key.Chinesesimp: 喂，我知道你现在站在我们这边，可我听说 - 你没把事办好。

Key.Original: Don't fail again.
Key.Chinesesimp: 别再搞砸了。

Container.name: 003_eve_reputation_minus_one_neg
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Képi. This no good.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi。这可不好。

Key.Original: Your action, it upset L'Ensemble.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的所做所为，让大帮会很不爽。

Key.Original: Tread careful. Don't piss us off...
Key.Chinesesimp: 留点神。别惹火了我们...

Container.name: 002_eve_reputation_minus_two_neg
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Hey. Képi...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。Képi...

Key.Original: C'est quoi, ce bordel ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这到底怎么回事？

Key.Original: You mess up, bad.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你搞砸了，糟糕。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble got eye on you. Best you make good, eh?
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 正盯著你，你好好幹，知道吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会盯着你呢。你最好把事办妥，明白？

Key.Original: Au revoir.
Key.Chinesesimp: 再见。

Container.name: 001_eve_reputation_minus_three_neg
Container.situation: boss contacts player to inform them of a change in their relationship status.

Key.Original: Képi? It is Samjo.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi？我是"山姆卓"。

Key.Original: You become a problem, I think.
Key.Chinese: 我看你現在成了個問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想，你是成了个棘手的麻烦。

Key.Original: Time you decide what side you on...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你该决定站在哪一边了...

Key.Original: I not warn you again.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我最后一次警告你。

Container.name: 029_am_landing_on_airstrip
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about l'ensemble smuggling guns.

Key.Original: I got a friend, right.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我有个朋友，嗯。

Key.Original: He works nights, at the Tanoa Sugar Company.
Key.Chinese: 他在塔諾雅製糖公司上晚班。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他上晚班，就在塔诺亚糖业公司上班。

Key.Original: He's out having a cigarette, when a small plane flies over.
Key.Chinese: 他出去抽根煙的時候，看見了頭頂上有架小飛機飛過去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他出去抽烟时，看到一架小型飞机在上空飞过。

Key.Original: And it lands on a field. No runway. No nothing.
Key.Chinese: 飛機落在一片空地上，那裡連個跑道也沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞机降落在田野里。没有跑道。什么都没有。

Key.Original: Next thing he knows, gendarmes have arrived and everybody's shooting at each other...
Key.Chinese: 然後，國家憲兵出現，大家開始朝彼此開槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来，宪兵队来了，双方都在胡乱朝着对方开枪...

Key.Original: And this plane, it takes-off again!
Key.Chinese: 結果，這架飛機卻在此時飛走了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 而那架飞机，又起飞了！

Key.Original: Turns out the pilot was flying guns for L'Ensemble.
Key.Chinese: 他們後來查出，這架飛機是在為 L'Ensemble 運送槍械。
Key.Chinesesimp: 原来飞行员是在给大帮会送枪械。

Key.Original: I mean, you gotta admit, these guys have got some courage, eh?
Key.Chinese: 不得不承認，這些傢伙膽子很大，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 老实说，你得承认，这些家伙挺有勇气的，是吧？

Container.name: 028_am_facility_destroyed
Container.situation: ambcivlian speaks about the destruction of the main facility on tuvanaka.

Key.Original: Hey, tu as entendu?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你听到了吗？

Key.Original: There was a major firefight over on Tuvanaka.
Key.Chinese: 土萬納卡那裡有場大火拼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突瓦纳加那边有一场大仗呢。

Key.Original: CSAT are locking down every island.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 正在鎖定整座島嶼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协封锁了所有岛屿。

Key.Original: It's total chaos. I don't know what happened, but, it's big!
Key.Chinese: 情況非常混亂，我不知道發生了什麼事，不過很嚴重！
Key.Chinesesimp: 全乱套了。我不知道发生了什么事情，不过，动静很大！

Container.name: 027_am_radar_destroyed
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about the destruction of a radar site.

Key.Original: Did you hear the latest?
Key.Chinese: 你聽見了最新消息了嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你听到最新消息了吗？

Key.Original: Somebody took out CSAT's radar sites! Too bad the guérilleros don't have an air force. They could drive those bâtards into the sea...
Key.Chinese: 有人幹掉了 CSAT 的雷達站！只可惜游擊隊沒有空軍。要不然他們就能把這些混蛋通通趕到海裡…
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人干掉了广协的雷达站！可惜游击队没有空军。要不，他们就能把那些王八蛋赶到海里去...

Container.name: 026_am_vagalala_house_destroyed
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about the destruction of a house in vagalala.

Key.Original: That house in Vagalala...
Key.Chinesesimp: 瓦加拉拉那幢房子...

Key.Original: Y'know - the one that got blown up?
Key.Chinese: 你知道吧，就是被炸掉的那一棟？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗？被炸的那幢？

Key.Original: La gendarmerie seized it, but it belonged to some guy they arrested.
Key.Chinese: 那被憲兵隊徵收了，原來的主人被他們逮捕了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队查封了它，他们还逮捕了原户主。

Key.Original: Seems L'Ensemble were worried about him talking.
Key.Chinese: 看來 L'Ensemble 擔心他會透露消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会似乎很担心他开口。

Key.Original: Anyway, there's not much left of it now. And no witnesses either.
Key.Chinese: 反正，現在什麼也不剩了，而且連證人也沒有了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管怎样，现在那儿没剩下什么了。也没有见证人。

Key.Original: Everyone's too afraid of reprisals!
Key.Chinesesimp: 人们都怕报复！

Container.name: 025_am_night_club
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about night club.

Key.Original: I been thinking.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在想。

Key.Original: The discotheque in Lifou...
Key.Chinesesimp: 利福的迪斯科舞厅...

Key.Original: It's not that great, n'ais pas?
Key.Chinesesimp: 没那么好玩，你觉得？

Key.Original: There's no women there, and the guy on the door's a total crétin.
Key.Chinese: 那裡沒有女人，看門的這傢伙完全是個白癡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿没女人，门口的伙计是个十足的蠢货。

Key.Original: Once this malaria thing's over, you know what we should do?
Key.Chinese: 等這瘧疾風波過後，你知道我們應該做什麼嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 虐疾这事儿结束后，你知道我们该做什么吗？

Key.Original: Beach parties, mec - bring back the fêtes sur la plage, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 海灘派對，夥計－－真懷念那海灘派對，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 沙滩派对，伙计 - 再来一次海滩派对，知道吗？

Container.name: 024_am_idap_worker_b
Container.situation: ambcivilian talks about the mysterious malaria virus.

Key.Original: I shit you not, I left him for like a couple of minutes, came back with an RDT and...
Key.Chinese: 不騙你，我離開他幾分鐘，帶個快速診斷測試回來，然後…
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可没忽悠你，我离开他两分钟的样子，拿了 RDT 试剂回来，然后...

Key.Original: Boom, he's burning up.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嚯，他简直就像一团火。

Key.Original: I had about enough time to call the CMO before he, y'know...
Key.Chinese: 我才剛剛給主軍醫打通電話，結果這就…
Key.Chinesesimp: 我倒是来得及呼叫 CMO，可他，你懂的...

Key.Original: And his skin - I mean, hell, it was practically peeling off.
Key.Chinese: 他的皮膚－－該死，居然開始剝落了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他的皮肤 - 老实说，见鬼，直往下掉。

Key.Original: Does that sound anything like malaria to you?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你说这像虐疾的样子吗？

Container.name: 023_am_idap_worker_a
Container.situation: ambcivilian about the mysterious malaria virus.

Key.Original: I've seen malaria, man.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我见过虐疾，伙计。

Key.Original: And it isn't this. You call it that and people don't panic...
Key.Chinese: 這可不是瘧疾；不過，這樣的叫法，大家才不會慌…
Key.Chinesesimp: 虐疾不是这个样子。但是，这样叫，它就不会引起恐慌...

Key.Original: But call it a killer virus, with no known cure? Yeah, then...
Key.Chinese: 要是叫它「沒藥救的殺人病毒」？那就…
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是，把它说成无药可治的致命病毒？嗯，那可就...

Key.Original: Then you got a problem!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那就会出麻烦了！

Container.name: 022_am_political_dialogue_d
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about political situation on tanoa.

Key.Original: Strangest thing...
Key.Chinesesimp: 奇怪透顶...

Key.Original: Renou, he was out fishing the other day near Tuvanaka.
Key.Chinese: 有一天，雷諾在土萬納卡附近釣魚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有一天，雷诺出门到突瓦纳加附近钓鱼。

Key.Original: Said he saw a small plane come down and crash into the sea!
Key.Chinese: 他說他看見一架小飛機掉到海裡去了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 他说看到一架小型飞机掉进海里坠毁了！

Key.Original: That's got to be smugglers - right?
Key.Chinesesimp: 肯定是走私贩 - 对吧？

Key.Original: But what were they doing out there?
Key.Chinesesimp: 可是他们在那儿干嘛呢？

Container.name: 021_am_political_dialogue_c
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about political situation on tanoa.

Key.Original: C'est fou...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这太疯狂了...

Key.Original: How can our government support CSAT after what they did?
Key.Chinese: CSAT 做出了這種事，我們的政府怎麼能夠支持他們？
Key.Chinesesimp: 看看广协的所作所为，我们的政府怎么还能支持他们呢？

Key.Original: They were trying to destabilize the country - remember? Selling guns to dangerous criminals.
Key.Chinese: 他們曾經想要破壞我們國家的穩定性，你還記得嗎？他們向危險的罪犯販賣槍枝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们在破坏国家稳定 - 记得吗？卖枪给那些险恶的犯罪分子。

Key.Original: And now we invite them back!
Key.Chinese: 現在我們卻要請他們回來！
Key.Chinesesimp: 而现在我们却把他们请回来了！

Key.Original: No wonder things are spiralling out of control...
Key.Chinese: 難怪事情越來越棘手了…
Key.Chinesesimp: 难怪局势失控...

Container.name: 020_am_political_dialogue_b
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about political situation on tanoa.

Key.Original: CSAT are everywhere now, huh?
Key.Chinese: CSAT 現在簡直無所不在，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在广协无处不在，是吧？

Key.Original: So much for doctors. All I'm seeing are soldiers and checkpoints...
Key.Chinese: 還說什麼醫生呢，我看見的都是士兵和檢查點…
Key.Chinesesimp: 医生就别提了。满眼都是士兵和关卡...

Container.name: 019_am_political_dialogue_a
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about political situation on tanoa.

Key.Original: Y'know, I got a cousin who's a desk clerk at the gendarme station, over in Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 我有個親戚在瓦加拉拉的國家憲兵站裡當接待員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道的，我有个表兄在瓦加拉拉那边的宪兵站做接待员。

Key.Original: He was taking an inventory of their evidence room, and found most of it missing. Stolen, I guess.
Key.Chinese: 他在證物室進行清點的時候，發現大多東西都不見了。我看是被偷了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他在清查证物室库存时发现，大多数证物都不见了。我猜是被偷了。

Key.Original: Anyhow, he reported it, and nothing happened. I mean, talk about police corruption!
Key.Chinese: 反正呢，他報告了這件事，但最後卻不了了之。你看看這警察有多腐敗！
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管怎么说，他汇报了情况，但最后不了了之。我是说，这事关系到警察腐败！

Key.Original: They even investigated some guy but he had links to Syndikat.
Key.Chinese: 他們本來在調查了一個人，不過這傢伙跟 Syndikat 有關係。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们还审讯了一个家伙，但他和辛迪加有关系。

Key.Original: So, they just dropped it. And, he's still on active duty, making stacks of cash. Putain de connard...
Key.Chinese: 所以呢，他們後來就不查了。而且，這個人到現在還在外頭賺大錢呢。該死的混蛋…
Key.Chinesesimp: 于是，他们就此结案。而且，他还在任职，大把捞钱。该死的混蛋...

Container.name: 018_am_syndikat_dialogue_d
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about l'ensemble and syndikat.

Key.Original: So, you see the police?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这么说，你看到警察了？

Key.Original: They took a guérillero to Auclair's old place.
Key.Chinese: 他們把一名游擊隊員帶到了奧克萊爾的舊家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们把一个游击队员带到 Auclair 的老地方去了。

Key.Original: Probably another interrogation.
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许又要来一次审讯了。

Key.Original: Mon dieu...
Key.Chinesesimp: 天哪…

Key.Original: I hope it don't take as long as the last one.
Key.Chinese: 希望不會跟上次 一樣那麼久。
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望不要像上次那么久。

Key.Original: Pauvre bâtard. You remember? He was screaming all night.
Key.Chinese: 可憐的混蛋。你還記得嗎？他整晚不停地尖叫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可怜的混蛋。记得吗？他惨叫了一整夜。

Container.name: 017_am_syndikat_dialogue_c
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about l'ensemble and syndikat.

Key.Original: You remember the parti d'opposition, Nouveaux Horizons?
Key.Chinese: 你記得反對黨新視野嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你记得反对党新视野吗？

Key.Original: Their top guy got fed to the crocos at Croconeel's last night.
Key.Chinese: 他們的老大昨晚被丟到鱷魚池裡餵鱷魚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 昨晚他们的老大在鳄鱼潭被喂了鳄鱼。

Key.Original: Gendarmes are still picking out the pieces...
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵到現在還在撿屍塊呢…
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队现在还在捞碎尸呢...

Key.Original: Must be L'Ensemble - I mean, that's how they do politique, pas vrai?
Key.Chinese: 一定是 L'Ensemble－－我是說，這就是他們的政治手段，不對嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 肯定是大帮会干的 - 我是说，这是他们玩政治的手法，不是吗？

Container.name: 016_am_syndikat_dialogue_b
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about l'ensemble and syndikat.

Key.Original: You hear the latest?
Key.Chinese: 你聽見了最新的消息了嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你听到最新消息了吗？

Key.Original: L'Ensemble took down a radio station. And in broad daylight too.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 拆了一棟無線電站，就光天化日之下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会搞掉了一座电台。就在光天化日之下。

Key.Original: They just blew up the tower.
Key.Chinese: 他們直接把高塔給炸了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们刚炸毁了发射塔。

Key.Original: That's pretty audacieux, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 胆子挺大的，是吧？

Container.name: 015_am_syndikat_dialogue_a
Container.situation: ambcivilian speaks about l'ensemble and syndikat.

Key.Original: Hey, you listen to the news lately?
Key.Chinese: 喂，你有沒有聽到最新的消息？
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你听到最新的消息了吗？

Key.Original: L'Ensemble attacked a supply depot.
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会袭击了一个补给站。

Key.Original: Big operation from the sound of it.
Key.Chinese: 聽起來好像是個很大的行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听动静是一次大行动。

Key.Original: They even had a boat.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们甚至搞到了一条船。

Key.Original: Crossed Yanukka Bay and caught CSAT completely off-guard.
Key.Chinese: 他們跨越了雅努卡灣，讓 CSAT 措手不及。
Key.Chinesesimp: 穿过雅努加湾，给了广协一个出其不意。

Key.Original: I mean, those guys, they're getting organized. Few more raids like that and, I dunno...
Key.Chinese: 我是說，那些傢伙越來越有組織性了。再搞幾次這樣的攻擊，不知道會怎樣…
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，那些家伙，他们正在组织起来。如果再搞几次这样的袭击，而且，很难说...

Key.Original: Maybe they will start a revolution.
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许他们会发动一场革命。

Container.name: 014_am_gendarme_greeting_d
Container.situation: ambcivilian acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Bonjour.
Key.Chinesesimp: Bonjour.

Container.name: 013_am_gendarme_greeting_c
Container.situation: ambcivilian acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Affaire de police officielle.
Key.Chinesesimp: 警官的证词。

Container.name: 012_am_gendarme_greeting_b
Container.situation: ambcivilian acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Il y a un problème, vieux?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有问题？老兄？

Container.name: 011_am_gendarme_greeting_a
Container.situation: ambcivilian acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Restez prudent dehors.
Key.Chinesesimp: 在外面要小心。

Container.name: 010_am_syndikat_greeting_d
Container.situation: ambcivilian acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Mener le Bon Combat, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝你好运，伙计。

Container.name: 008_am_syndikat_greeting_b
Container.situation: ambcivilian acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Heya. Comment ça va?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨。进来好吗?

Container.name: 007_am_syndikat_greeting_a
Container.situation: ambcivilian acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Salut, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，伙计。

Container.name: 009_am_idap_worker_greeting_d
Container.situation: idap workerj acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Bonjour, mon ami.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，我的朋友。

Container.name: 008_am_idap_worker_greeting_c
Container.situation: idap workeri acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Hi, how you doing?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，最近怎么样？

Container.name: 007_am_idap_worker_greeting_b
Container.situation: idap workerh acknowledges player.

Key.Original: You need anything, man?
Key.Chinese: 你需要什麼東西嗎，老兄？
Key.Chinesesimp: 需要什么吗，伙计？

Container.name: 006_am_idap_worker_greeting_a
Container.situation: idap workerg acknowledges player.

Key.Original: Heya, pal.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，老兄。

Container.name: 005_am_idap_worker_c
Container.situation: workere talks to workerf about idap medical supplies appearing on the black market.

Key.Original: Yeah - driver didn't show.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的 - 司机没露面。

Key.Original: Looks as though they got the lot...
Key.Chinese: 看來都落到他們手中了…
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来他们好像搞到货了...

Key.Original: Nope, but I heard there was a shit-ton of anti-malarial supplies.
Key.Chinese: 沒有，但是我聽說是一大堆抗瘧疾藥物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有，不过我听说竟然有一大堆抗虐疾药。

Key.Original: If he didn't, someone did.
Key.Chinese: 若不是他，那肯定是其他人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他不知道，也有人知道。

Key.Original: Did you read the manifest?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你看过货单吗？

Key.Original: It's all over the black market now.
Key.Chinese: 東西現在都流入黑市了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在黑市上到处都是。

Key.Original: Son of a bitch. He knew what he was doing, then.
Key.Chinese: 王八蛋，那他肯定是計畫好的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 狗日的。那他就知道自己在干什么。

Key.Original: IDAP might even try to buy it back.
Key.Chinese: 搞不好 IDAP 會把它們都買回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: IDAP 可能还得想办法回购。

Key.Original: For a price, I bet. Talk about biting the hand that feeds you, eh?
Key.Chinese: 我看這可不便宜，真是恩將仇報？
Key.Chinesesimp: 那要付出代价的，我敢肯定。这就是忘恩负义吧，嗯？

Container.name: 004_am_idap_worker_b
Container.situation: workerd talks about the mysterious malaria virus.

Key.Original: What?
Key.Chinesesimp: 什么？

Key.Original: I shit you not, I left him for like a couple of minutes, came back with an RDT and...
Key.Chinese: 不騙你，我離開他幾分鐘，帶個快速診斷測試回來，然後…
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可没忽悠你，我离开他两分钟的样子，拿了 RDT 试剂回来，然后...

Key.Original: Boom, he's burning up.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嚯，他简直就像一团火。

Key.Original: I had about enough time to call the CMO before he, y'know...
Key.Chinese: 我才剛剛給主軍醫打通電話，結果這就…
Key.Chinesesimp: 我倒是来得及呼叫 CMO，可他，你懂的...

Key.Original: And his skin - I mean, hell, it was practically peeling off.
Key.Chinese: 他的皮膚－－該死，居然開始剝落了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他的皮肤 - 老实说，见鬼，直往下掉。

Key.Original: Yeah. Does that sound anything like malaria to you?
Key.Chinese: 是啊 ，這聽起來像是瘧疾嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 对啊。你说这像虐疾的样子吗？

Container.name: 003_am_idap_worker_a
Container.situation: workerc about the mysterious malaria virus.

Key.Original: I've seen malaria, man.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我见过虐疾，伙计。

Key.Original: And it isn't this. You call it that and people don't panic...
Key.Chinese: 這可不是瘧疾；不過，這樣的叫法，大家才不會慌…
Key.Chinesesimp: 虐疾不是这个样子。但是，这样叫，它就不会引起恐慌...

Key.Original: But call it a killer virus, with no known cure? Yeah, then...
Key.Chinese: 要是叫它「沒藥救的殺人病毒」？那就…
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是，把它说成无药可治的致命病毒？嗯，那可就...

Key.Original: Then you got a problem!
Key.Chinesesimp: 那就会出麻烦了！

Container.name: 002_am_oreokastro_priest
Container.situation: civilianb talks to civiliana about a priest helping the sick on tanoa.

Key.Original: So, he's been around the outbreaks?
Key.Chinese: 所以，他和疫情有所接觸？
Key.Chinesesimp: 这么说，他一直在和瘟疫打交道？

Key.Original: Maybe he's blessed?
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许老天在保佑他？

Key.Original: Really, I mean it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 真的，我是说真的。

Key.Original: He must be immune or something. The guy's been administering last rites for like, a month.
Key.Chinese: 他肯定自帶免疫功能；那傢伙一個月以來一直在辦葬禮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他一定是有免疫力还是怎么着。这家伙一直在给人做临终圣礼，好像有一个月了。

Key.Original: Sant Georgioupolis... what is that? Greek? It sounds familiar.
Key.Chinese: Sant Georgioupolis…那是什麼？希臘文？感覺有些熟悉…
Key.Chinesesimp: Sant Georgioupolis...那是什么？希腊语？听起来挺熟的。

Key.Original: Oui - I mean, how he's still alive, it's a miracle.
Key.Chinese: Oui－－真不知道他怎麼還活著，根本就是奇蹟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 噢 - 我是说，他怎么活下来的，这是个奇迹。

Key.Original: Maybe. Or cursed. Pauvre bâtard. He seen a lotta death.
Key.Chinese: 或許，他是被詛咒了。Pauvre bâtard，見了這麼多死亡的景象。
Key.Chinesesimp: 或许吧。也可以说在折磨他。可怜的混蛋。他经常看到死人的事情。

Key.Original: Church should have him canonisé or, I dunno. Paid more.
Key.Chinese: 這教會應該給他個 canonisé 一下，不然給他加個薪。
Key.Chinesesimp: 教堂应该封他为圣者，或者，我不知道。给他加工资。

Container.name: 001_am_croconeels_ranch
Container.situation: civilianb talks to civiliana about syndikat becoming a political force on tanoa.

Key.Original: Because they got guns? Voyons donc!
Key.Chinese: 就因為他們有槍？ Voyons donc！
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为他们有枪？Voyons donc！

Key.Original: Es-tu sérieux, mec ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在开玩笑吧，伙计？

Key.Original: L'Ensemble are Syndikat thugs.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 就是一堆 Syndikat 的流氓。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会是一伙辛迪加匪徒。

Key.Original: Merde alors - I take my kids there!
Key.Chinese: Merde alors－－我常帶我的孩子們去那裡呢！
Key.Chinesesimp: Merde alors - 我经常带孩子去那儿！

Key.Original: Non, because they don't do politique - you remember that parti d'opposition, Nouveaux Horizons...?
Key.Chinese: 不，因為他們不搞政治，你記得那個反對黨新視野…？
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，因为他们不掺和政治 - 你记得反对党新视野吗...？

Key.Original: There a good reason they don't make no trouble no more.
Key.Chinese: 他們現在不再惹麻煩，也不是沒有原因的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们现在不会再添乱了，但也不是没有原因的。

Key.Original: That psycho, Samjo?
Key.Chinesesimp: "山姆卓"那个疯子？

Key.Original: He fed their main man to the crocos at Croconeel's. Bit by bit.
Key.Chinese: 他把他們的老大大卸八塊，然後丟到鱷魚池裡去餵鱷魚。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他在鳄鱼潭把他们的头儿大卸八块。一块一块丢去喂鳄鱼了。

Key.Original: Stop and get out, now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下，滚出来，快！

Key.Original: So, whatever you want, we got it...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，你要什么，我们就有什么...

Key.Original: Hey, out the vehicle, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，下车，伙计。

Key.Original: If you need guns, no problem.
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果需要枪支，没问题。

Key.Original: Okay, il n'écoute pas. Tue-le !
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，他不听。干掉他！

Key.Original: See anything you want?
Key.Chinesesimp: 看中什么东西了吗？

Key.Original: Descendez le conducteur !
Key.Chinesesimp: 向司机开枪！

Key.Original: As you can see, patron... there's not much we can't get, eh?
Key.Chinese: 你看吧，夥計…沒什麼我們弄不到手的東西，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你瞧瞧，伙计...我们基本上什么都有，是吧？

Key.Original: Restricted area, soldier-man. No place for you.
Key.Chinese: 限制區域，士兵。你不該來這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是禁区，老兄。闲人免进。

Key.Original: Tanoa Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you're clear to land.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅塔台呼叫 JSO15N，准許降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突瓦纳加塔台呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，准许着陆。

Key.Original: This no place for you. Dégage!
Key.Chinese: 這裡不是你該來的地方，快滾！
Key.Chinesesimp: 这儿不能进来。快滚！

Key.Original: Lijnhaven Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you're clear to land.
Key.Chinese: Lijnhaven 塔台呼叫 JSO15N，准許降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 丽音赫文发射塔呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，准许着陆。

Key.Original: This L'Ensemble land, mec. Foutre le camp, eh ?
Key.Chinese: 這是 L'Ensemble 島，夥計。給我滾，明白？
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是大帮会的地盘，伙计。滚开，嗯？

Key.Original: Rochelle Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you're clear to land.
Key.Chinese: 羅謝爾塔台呼叫 JSO15N，准許降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拉罗歇尔发射塔呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，准许着陆。

Key.Original: Hey, where the hell are you going! This area's off limits!
Key.Chinese: 喂，你是要去哪！這是禁區！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你到底要去哪儿！这是禁区！

Key.Original: Tanoa Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you're clear for take-off.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅塔台呼叫 JSO15N，准許起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突瓦纳加塔台呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，准许起飞。

Key.Original: Get out of the vehicle, you can't be here!
Key.Chinese: 給我下車，你不能待在這裡！
Key.Chinesesimp: 从车里滚出来，这儿不能进来！

Key.Original: Lijnhaven Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you're clear for take-off.
Key.Chinese: 林哈文塔台呼叫 JSO15N，准許起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 丽音赫文发射塔呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，准许起飞。

Key.Original: I don't recognize you - what are you doing here?
Key.Chinese: 我不認得你，你在這裡幹嘛？
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不认识你 - 你在这儿干嘛？

Key.Original: Rochelle Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you're clear for take-off.
Key.Chinese: 羅謝爾塔台呼叫 JSO15N，准許起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拉罗歇尔发射塔呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，准许起飞。

Key.Original: Hey - who are you?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 你是谁？

Key.Original: Tanoa Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you do not have permission to land.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅塔台呼叫 JSO15N，你沒有獲得降落的授權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突瓦纳加塔台呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，你未获准着陆。

Key.Original: Brèche de sécurité ! Sonnez l'alarme !
Key.Chinese: 出現安全漏洞！響起警報！
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全防线被突破！发出警报！

Key.Original: Lijnhaven Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you do not have permission to land.
Key.Chinese: Lijnhaven 塔台呼叫 JSO15N，你沒有獲得降落的授權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 丽音赫文发射塔呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，你未获准着陆。

Key.Original: Alarme! Alarme!
Key.Chinesesimp: 警报！警报！

Key.Original: Rochelle Tower to Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November, you do not have permission to land.
Key.Chinese: 羅謝爾塔台呼叫 JSO15N，你沒有獲得降落的授權。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拉罗歇尔发射塔呼叫 Caesar Juliet Sierra Oscar One Five November，你未获准着陆。

Key.Original: Merde ! Sonnez l'alarme !
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼！发出警报！

Key.Original: Something you need?
Key.Chinesesimp: 需要什么东西吗？

Key.Original: Put that weapon down, mec!
Key.Chinesesimp: 放下你的武器，伙计！

Key.Original: What you looking for, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在找什么，嗯？

Key.Original: Drop the weapon!
Key.Chinesesimp: 放下武器！

Key.Original: Come on, see what's here...
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，随便看看...

Key.Original: See you real soon, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 待会见，行吗？

Key.Original: Come on, take a look.
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，瞧一瞧吧。

Key.Original: Salut, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，伙计。

Key.Original: Take him out!
Key.Chinesesimp: 干掉他！

Key.Original: Okay, see you later.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，回头见。

Key.Original: He's hostile!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他是敌人！

Key.Original: That it?
Key.Chinesesimp: 要走了？

Key.Original: I'm engaging!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我开火了！

Key.Original: You come back again, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你又回来了，嗯？

Key.Original: Open fire - take him down!
Key.Chinesesimp: 开火 - 干掉他！

Key.Original: Hey. Comment ςa va ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。怎么样了？

Key.Original: Alright, open up!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，开火！

Key.Original: Heya, gros dur. I'm open for business...
Key.Chinesesimp: 哎呀，gros dur。随时欢迎...

Key.Original: Intruder!
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人闯入！

Key.Original: Hey, salut.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你好。

Key.Original: He's an enemy agent - take him out!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他是敌方特务 - 干掉他！

Key.Original: Good to see you.
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴见到你。

Key.Original: Tuvanaka Tower to unidentified aircraft, you're entering a restricted flight zone! Turn around immediately or you will be fired upon.
Key.Chinese: 土納萬卡塔台呼叫不明飛機，你進入了禁飛區！請立即返回，否則我們將向你開槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 突瓦纳加塔台呼叫不明飞机，你即将进入限飞区！请马上掉头，否则我们就开火了。

Key.Original: Hey, fous le camp - get outta here!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，滚蛋 - 滚出去！

Key.Original: Attention, unidentified aircraft! You're approaching a no-fly zone. Turn around immediately or you will be fired upon.
Key.Chinese: 注意，不明飛機！你正在接近禁飛區。請立即返回，否則我們將會對你開槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意，不明飞机！你即将进入禁飞区！请马上掉头，否则我们就开火了。

Key.Original: Hey! You shouldn't be here - leave, now!
Key.Chinese: 喂！你不該來這裡－－給我滾，快！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你不能呆在这儿 - 快离开！快！

Key.Original: Attention, unidentified aircraft! You're approaching a no-fly zone! Turn around at once or we will engage!
Key.Chinese: 注意，不明飛機！你正在接近禁飛區！請立即返回，否則我們將開火射擊！
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意，不明飞机！你正在靠近禁飞区！请马上掉头，否则我们就开火了！

Key.Original: You gotta problem, old man? Dégage!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你搞什么，老头？滚蛋！

Key.Original: Hey, you! Leave! Now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你！快离开！快！

Key.Original: Hey, Legionnaire! Assez, aller! You not welcome here.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，Legionnaire！夠了，滾！這裡不歡迎你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，当兵的！够了，滚！这儿可不欢迎你。

Key.Original: You! Clear out! Move!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你！走开！快走！

Key.Original: Back off, mec. I not say again, eh?
Key.Chinese: 退開，夥計。我不會再說一次，知道吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 往后退，伙计。我最后说一遍，明白？

Key.Original: Hey, get out of here!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，快给我滚出去！

Key.Original: You - no! Go, now. Dégage!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你 - 不行！快走开。滚蛋！

Key.Original: Hey, you - what are you doing here?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你 - 在这儿干嘛？

Key.Original: Hey! Get outta here!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨！滚出去！

Key.Original: This is a military matter, beat it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在执行军务，走开。

Key.Original: Hey, you! Leave! Now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你！快离开！快！

Key.Original: Hey, you! Go! Get out of here!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿！你！快走！滚出去！

Key.Original: Hey, je ne te connais pas...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，我不认识你...

Key.Original: This is military business.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在执行军务。

Key.Original: Hey - qui es-tu ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 你是谁？

Key.Original: Hey! You shouldn't be here - leave, now!
Key.Chinese: 喂！你不該來這裡－－給我滾，快！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你不能呆在这儿 - 快离开！快！

Key.Original: C'est un espion - tue-le - tue-le !
Key.Chinese: 他是間諜，殺了他…殺了他！
Key.Chinesesimp: 他是个间谍 - 杀了他 - 杀了他！

Key.Original: You! Get lost!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你！滚开！

Key.Original: Infiltrateur !
Key.Chinesesimp: 奸细！

Key.Original: Hey, you want to get shot?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你想挨枪子儿吗？

Key.Original: Engagez ! Tue-le, maintenant !
Key.Chinesesimp: 开火！干掉他，快！

Key.Original: Hey - who are you?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 你是谁？

Key.Original: Suffisant - tue-le !
Key.Chinesesimp: 行了 - 杀了他！

Key.Original: You, come here a moment...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你，过来一下...

Key.Original: Merde ! Je m'engage !
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼！我开火了！

Key.Original: Drop the weapon!
Key.Chinesesimp: 放下武器！

Key.Original: Il est hostile !
Key.Chinesesimp: 他是敌人！

Key.Original: Stop! Drop the fucking weapon, now!
Key.Chinese: 別動！他媽的給我把武器放下，快！
Key.Chinesesimp: 站住！放下该死的武器，快！

Key.Original: Putain ! Ouvrez le feu !
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！开火！

Key.Original: Intruder - somebody sound the alarm!
Key.Chinese: 有入侵者－－有人響起了警報！
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人闯入 - 有人触发警报！

Key.Original: Dispatch, shots fired. Requesting back-up. Over.
Key.Chinese: 調度中心，有人開槍。請求支援，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是调度，开火了。请求支援。完毕。

Key.Original: Alarm, alarm!
Key.Chinesesimp: 警报，警报！

Key.Original: This is dispatch, we're sending support...
Key.Chinese: 這是調度中心，我們正在派遣支援…
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是调度，我们正在派遣支援部队...

Key.Original: Security breach, we've got an intruder!
Key.Chinese: 出現安全漏洞；有人入侵了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全防线被突破，有人闯入！

Key.Original: Give us a report god damn it! Over.
Key.Chinese: 該死，快給我報告情況！完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼，报告下情况啊！完毕。

Key.Original: Hey - who's that? Identify yourself!
Key.Chinese: 嘿，誰在那？表明你的身份！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 你是谁？报一下你的身份！

Key.Original: Reinforcements are inbound, hold your position.
Key.Chinese: 支援正在路上，堅守陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 增援部队即将到达，守住阵地。

Key.Original: You, stop!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你，站住！

Key.Original: Nothing heard, respond! Over.
Key.Chinese: 沒有收到回應，請回覆！完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没听到，请回复！完毕。

Key.Original: Stop! Get out of the vehicle!
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下！从车里滚出来！

Key.Original: Sergeant, report - what's your situation...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，请报告 - 你那儿情况怎样...？

Key.Original: Hey - what the hell are you doing! Get out of that vehicle!
Key.Chinese: 喂，你在搞什麼！快給我下車！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 你在搞什么鬼！从车里滚出来！

Key.Original: Get out of the vehicle or we will open fire!
Key.Chinese: 下車，不然我們就開槍了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 从车里滚出来，否则我们就开枪了！

Key.Original: No! This is a restricted area - walk away.
Key.Chinese: 不！這是限制區域－－快離開。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行！这是禁区 - 走开。

Key.Original: Stop! Get out of that vehicle, now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下！从车里滚出来，快！

Key.Original: Stop. This area is off limits.
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下。这是禁区。

Key.Original: Arrête !
Key.Chinesesimp: 停住！

Key.Original: Hey, you're not supposed to be here! This area is restricted.
Key.Chinese: 喂，你不該在這裡！這裡是限制區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你不应该呆在这儿！这是禁区。

Key.Original: Tire dans les pneus ou autre chose !
Key.Chinesesimp: 把车胎打破，怎么搞都行！

Key.Original: Enough - shoot the driver. Take him out!
Key.Chinesesimp: 够了 - 向司机开枪。干掉他！

Key.Original: Merde ! Ouvrir le feu !
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼！开火！

Key.Original: He's not listening. Open fire!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他不听。开火！

Key.Original: Hey - hey! Pull over! This is a restricted area!
Key.Chinese: 喂、喂！停車！這是限制區域！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 嘿！靠边停车！这是禁区！

Key.Original: Stop! Get out of that vehicle, now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下！从车里滚出来，快！

Key.Original: Stop! Get out and identify yourself - now!
Key.Chinese: 停下！下車，表明你的身份，快！
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下！滚出来，报一下你的身份 - 快！

Key.Original: Hey, you, stop - exit that vehicle!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你，停下 - 从车里出来！

Key.Original: Stop - show me some ID - now!
Key.Chinese: 停下來－－給我看看你的 ID，快！
Key.Chinesesimp: 站住 - 给我看看身份证 - 快！

Key.Original: Suffisant - tue-le !
Key.Chinesesimp: 行了 - 杀了他！

Key.Original: Hey - who's that? Identify yourself!
Key.Chinese: 嘿，誰在那？表明你的身份！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 你是谁？报一下你的身份！

Key.Original: Il est hostile !
Key.Chinesesimp: 他是敌人！

Key.Original: Vous devez quitter la zone - you are not supposed to be here!
Key.Chinese: Vous devez quitter la zone－－你不該來這裡！
Key.Chinesesimp: Vous devez quitter la zone - 你不能呆在这里！

Key.Original: Merde ! Je m'engage !
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼！我开火了！

Key.Original: C'est une zone interdite! This is a restricted area!
Key.Chinese: 這是禁區！這是限制區域！
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是禁区！这是禁区！

Key.Original: Ouvrez le feu - a le descendre !
Key.Chinesesimp: 开火 - 干掉他！

Key.Original: Arrête !
Key.Chinesesimp: 停住！

Key.Original: C'est des conneries ! Engagez !
Key.Chinesesimp: 管个球！开火！

Key.Original: This area's restricted. Leave, now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是禁区。快离开，快！

Key.Original: Il n'est pas avec nous !
Key.Chinesesimp: 他不是我们的人！

Key.Original: Non ! C'est une zone interdite.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行！这儿是禁区。

Key.Original: Imposteur !
Key.Chinesesimp: 冒牌货！

Key.Original: Brèche de sécurité ! Sonner l'alarme !
Key.Chinese: 出現安全漏洞！響起警報！
Key.Chinesesimp: 安全防线被突破！发出警报！

Key.Original: Hey, you! Leave! Now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你！快离开！快！

Key.Original: Alarme ! Alarme !
Key.Chinesesimp: 警报！警报！

Key.Original: You! Clear out! Move!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你！走开！快走！

Key.Original: Merde ! Sonnez l'alarme !
Key.Chinesesimp: 见鬼！发出警报！

Key.Original: This is police business - get lost!
Key.Chinesesimp: 警察执行公务 - 滚开！

Key.Original: Stop! Lose the weapon. Now!
Key.Chinesesimp: 站住！放下武器。快！

Key.Original: Hey, you! Go, get out of here, mec.
Key.Chinese: 喂，你！給我離開這裡，夥計。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你！快给我滚，伙计。

Key.Original: You - drop the weapon!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你 - 放下武器！

Key.Original: Hey! You shouldn't be here - leave, now!
Key.Chinese: 喂！你不該來這裡－－給我滾，快！
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你不能呆在这儿 - 快离开！快！

Key.Original: Viens ici un moment.
Key.Chinesesimp: 过来一下。

Key.Original: You! Get lost!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你！滚开！

Key.Original: Hey - qui es-tu ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 你是谁？

Key.Original: Hey, dégage! Go on, get outta here!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，滚出去！走吧，滚出去！

Key.Original: Hey, you! Back off, get outta here!
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你！往后退，滚出去！

Key.Original: This ain't no place for you, mec...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里不能进来，mec...

Container.name: 001_cut_camera_placement_call
Container.situation: miller is communicating with player and reporting that he has a video feed, after player's placement of a remote surveillance device. first few lines accompany black screen and bohemia interactive presents text.

Key.Original: Alright, good - that's good. I got a visual.
Key.Chinese: 啊，很好－－這樣很好。我看到了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好，不错 - 挺不错。我看到了。

Key.Original: Now pan around...
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在转过来...

Key.Original: Okay, and stop...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，停住...

Key.Original: The red bin. Hide the camera there.
Key.Chinese: 紅色的桶子，把攝影機藏在那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 红色垃圾桶，把相机藏在那儿。

Key.Original: That should do us for the livefeed.
Key.Chinese: 這樣應該就能取得即時影像。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样应该就能看到实时视频。

Key.Original: I suggest you head home, crash out.
Key.Chinese: 我建議你回家好好睡一覺。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我建议你回去，好好休息一下。

Key.Original: Any intel's going to take some time to process.
Key.Chinese: 取得的情報需要一些時間來處理。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞到的情报需要一些时间来处理。

Key.Original: I'll hit you up when we got a lead.
Key.Chinese: 我們有線索的時候會通知你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们一有线索就联系你。

Container.name: 001_ta_destroy_police_station_call
Container.situation: player receives a call from boss and is tasked with destroying a police station.

Key.Original: Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi。

Key.Original: Gendarmes arrest our leader politique - so now, we strike back.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵逮捕了我們的政治首領－－現在，我們將反擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队逮捕了我们的政治领袖 - 现在嘛，我们要反击了。

Key.Original: There is a car, with a bomb inside.
Key.Chinese: 有一輛車，裡面裝有炸彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有辆小车，里面装了炸弹。

Key.Original: Take it to address I just send you.
Key.Chinese: 把它開到我傳給你的地址。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把它开到我发给你的地址那儿。

Key.Original: Avoid checkpoints.
Key.Chinesesimp: 避开关卡。

Key.Original: And when you get there, park close.
Key.Chinese: 到了以後，把車停得離目標近一點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到那儿后，把车停在旁边。

Key.Original: Then, moment you clear, explode it.
Key.Chinese: 然後，你一離開，馬上引爆它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后，跑开后就引爆炸弹。

Key.Original: Government will see, they can't act against us with impunité.
Key.Chinese: 政府會瞭解到，他們不能用武力對我們採取行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让政府放明白点，跟我们作对是没有好下场。

Container.name: 028_eve_disco_dancer
Container.situation: dancerb comments on the lack of women at the disco.

Key.Original: Yo, mec...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，伙计…

Key.Original: Où sont les dames ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，女士们在哪儿？

Container.name: 023_eve_dancera_afraid_in
Container.situation: dancera tells player to take anything he wants.

Key.Original: Tu es fou !
Key.Chinesesimp: 你疯了！

Key.Original: Prends ce que tu voulais !
Key.Chinesesimp: 想拿什么随便拿！

Container.name: 024_eve_dancera_afraid_out
Container.situation: dancera tells player to keep his access pass.

Key.Original: Ma carte d'accès ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的门禁卡？

Key.Original: Oui, allez, peu importe !
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错，去吧，拿去吧！

Container.name: 022_eve_dancera_go_away_c
Container.situation: dancera tells player to stop bothering him.

Key.Original: Sérieux, c'est quoi ton problème ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 说真的，你怎么了？

Container.name: 021_eve_dancera_go_away_b
Container.situation: dancera tells player to stop bothering him.

Key.Original: Va danser, ou bouge !
Key.Chinesesimp: 要么去跳舞，要么滚蛋！

Container.name: 020_eve_dancera_go_away_a
Container.situation: dancera tells player to stop bothering him.

Key.Original: Tu veux quoi ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你想怎么着？

Key.Original: Tu veux pas danser ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不想跳舞？

Key.Original: Oh - Peut-être que tu es trop vieux maintenant.
Key.Chinese: 哦…可能是老了，跳不動了…
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦 - 也许你太老了点...

Container.name: 051_in_aa_intel_airstrike
Container.situation: player gets a call from miller, who mentions the presence of aa sites across the islands.

Key.Original: Santiago...
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"...

Key.Original: The intel you fished out from the plane wreck, we had someone take a look at it.
Key.Chinese: 你從墜機現場中找到的情報，我們已經找人去研究了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你从飞机残骸那儿搜到的情报，我们派人去瞧了下。

Key.Original: There are some pretty sophisticated SAM sites here.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有許多精密的 SAM 地對空系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这儿有几处挺先进的 SAM 发射场。

Key.Original: They rely on two radar stations - a big one, on Mont Tanoa, and another somewhere else.
Key.Chinese: 他們仰賴兩個雷達站，大的在塔諾雅山，另一個在別處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它们靠两个雷达站起作用 - 一个大的，在塔诺亚山，另一个在别的什么地方。

Key.Original: If this wasn't a covert op, we could knock them out and coordinate airstrikes. But it is and we can't.
Key.Chinese: 如果這不是機密任務，我們能直接朝座標進行空襲轟炸。不過這是機密任務，所以我們不能這麼做。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果这不是一次秘密行动，我们本可以直接摧毁它们，还可以请求空袭。但这是一次秘密行动，所以不能这么干。

Key.Original: That said, if you can throw a spanner in the works, go ahead, I'm happy putting options on the table.
Key.Chinese: 不過，你要是想去搞破壞，那也行，我都願意去嘗試各種方法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样吧，如果你能去搞点破坏；那就去干吧，我乐见其成。

Container.name: 050_eve_doctor_rescued
Container.situation: player rescues doctor and boss calls to threaten him.

Key.Original: Bad move, Képi blanc.
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟透了，Képi Blanc。

Key.Original: You petit homme - we will find you.
Key.Chinese: 你這個小矮人，我們會找到你的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你这个小矮人 - 我们会找到你的。

Key.Original: And when we do, you crocodile food, papi...
Key.Chinese: 到時候，你就會變成鱷魚飼料，老爹…
Key.Chinesesimp: 到时候，把你喂鳄鱼，papi...

Container.name: 049_ta_sample_taken_to_van_alt_bad_rep_out_call
Container.situation: player takes the counteragent to the van, as ordered by syndikat_boss. reputation level is bad.

Key.Original: There is a petit submersible at the harbor in Tavu.
Key.Chinese: 塔夫的碼頭有一艘小型潛水艇。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在塔夫港口，有一艘小型潜艇。

Key.Original: Take it, use it to escape. Go to La Roche. If I see you again...
Key.Chinese: 用它逃走。去 La Roche。要是再讓我看見你…
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到它，用它逃走。去拉罗歇。要是我再看到你...

Key.Original: You not do so well. Adieu, old man.
Key.Chinese: 你表現不怎麼。再見，老頭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那就有你好看的了。再见吧，老头。

Container.name: 048_ta_sample_taken_to_van_alt_bad_rep_doctor_call
Container.situation: player takes the counteragent to the van, as ordered by syndikat_boss. reputation level is bad.

Key.Original: The doctor-man, he free to go.
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个医生嘛，他可以走了。

Key.Original: But you. I want you gone from here.
Key.Chinese: 但是，你。我要你離開這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而你，我希望你从这儿消失。

Container.name: 047_ta_sample_taken_to_van_alt_bad_rep_in_call
Container.situation: player takes the counteragent to the van, as ordered by syndikat_boss. reputation level is bad.

Key.Original: Bon choix, Képi blanc.
Key.Chinesesimp: 祝你好运，Képi Blanc。

Key.Original: You not so stupid, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不会这么笨吧，嗯？

Container.name: 046_ta_sample_taken_to_van_alt_out_call
Container.situation: player takes the counteragent to the van, as ordered by syndikat_boss. reputation level is good.

Key.Original: But, écoute moi. You in big danger.
Key.Chinese: 可是，聽我說。你的處境很危險。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，听我说。你有大危险了。

Key.Original: Your NATO friends, they betray you.
Key.Chinese: 你那些 NATO 的朋友們背叛了你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的北约朋友，他们背叛了你。

Key.Original: After you betray them.
Key.Chinese: 因為你之前出賣了他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为你之前出卖了他们。

Key.Original: CSAT know who you are - 'Santiago'.
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协知道你是谁了 -“"圣地亚哥"”。

Key.Original: Tanoa. It no place for you no more.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅，你不該再待在這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚。你不该再呆在那儿了。

Key.Original: But L'Ensemble? We don't forget our friends.
Key.Chinese: 至於 L'Ensemble？我們從來不會忘記我們的朋友。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于大帮会，我们从来不会忘记自己的朋友。

Key.Original: There is a petit submersible at the harbor in Tavu.
Key.Chinese: 塔夫的碼頭有一艘小型潛水艇。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在塔夫港口，有一艘小型潜艇。

Key.Original: Take it, use it to escape. Go to La Roche. Go safe. Adieu.
Key.Chinese: 找到它，用它逃走。去 La Roche。注意安全，再見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到它，用它逃走。去拉罗歇。注意安全。再见。

Container.name: 045_ta_sample_taken_to_van_alt_doctor_call
Container.situation: player takes the counteragent to the van, as ordered by syndikat_boss. reputation level is good.

Key.Original: Your doctor-man.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的那个医生。

Key.Original: He done here. He free to go...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他完事了。可以走了...

Container.name: 044_ta_sample_taken_to_van_alt_in_call
Container.situation: player takes the counteragent to the van, as ordered by syndikat_boss. reputation level is good.

Key.Original: Okay...
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好...
