Key.Original: I think we good.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我们到手了。

Container.name: 043_ta_counteragent_in_van
Container.situation: player places the counteragent in the van and boss calls.

Key.Original: Très bien.
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好。

Key.Original: Leave it and go, we watchin' you...
Key.Chinese: 留下它，然後離開，我們會盯著你的…
Key.Chinesesimp: 留下东西，马上离开，我们盯你呢...

Container.name: 042_eve_in_georgetown_syndikat_boss
Container.situation: boss contacts player as they approach the van.

Key.Original: I see you come to Georgetown. Good.
Key.Chinese: 你來到了喬治鎮了啊，很好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看见你到乔治敦了。很好。

Key.Original: The drop is close to la cathédrale. Behind the meat market...
Key.Chinese: 目的地就在大教堂附近，就在肉市後面…
Key.Chinesesimp: 目的地在大教堂附近。肉市后面...

Container.name: 041_eve_approaching_van_syndikat_boss
Container.situation: boss contacts player as they approach the van.

Key.Original: You close, Képi. It's the blue van.
Key.Chinese: 很近了，Képi。就是那輛藍色廂型車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 离你很近了，Képi。是辆蓝色货车。

Container.name: 040_ex_no_parking_angry
Container.situation: player is told by gendarme that they cannot park where player has parked.

Key.Original: Papi ! J'ai dit bouge ta putain de voiture !
Key.Chinese: 老頭，我叫你把這該死的車子移一下！
Key.Chinesesimp: 老头，我说，把你那破车挪走！

Container.name: 039_ex_no_parking
Container.situation: player is told by gendarme that they cannot park where player has parked.

Key.Original: Hey, whoah ! Non, vous ne pouvez pas stationner ici !
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，哎呀！不行，你不能在这儿停车！

Container.name: 038_ex_timeout_traitor_alt
Container.situation: player is assigned a task to destroy the traitor's house.

Key.Original: Képi - bad news.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi - 有坏消息。

Key.Original: Gendarmes took our comrade into the mangrove swamps.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵把我們的同伴帶到了紅樹林沼澤中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队把我们的同志带到红树林沼泽地里了。

Key.Original: They execute him there.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们要在那儿处决他。

Key.Original: Nothing you can do now.
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在你做什么都没用了。

Key.Original: Time will come when we find out who responsible - and we get justice...
Key.Chinese: 我們遲早會找出是誰幹的－－到時候再報仇雪恨…
Key.Chinesesimp: 总有一天我们会查出这是谁干的 - 正义会来的...

Container.name: 037_ta_loaded_plane_delivered_call
Container.situation: boss calls to congratulate player on smuggling the supplies in the plane.

Key.Original: Képi, excellent !
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi。干得漂亮！

Key.Original: It seems you a man of many talents.
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来你本事挺多的。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble get you money very soon.
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会很快就会付钱给你的。

Key.Original: You earn it, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你应得的，Képi。

Key.Original: Leave the plane, we will unload it.
Key.Chinese: 飛機停在那就好了，貨我們來搬。
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞机就停在那吧，我们要卸货了。

Container.name: 036_eve_loaders_kia_call
Container.situation: smuggler informs player that they need to take-off immediately.

Key.Original: It's no good - we can't get to you!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行 - 我们过不去！

Key.Original: Take-off with what you got. Go! Go!
Key.Chinese: 帶著你飛機上的貨物先走，快！快！
Key.Chinesesimp: 带着货物快起飞吧。快！快！

Container.name: 035_eve_plane_fully_loaded_call
Container.situation: smuggler informs player that the plane is fully loaded and that he should take-off without delay.

Key.Original: That's it!
Key.Chinesesimp: 行了！

Key.Original: Cargo's in, get her up!
Key.Chinesesimp: 货装好了，送她上天吧！

Key.Original: Get her outta here, go!
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞走吧，快！

Container.name: 034_eve_gendarme_attack_call
Container.situation: smuggler informs player that gendarmes have arrived.

Key.Original: Putain, les gendarmes !
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠，宪兵队！

Key.Original: Defend the plane. Buy us some time!
Key.Chinese: 保護飛機。為我們爭取些時間！
Key.Chinesesimp: 守好飞机。为我们争取点时间！

Container.name: 033_eve_loading_plane_call
Container.situation: smuggler tells player the plane is almost loaded.

Key.Original: Okay, we doin' good.
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好，进展顺利。

Key.Original: Halfway there, hold on.
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有一半，坚持下。

Container.name: 032_eve_player_lands_plane_call
Container.situation: smuggler tells player to wait while smugglers load their plane with supplies.

Key.Original: Not bad, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: 还行嘛，伙计。

Key.Original: Nice landing...
Key.Chinesesimp: 降落得很漂亮...

Key.Original: Stay put, we gonna load you up.
Key.Chinese: 等一下，讓我們把貨物裝上飛機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呆着别走，我们要装货了。

Container.name: 031_ta_plane_work_offer
Container.situation: smuggler invites player to do some work for l'ensemble.

Key.Original: So, you can fly...
Key.Chinese: 所以，你真的會開飛機呀…
Key.Chinesesimp: 这么说，你能开飞机...

Key.Original: And you cool with the boss-man, eh?
Key.Chinese: 你跟老大關係很好，是吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且你和老大相处不错，对吧？

Key.Original: You wanna make easy money?
Key.Chinesesimp: 想挣点轻松钱吗？

Key.Original: Take this plane, land near Tanouka.
Key.Chinese: 把這架飛機開到塔諾卡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开上这架飞机，在塔诺乌加附近降落。

Key.Original: There will be a runway, east of the Tanoa Sugar Company.
Key.Chinese: 那裡會有跑道，就在塔諾雅製糖公司東邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿有条跑道，在塔诺亚糖业公司东侧。

Key.Original: Our guys have cargo. Collect it and continue to Bala airstrip.
Key.Chinese: 貨物在我們的人的手上，收集它並前往巴拉小機場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 货在我们人手里。取货后再飞到巴拉小机场。

Key.Original: And, that's it. Real simple, right?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样行了吧。够轻松的，对吧？

Container.name: 030_eve_gun_runners
Container.situation: smuggler and pilot argue about landing a plane away from an airstrip.

Key.Original: Nope. It's fucking madness.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行。简直是疯了。

Key.Original: I'm not doing it - I don't care how much Samjo offers.
Key.Chinese: 我不幹；無論山姆卓給多少錢，我都不幹。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不干 - 我才不在乎"山姆卓"给多少钱。

Key.Original: Oh, no - I can land a plane alright. I just can't do it without a runway!
Key.Chinese: 噢，不－－我能讓飛機降落，問題是沒有跑道啊！
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，不 - 我当然能让飞机着陆。可是没有跑道我怎么着陆！

Key.Original: Sure, why not.
Key.Chinesesimp: 没错，当然行。

Key.Original: You say you proper good pilot, mec.
Key.Chinese: 你說你是個不錯的飛行員，夥計。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你说你是个飞行能手，伙计。

Key.Original: But now you say you can't land a plane? Incroyable!
Key.Chinese: 怎麼現在連個飛機都沒辦法降落？太可怕了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 可现在怎么说你不能让飞机着陆？太可怕了！

Key.Original: He's the guy that stole this thing.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是他偷的这架飞机嘛。

Key.Original: Arrête ton char, you got one, Mav'. It's a massive, open field.
Key.Chinese: 快停下來；有了，Mav'。那裡有一大片空地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快停下来，你有跑道，Mav'。那片广阔的田野就是。

Key.Original: Even this old man here could do it!
Key.Chinesesimp: 就算这个老头也做得到！

Key.Original: Pay him to make a smokin' hole, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 给钱让他在地上砸个冒烟的洞，嗯？

Key.Original: Bordel de merde! Okay, fantastique.
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！好吧，太好了。

Container.name: 029_ex_plane_destroyed
Container.situation: boss calls player after receiving a text message that the plane he requested has been destroyed.

Key.Original: So, there a problem with our plane, Képi?
Key.Chinese: 所以，我們的飛機出了點問題。是嗎 ，Képi？
Key.Chinesesimp: 这么来说，我们的飞机出问题了，Képi？

Key.Original: That is a disappointment.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这太让人失望了。

Key.Original: I hope for your sake, there was not a problem with the pilot.
Key.Chinese: 我希望出問題的不是飛行員，這也是為你好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望飞行员不会有问题，这也是为你着想。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble is good to fix problems.
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会很擅长解决问题。

Key.Original: Do not disappoint again. Au revoir.
Key.Chinesesimp: 别再让我失望了。再见。

Container.name: 027_eve_gendarme_bribe_accepted_a
Container.situation: gendarme receives a bribe from player to get airport access.

Key.Original: Mm. Okay...
This looks good. Go on, go through.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不错嘛。走吧，进去。

Container.name: 026_eve_gendarme_bribe
Container.situation: gendarme demands a bribe from player to get airport access.

Key.Original: No way, old man.
Key.Chinesesimp: 没门，老头。

Key.Original: No-one gets in here without a pass.
Key.Chinese: 沒有通行證，誰也別想進來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有通行证谁也别想进来。

Key.Original: Or the money to make me think I saw one, tu comprends ?
Key.Chinese: 或許來些錢，我就會覺得我看到通行證了，懂嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 要不就给钱，我会网开一面，懂吗？

Container.name: 025_ta_plane_delivered_call
Container.situation: boss congratulates player on delivering the stolen plane.

Key.Original: Képi. Excellent.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi。干得漂亮。

Key.Original: Take it to the, er, aire de chargement where the planes refuel.
Key.Chinese: 把它開到，這…飛機加油的裝貨區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把它送到，呃，飞机加油的装货区域。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble see you proper paid, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会保证不亏待你，嗯？

Container.name: 019_ta_get_plane_call
Container.situation: syndikat_boss tells player he needs him to fly a plane.

Key.Original: So, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，Képi。

Key.Original: I been to talk to people.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我和一些人谈过。

Key.Original: Once you have the plane, take it to Bala Airstrip.
Key.Chinese: 到了飛機上後，把它開到巴拉小機場上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞到飞机后，立即把它送到巴拉小机场。

Key.Original: You know planes a little.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你懂开飞机吧。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble want one and pilot also.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 還需要一名飛行員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会需要一架，也需要一个飞行员。

Key.Original: You can help us with both, I think.
Key.Chinese: 我看，這兩件事你都能幫我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想，你能帮我搞定这两件事。

Key.Original: But first, you want an access card.
Key.Chinese: 不過首先，你需要一張鑰匙卡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，首先你得有张门禁卡。

Key.Original: No way you get into airport and fly away without one.
Key.Chinese: 沒有鑰匙卡，就無法進入機場，也不能起飛或降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有它就不能进入机场，也别想飞走。

Key.Original: Bribe the guards or go to Lifou one night...
Key.Chinese: 賄賂警衛或晚上去 Lifou…
Key.Chinesesimp: 贿赂哨兵，或者趁晚上去趟利福...

Key.Original: There is a discothèque. Man who run it, he have a pass.
Key.Chinese: 那裡有個迪斯科舞廳，那裡的老闆有個通行證。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿有个夜总会。里面的老板，他有通行证。

Key.Original: Convince him you need it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 说服他把通行证给你。

Container.name: 018_eve_mechanic_car_ready_c
Container.situation: mechanic lets player know his vehicle has been rigged with explosives.

Key.Original: If gendarmes search your trunk, you do not know me.
Key.Chinese: 要是國家憲兵搜索你的後車廂，可別說你認識我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果宪兵队搜查你的后备箱，可别说你认识我。

Container.name: 017_eve_mechanic_car_ready_b
Container.situation: mechanic lets player know his vehicle has been rigged with explosives.

Key.Original: You're all set.
Key.Chinesesimp: 一切就绪。

Key.Original: Just stay clear of any checkpoints.
Key.Chinesesimp: 避开所有关卡。

Container.name: 016_eve_mechanic_car_ready_a
Container.situation: mechanic lets player know his vehicle has been rigged with explosives.

Key.Original: Remember, don't bump into anything.
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住，要避免碰撞。

Container.name: 015_eve_mechanic_goodbye_c
Container.situation: player leaves a garage.

Key.Original: That it? Okay, take care out there.
Key.Chinese: 就這樣？好，在外頭小心一點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 行了？好吧，一路小心。

Container.name: 014_eve_mechanic_goodbye_b
Container.situation: player leaves a garage.

Key.Original: Alright, see you later.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，回头见。

Container.name: 013_eve_mechanic_goodbye_a
Container.situation: player leaves a garage.

Key.Original: Salut. Stop by again some time, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好。有空再过来，怎么样？

Container.name: 012_eve_mechanic_welcome_c
Container.situation: mechanic welcomes player at a garage.

Key.Original: Hey, good to see you.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，很高兴见到你。

Container.name: 011_eve_mechanic_welcome_b
Container.situation: mechanic welcomes player at a garage.

Key.Original: Salut.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好。

Key.Original: Anything I can help you with today?
Key.Chinese: 我今天能為你做些什麼？
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天要我帮什么忙吗？

Container.name: 010_eve_mechanic_welcome_a
Container.situation: mechanic welcomes player at a garage.

Key.Original: Hey, ça va ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，最近怎么样？

Key.Original: How's it going?
Key.Chinesesimp: 怎么样了？

Container.name: 009_eve_mechanic_car_select_wait_c
Container.situation: mechanic tells player he'll have the car bomb prepped in a few hours.

Key.Original: I'll let you know when you can come and collect it.
Key.Chinese: 修好之後，我會通知你回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到时候，我会通知你过来取车。

Key.Original: Ah, okay.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，好的。

Key.Original: Give me two or three hours.
Key.Chinesesimp: 给我两三个小时。

Container.name: 008_eve_mechanic_car_select_wait_b
Container.situation: mechanic tells player he'll have the car bomb prepped in a few hours.

Key.Original: Très bon.
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。

Key.Original: Leave it with me.
Key.Chinesesimp: 把车交给我吧。

Key.Original: I'll send you a text in a couple of hours.
Key.Chinese: 幾個小時後，我會給你傳個訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 两小时后我会给你发条短信。

Container.name: 007_eve_mechanic_car_select_wait_a
Container.situation: mechanic tells player he'll have the car bomb prepped in a few hours.

Key.Original: That one?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是这辆？

Key.Original: Bien sûr, no problem.
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，没问题。

Key.Original: I'll have it ready in, what? A few hours?
Key.Chinese: 我等下就給你處理好？可能要幾個小時吧?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会给你弄好的，大概嘛，几个小时吧。

Key.Original: You'll get a message on your phone.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的手机会收到一条消息。

Container.name: 006_eve_mechanic_which_car_c
Container.situation: mechanic asks player which car is his.

Key.Original: So, er - what am I working on here?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，嗯 - 我该整哪辆？

Container.name: 005_eve_mechanic_which_car_b
Container.situation: mechanic asks player which car is his.

Key.Original: You wanna show me the vehicle, mec?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你得让我知道你的车是哪辆吧，伙计？

Key.Original: I'd, er, hate to fit the wrong one!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可不想搞错车子！

Container.name: 004_eve_mechanic_which_car_a
Container.situation: mechanic asks player which car is his.

Key.Original: And what do you want me to work on?
Key.Chinesesimp: 想让我修哪辆车？

Container.name: 003_eve_mechanic_rigging_car
Container.situation: mechanic explains to player how the car bomb will work.

Key.Original: Really? You the guy?
Key.Chinesesimp: 真的吗？你来干？

Key.Original: Okay, whatever, mec. I'm done here.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，隨便你，夥計。東西準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，随你怎么说，伙计。我搞定了。

Key.Original: Try not to drive into anything, you gotta cocktail mortel in there. Two artillery shells and a block of C-4 acting as a primer.
Key.Chinese: 別撞倒其他東西了，這裡面可是個致命組合。裡面有兩個砲彈和一塊 C-4 炸藥當作起爆炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开车时一定要避免碰撞，车里的货可不是闹着玩的。两枚炮弹和一大块引爆用的 C4 炸弹。

Key.Original: So, y'know, take it slow.
Key.Chinesesimp: 行了，你懂的，要慢慢来。

Key.Original: I'm gonna send you a number. Change all the fours to sevens and call it as soon as you wanna detonate. Just don't ass dial, eh?
Key.Chinese: 我把號碼傳給你，把四通通改成七，準備好之後，立即撥號引爆它。別不小心誤撥這個號碼了，知道嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会把号码发给你。把所有四改成七，准备引爆时就拨这个号码。千万别误拨，嗯？

Container.name: 002_ta_police_station_destroyed_call
Container.situation: player receives a call from boss, after destroying a police station with a car bomb.

Key.Original: Good work.
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好。

Key.Original: I think our message was persuasive.
Key.Chinese: 我看我們的訊息很有說服力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我觉得我们放出的信息很有说服力。

Key.Original: Money to come soon, Képi, no worry.
Key.Chinese: 錢馬上就會送到，Képi，別擔心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 钱很快就会给你的，Képi，别担心。

Key.Original: And for right price, our mécanicien can always, er, fix your car - give it some extra va-va-boom...
Key.Chinese: 而且，只要價格好，我們的機械師能幫你把車修好，或是給它增添一些馬力…
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且，只要给足了钱，我们的机械师总是能，呃，总是能整好你的车 - 还能让它更带劲...

Container.name: 245_in_black_market_prices_laptop
Container.situation: player has not checked boss's laptop for intel.

Key.Original: And, also, information you not take from laptop.
Key.Chinese: 另外，你還沒從筆記型電腦裡取得的資訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，你没从手提电脑上获取的信息。

Key.Original: I send it to you. Check your phone!
Key.Chinese: 我傳送給你，你看看手機！
Key.Chinesesimp: 我把它发给你吧。查下你的手机！

Container.name: 050_ta_evidence_received
Container.situation: player takes evidence to boss speaker.

Key.Original: Salut, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，Képi。

Key.Original: You do good, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还好吧？

Key.Original: I get our man's ID, he big loss for many fight to come.
Key.Chinese: 我要我們的人的 ID，少了他可真是一大損失。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我拿到我们那人的身份证，少了他可真是一大损失。

Key.Original: I will be in touch.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们再联络。

Container.name: 236_ex_target_destroyed
Container.situation: boss reports that a primary target has been destroyed, disrupting operations.

Key.Original: Too bad somebody stole our thunder.
Key.Chinese: 真可惜，有人搶了我們的功勞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真可惜，有人抢了我们的功劳。

Key.Original: Weeks of planning - and then, boom!
Key.Chinese: 幾週的計畫－－突然，「轟」的一聲！
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个星期的计划 - 然后，烟消云散！

Key.Original: Our target is suddenly destroyed...
Key.Chinese: 我們的目標瞬間被摧毀了……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的目标突然被摧毁了...

Key.Original: The revolution, Képi. It don't need orders no more.
Key.Chinese: 這場革命不再需要命令了，Képi。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这场革命，Képi；这场革命不再需要下命令了。

Key.Original: Every paysan's a guérillero now, eh?
Key.Chinese: 每個 paysan 都是游擊兵了，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在每个农民都是一个游击队员了，嗯？

Key.Original: Ah, anyway, good job with them NVG.
Key.Chinese: 啊，不管怎樣，夜視鏡的事做得漂亮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈，不管怎样，夜视镜的活儿干得漂亮。

Key.Original: If you find guns, bring them to us.
Key.Chinese: 如果你找到槍枝，記得帶給我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你找到枪支，就给我们送过来。

Container.name: 235_ex_syndikat_friendly_fire
Container.situation: boss reprimands player after friendlies are killed.

Key.Original: You dead man.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你死定了。

Key.Original: You dead man, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你死定了，Képi。

Key.Original: Spotter say he see you, shootin' up our own.
Key.Chinese: 有人說，他看見了你射殺自己人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 观察员说他看到你了，在向我们自己人开枪。

Key.Original: Tu es un homme mort...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你死定了...

Container.name: 231_eve_threat_level_safe_syndikat_boss
Container.situation: boss contacts player to let him know he's safe.

Key.Original: Comment ça va, Képi ?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有进展吗，Képi？

Key.Original: Things cool down a little, I think.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我觉得局面缓和一点了。

Container.name: 229_eve_threat_level_warning_syndikat_boss
Container.situation: boss contacts player to let him know it's not safe.

Key.Original: Képi. Salut.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi，你好。

Key.Original: I call to warn you, we to see a lotta movement.
Key.Chinese: 我打電話是要提醒你，我們發現很大的動靜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我打电话是要提醒你，我们发现很大的动静。

Key.Original: CSAT sending out reinforcements some place.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 正在向一些地方派遣援軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协正在向某个地方派遣增援部队。

Key.Original: Maybe good idea you disappear - not make too much attention.
Key.Chinese: 或許你應該消失一下－－別去吸引他們的注意。
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许你最好消失一下 - 不要引起太多注意。

Key.Original: Go to safehouse or jungle, lay low.
Key.Chinese: 快去密屋或叢林裡，避避風頭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快去密屋或丛林里，躲一躲。

Container.name: 227_eve_medicine_available
Container.situation: soldiera tells player where the medical supplies are located.

Key.Original: You here for medicine?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你到这儿来取药的？

Key.Original: Okay - yeah, we expecting you.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的 - 是啊，我们正等着你呢。

Key.Original: It's on the table, in the bunker...
Key.Chinese: 就在碉堡裡面的桌子上……
Key.Chinesesimp: 就在桌子上，地堡里里头...

Container.name: 193_ta_sample_taken_to_van_call
Container.situation: player takes the counteragent to the van, as ordered by boss.

Key.Original: Très bien, Képi blanc.
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好，Képi blanc。

Key.Original: Now, écoute moi. You in big danger.
Key.Chinese: 快，écoute moi。你的處境很危險。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快，écoute moi。你有大危险了。

Key.Original: Your NATO friends, they betray you.
Key.Chinese: 你那些 NATO 的朋友們背叛了你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的北约朋友背叛了你。

Key.Original: After you betray them.
Key.Chinese: 因為你之前出賣了他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为你之前出卖了他们。

Key.Original: Tanoa. It no place for you no more.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅，你不該再待在這裡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚，你不该再呆在这里了。

Key.Original: CSAT know who you are - 'Santiago'.
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协知道你是谁了 -“"圣地亚哥"”。

Key.Original: But L'Ensemble? We don't forget our friends.
Key.Chinese: 至於 L'Ensemble？我們從來不會忘記我們的朋友。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于大帮会，我们从来不会忘记自己的朋友。

Key.Original: There is a petit submersible at the harbor in Tavu.
Key.Chinese: 塔夫的碼頭有一艘小型潛水艇。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在塔夫港口，有一艘小型潜艇。

Key.Original: Take it, use it to escape. Go to La Roche. Go safe. Adieu.
Key.Chinese: 找到它，用它逃走。去 La Roche。注意安全，再見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到它，用它逃走。去拉罗歇。注意安全。再见。

Container.name: 168_eve_syndikat_end_h
Container.situation: boss ends the call to player.

Key.Original: You understand, I think - à bientôt.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你应该懂的，我想 - 回头见。

Container.name: 167_eve_syndikat_end_g
Container.situation: boss reveals he has been monitoring the player's progress and reveals he is holding doctor hostage.

Key.Original: Same for your doctor friend.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的医生朋友也一样。

Key.Original: He will stay with us until you make good.
Key.Chinese: 你在完成我們的要求前，他會待在我們這裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他会和我们呆在一起，直到你把事办成。

Container.name: 166_eve_syndikat_end_f
Container.situation: boss reveals he has been monitoring the player's progress and demands the malaria counteragent.

Key.Original: And, I know you can get us the cure for Jungle Fever.
Key.Chinese: 還有，我知道你能夠為我們取得瘧疾的解藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且，我知道你能为我们搞到疟疾的特效药。

Key.Original: Ah, yes, we know about that.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，是的，这些我们都知道。

Key.Original: There is an abandoned van on Rue de la Corneille, in Georgetown.
Key.Chinese: 喬治鎮裡 Rue de la Corneille 上有一輛廢棄的廂型車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 乔治敦高乃依街有一辆废弃的货车。

Key.Original: Make the drop there, and perhaps we let you live, eh?
Key.Chinese: 把東西放在那裡，這樣我們可能會給你一條生路，知道吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 把东西放在那里，也许我们会给你一条生路，嗯？

Container.name: 165_eve_syndikat_end_e
Container.situation: boss reveals he has been monitoring the player's progress and knows about activity at harcourt.

Key.Original: I know you hacked remote weapons on Tuvanaka...
Key.Chinese: 我知道你黑掉了土萬納卡上的一些遙控武器……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你黑掉了突瓦纳加的一些远程武器...

Container.name: 164_eve_syndikat_end_d
Container.situation: boss reveals he has been monitoring the player's progress and knows about activity at harcourt.

Key.Original: I know you took out CSAT's radar...
Key.Chinese: 我知道你破壞了 CSAT 的雷達……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你干掉了广协的雷达...

Container.name: 163_eve_syndikat_end_c
Container.situation: boss reveals he has been monitoring the player's progress and knows about activity at harcourt.

Key.Original: I know you been in Harcourt. I know you been there, to search...
Key.Chinese: 我知道你去過哈爾科特，我知道你去那裡找東西……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你曾去过哈科特。我知道你去那儿，找东西...

Container.name: 162_eve_syndikat_end_b
Container.situation: boss reveals he has been monitoring the player's progress and knows about the death of miller.

Key.Original: I know you assassiné their agent...
Key.Chinese: 我知道你暗殺了他們的特務……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你暗杀了他们的特务...

Container.name: 161_eve_syndikat_end_a
Container.situation: boss reveals he has been monitoring the player's progress and knows about his work with ctrg.

Key.Original: I know you collaborate with NATO...
Key.Chinese: 我知道你和 NATO 合作……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你在和北约合作...

Container.name: 160_eve_syndikat_end_in_unknown
Container.situation: boss contacts player after the destruction of csat's secret weapons lab.

Key.Original: I am Samjo. I fight for L'Ensemble.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是"山姆卓"，大帮会的人。

Key.Original: You don't know me.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不认识我。

Key.Original: But I, I know you. I know you well.
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是，我非常了解你。

Container.name: 159_eve_syndikat_end_in
Container.situation: boss contacts player after the destruction of csat's secret weapons lab.

Key.Original: Listen close, Képi blanc.
Key.Chinesesimp: 仔细听着，Képi blanc。

Container.name: 158_ta_syndikat_assault_alone
Container.situation: player singehandedly completes the objectives of syndikat's assault.

Key.Original: Bordel de merde !
Key.Chinesesimp: 活见鬼！

Key.Original: You a proper machine de mort, Képi!
Key.Chinese: 你簡直就是一台戰爭機器，Képi！
Key.Chinesesimp: 你简直就是一台死亡机器，Képi！

Key.Original: And all alone, like a one man army!
Key.Chinese: 還是單槍匹馬呢，你一個人就能抵一整支軍隊！
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且孤军作战，你一个人能抵上一整支军队！

Key.Original: Papa France and your Légion, they'd be well proud, eh?
Key.Chinese: 法國和你的軍團都會感到很驕傲的，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 法兰西老爸和你的军团，他们都会感到很骄傲的，嗯？

Key.Original: Go - get out of there, we are done.
Key.Chinesesimp: 走 - 离开这里，我们完事了。

Container.name: 157_eve_syndikat_assault_charge
Container.situation: boss informs player that an explosive charge has been set.

Key.Original: Charge is set. Better you get clear of it, Képi...
Key.Chinese: 炸藥安裝好了，你最好趕快離開，Képi…
Key.Chinesesimp: 炸药装好了。你最好躲远点，Képi...

Container.name: 156_ta_syndikat_assault_success_charge
Container.situation: player successfully participates in syndikat's assault and destroys the main objective.

Key.Original: C'est magnifique.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好极了。

Key.Original: CSAT know now, we are not some paysans, hiding in the jungles, eh?
Key.Chinese: 現在 CSAT 知道了吧，我們可不是躲在叢林裡的 paysan，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在广协明白了，我们可不是缩在丛林里的乡巴佬，对吧？

Key.Original: Go - get out of there, we are done.
Key.Chinesesimp: 走 - 离开这里，我们完事了。

Container.name: 155_am_syndikat_soldier_retreat
Container.situation: soldiera orders his group to withdraw.

Key.Original: Retraite !
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤退！

Key.Original: Ils sont trop nombreux !
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们人太多了！

Container.name: 154_eve_syndikat_assault_fail
Container.situation: boss gives the order to retreat. the assault has failed.

Key.Original: New plan, Képi. Forget the mission. No way we win this one.
Key.Chinese: 新計畫，Képi。別管任務了，我們必輸無疑。
Key.Chinesesimp: 新计划，Képi。别管这次任务了。这任务我们肯定要失败。

Key.Original: Better get off the island. Retreat.
Key.Chinesesimp: 最好离岛。撤退。

Container.name: 153_am_syndikat_soldier_attack
Container.situation: soldiera signals the attack.

Key.Original: Allez, bougez, vive les Horizon !
Key.Chinese: 走吧，開始行動，vive les Horizon！
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们走吧，出发，vive les Horizon！

Container.name: 152_eve_syndikat_assault_begins
Container.situation: boss reports that their attack has begun.

Key.Original: That's it, we go!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了，我们上！

Container.name: 151_in_syndikat_assault_prepare
Container.situation: player is told to get ready for the attack.

Key.Original: Almost time, get ready - 5 minutes. Then, we attack.
Key.Chinese: 時間快到了，準備好了。我們 5 分鐘後展開攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 时候快到了，做好准备 - 5 分钟。然后，展开攻击。

Container.name: 150_eve_at_syndikat_en_route
Container.situation: player is given mission details by soldiera.

Key.Original: Okay, vous connaissez tous le plan, sauf lui ?
Key.Chinese: 好了，除了他以外，大家都知道計畫？
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，除了他，各位都知道这项计划了吧？

Key.Original: Parfait !
Key.Chinesesimp: 好极了！

Key.Original: Hé, papi ! Tu connais la mission ?
Key.Chinese: 嘿，夥計！你知道任務是什麼嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，伙计！你知道这次任务是什么吗？

Key.Original: Our team, it hits the beach, and we move up.
Key.Chinese: 我們的隊伍到達海灘，然後，我們往上走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的队伍，到海滩了，我们前进吧。

Key.Original: A second team are there, waiting in position.
Key.Chinese: 那裡有第二支隊伍在那待命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿有第二支队伍，在那等着呢。

Key.Original: Our objective - two silo. Boss-man. He want 'em gone.
Key.Chinese: 我們的目標是兩個穀倉。老大想要摧毀它們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的目标 - 两个发射井。老大想摧毁它们。

Key.Original: Everybody here got some C-4.
Key.Chinesesimp: 大家都带了些 C-4。

Key.Original: First one in, they prep the charge.
Key.Chinese: 第一批進去的人準備炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第一批进去的人准备炸药。

Key.Original: On the boom-boom, évaporez. Disappear - make your own way back.
Key.Chinese: 轟炸後，蒸發，消失－－然後你自己回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 轰隆一声后，蒸发。消失 - 然后你自己回来。

Key.Original: You got questions - non? Excellent.
Key.Chinesesimp: 有问题吗？没有？很好。

Container.name: 149_eve_at_syndikat_boat
Container.situation: player arrives at the boat for the attack on the depot.

Key.Original: You Samjo's man?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你是"山姆卓"的人？

Key.Original: Putain, you old, mec!
Key.Chinesesimp: Putain，你这老家伙，mec！

Key.Original: D'accord. Get in the boat, we gotta cross the water.
Key.Chinese: D'accord，快上船，我們得到對岸去。
Key.Chinesesimp: D'accord，快上船，我们得到对岸去。

Container.name: 148_ta_syndikat_assault_moved
Container.situation: player arrives for syndikat's operation.

Key.Original: There is change of plan, my men are in Koumac.
Key.Chinese: 計畫有變，我的人在庫馬克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 计划有变，我的人在库马克。

Key.Original: Small problem with boat.
Key.Chinesesimp: 船出了点小问题。

Key.Original: But no worry, we have a dinghy now.
Key.Chinese: 不過別擔心，我們現在有艘小船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但别担心，我们现在有只小划艇。

Key.Original: I will give you their new location.
Key.Chinese: 我會告訴你他們的新位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会告诉你他们的新位置。

Container.name: 147_ta_syndikat_assault_ready
Container.situation: player arrives for syndikat's operation.

Key.Original: Go to the beach, my men are to wait for you there.
Key.Chinese: 到海邊去，我的手下在那裡等你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到海边去，我的手下在那儿等你。

Container.name: 146_ta_syndikat_assault
Container.situation: player arrives for syndikat's operation.

Key.Original: Bonsoir.
Key.Chinesesimp: 晚上好。

Key.Original: You are in Cerebu, I hear.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我听说你在塞热布。

Container.name: 145_ta_syndikat_opertaion_success
Container.situation: boss notifies player that their operation was successful, due to them having the needed equipment.

Key.Original: Képi. The night is ours!
Key.Chinese: Képi，夜晚成了我們的主場啦！
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi，夜晚属于我们！

Key.Original: CSAT just got hit, hard!
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协遭受打击，重创！

Key.Original: They know now, we are not some paysans to hide in the jungles, eh?
Key.Chinese: 現在他們知道了吧，我們可不是躲在叢林裡的 paysan，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在他们知道了吧，我们可不是躲在丛林里的业余选手，对吧？

Container.name: 144_ta_syndikat_operation_fail
Container.situation: boss notifies player that their operation failed, due to them not having the needed equipment.

Key.Original: Képi. The fight is over.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi，战斗结束了。

Key.Original: No NVG, it cost us. Big. Better you don't disappoint me again...
Key.Chinese: 沒有夜視鏡，我們得付出很大的代價。你最好別再讓我失望了……
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有夜视镜，我们得付出代价。很大的代价。你最好别再让我失望了…

Container.name: 143_ta_syndikat_nvgs_done_out
Container.situation: boss reminds player they constantly need weapons.

Key.Original: If you find guns, bring them to us. Equipment too.
Key.Chinese: 如果你找到槍或裝備，把它們通通交給我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你找到枪支，就给我们送过来。装备也一样。

Key.Original: And remember; you want in, we leave Cerebu after sundown. 8:00 p.m.
Key.Chinese: 記得了，你想要加入我們的話，在太陽下山後，我們會去西盧布，晚上 8:00。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住：你想加入，我们日落后离开塞热布。晚上 8:00。

Container.name: 142_ta_syndikat_nvgs_out
Container.situation: boss reminds player they constantly need weapons.

Key.Original: If you find guns, bring them to us. Equipment too.
Key.Chinese: 如果你找到槍或裝備，把它們通通交給我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你找到枪支，就给我们送过来。装备也一样。

Key.Original: La lutte continue.
Key.Chinesesimp: 战斗在继续。

Container.name: 141_ta_syndikat_nvgs_timeout
Container.situation: player fails to bring syndikat the needed equipment in time.

Key.Original: Samjo here.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"山姆卓"。

Key.Original: Time to strike is now, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在该出手了，Képi。

Key.Original: And yet, you fail.
Key.Chinesesimp: 可是，你失败了。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble cannot wait no longer...
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会不能再等了...

Container.name: 140_ta_syndikat_nvgs_done
Container.situation: player brings some needed equipment to a syndikat weapon cache.

Key.Original: It is Samjo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是"山姆卓"。

Key.Original: Bon travail.
Key.Chinesesimp: Bon travail。

Key.Original: I have word.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我收到信息。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble not fight blind.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 不用再盲目戰鬥了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会不瞎着眼作战。

Key.Original: The odds are in our favor now, eh?
Key.Chinese: 現在我們占上風啦，對吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 眼下我们占优势，嗯？

Container.name: 139_ta_syndikat_nvgs_meeting_out
Container.situation: player is tasked with assiting a syndikat operation.

Key.Original: Be in Cerebu, after sundown - eight o'clock.
Key.Chinese: 太陽下山後，到西盧布－－八點鐘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 太阳下山后，到塞热布 - 八点钟。

Key.Original: À plus tard.
Key.Chinesesimp: 回头见。

Container.name: 138_ta_syndikat_nvgs_tomorrow
Container.situation: player is tasked with assiting a syndikat operation.

Key.Original: If you want to join our attack, our men leave tomorrow.
Key.Chinese: 你若想加入我們的突襲，我們的人馬明天出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你想加入我们的进攻行动，我们的人明天离开。

Container.name: 137_ta_syndikat_nvgs_later
Container.situation: player is tasked with assiting a syndikat operation.

Key.Original: If you want to join our attack, our men leave soon.
Key.Chinese: 你若想加入我們的突襲，我們的人馬等下就出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你想加入我们的进攻行动，我们的人很快就离开。

Container.name: 136_ta_syndikat_nvgs
Container.situation: player is tasked with assiting a syndikat operation.

Key.Original: Ah, good, you answer.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，好的，你回答吧。

Key.Original: I have a proposition.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我有个建议。

Key.Original: L'Ensemble want to see in the dark.
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会想在黑暗中看清楚点。

Key.Original: There big fight to come.
Key.Chinesesimp: 一场大战就要来临了。

Key.Original: Get us night vision and I make sure you well rewarded.
Key.Chinese: 你若給我們找些夜視鏡來，我會給你豐厚的獎勵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 给我们夜视镜，我保证不会亏待你的。

Key.Original: Maybe ambush a patrol or steal from a depot, eh?
Key.Chinese: 或許襲擊巡邏隊，或是從倉庫中偷一些來？
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许伏击一支巡逻队或偷仓库，嗯？

Key.Original: CSAT just supplied la gendarmerie.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 剛剛為國家憲兵提供了補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协刚刚为宪兵队运送了补给。

Key.Original: I have sent you intel on the place.
Key.Chinese: 我把此地的情報傳給你了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我向你发送了有关那地方的情报。

Container.name: 169_eve_doctor_meeting
Container.situation: doctor greets player.

Key.Original: Hey, légio.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，légio。

Container.name: 244_ex_virus_upload_fail_new_plan
Container.situation: player fails to upload the virus and miller calls to provide a new approach.

Key.Original: Santiago, we might have a plan B on CSAT's automated weapons.
Key.Chinese: Santiago，我們得用 B 計畫來對付 CSAT 的自動化武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我们可以来个计划 B 来对付广协的自动武器。

Key.Original: Someone, somewhere will be monitoring the security network.
Key.Chinese: 總有人會在監控保全網路。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人会在某个地方监听安防网络。

Key.Original: It's likely they'll be doing so near the lab - and if we find their setup, and get a keycard, we may be able to shut them down, manually...
Key.Chinese: 很可能就在實驗室附近——如果我們能找到他們的設備，然後取得鑰匙卡，或許我們就能手動關掉它們……
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们可能会在实验室附近干这事 - 如果我们找到他们的装置，搞到钥匙卡，我们也许就能关闭它们，手动关闭...

Key.Original: It won't be a cakewalk, I know, but access the right computer, and it's job done. No remote guns.
Key.Chinese: 我知道這並不容易，不過你只要存取正確的電腦就行了。我們就可以解決掉遙控槍砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这可不是件轻而易举的事情，我知道，但只要进入正确的电脑，就大功告成了。远程炮就歇了。

Key.Original: Just keep it in mind, as an option.
Key.Chinese: 只需要記住，這也是一個辦法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记在心里吧，有备无患。

Container.name: 243_ex_first_aid_not_effective
Container.situation: player tries to heal arthur with first aid kit.

Key.Original: Merci, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: Merci, mec。

Key.Original: That - that helps the pain...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这 - 这能减轻疼痛...

Container.name: 242_ex_steals_hat
Container.situation: player steals a hat from a sleeping farmer.

Key.Original: Hey!
Key.Chinesesimp: 喂！

Key.Original: Mon chapeau !
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的帽子！

Container.name: 241_ex_miller_where_are_you_d
Container.situation: miller calls player and asks him where he is. the weapons lab has been destroyed.

Key.Original: Santiago, where are you?
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，你在哪儿？

Key.Original: Hurry the fuck up, we've got to go!
Key.Chinese: 動作他媽的再快一點，我們得走了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 妈的快点，我们得走了！

Container.name: 240_ex_miller_where_are_you_c
Container.situation: miller calls player and asks him where he is.

Key.Original: Santiago, it's Keystone.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我是"基石"。

Key.Original: I'm waiting at our rendezvous point in the jungle. Hurry up.
Key.Chinese: 我正在叢林裡的會和點，動作快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在会合点等你。快点。

Container.name: 239_ex_miller_where_are_you_b
Container.situation: miller calls player and asks him where he is.

Key.Original: Santiago? It's me.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"？是我。

Key.Original: Remember, we're up against the clock on this. Expedite. Find those Network Structure Plans!
Key.Chinese: 記住了，我們時間緊迫。加快速度，找到那些網路架構圖！
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住，这件事我们得争分夺秒。加快速度。找到那些网络结构计划！

Container.name: 238_ex_miller_where_are_you_a
Container.situation: miller calls player and asks him where he is, and encourages him to check his computer.

Key.Original: Santiago, Keystone.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，"基石"。

Key.Original: You want to check your computer...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你要看看你的电脑吗...？

Key.Original: This situation's moving fast, we've got to keep up!
Key.Chinese: 情況瞬息萬變，我們得跟上！
Key.Chinesesimp: 局势发展很快，我们得跟上！

Key.Original: Go and access the intel I sent you.
Key.Chinese: 去看看我發給你的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 去看下我发给你的情报。

Container.name: 237_ex_timeout_traitor
Container.situation: player is assigned a task to destroy the traitor's house.

Key.Original: Képi - bad news.
Key.Chinesesimp: Képi - 有坏消息。

Key.Original: Gendarmes took our comrade into the mangrove swamps.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵把我們的同伴帶到了紅樹林沼澤中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队把我们的同志带到红树林沼泽地里了。

Key.Original: They execute him there.
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们要在那儿处决他。

Key.Original: Hit back and destroy his house.
Key.Chinesesimp: 还击一下，毁掉他的房子。

Container.name: 234_ex_location_change_call
Container.situation: doctor informs player that they have relocated camp and that medical supplies are needed.

Key.Original: Hey, it's Drábek.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，我是 Drábek。

Key.Original: Just so you know, we had to relocate - CSAT were patrolling the jungle and, well...
Key.Chinese: 我想告訴你，我們不得不遷移了－－CSAT 在叢林裡巡邏，所以……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想告诉你，我们得转移了 -广协在森林里巡逻，所以…

Key.Original: Staying put didn't seem like a good idea. I'll send you a message, with our new location.
Key.Chinese: 待在原地似乎不是個好主意。我會給你傳個訊息，告訴你我們的新位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 守在原地似乎不是个好主意。我会给你发消息，告诉我们的新位置。

Key.Original: Also, don't forget, we're in desperate need of medical supplies!
Key.Chinese: 還有，別忘了，我們急需醫療用品！
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，别忘了，我们迫切需要医疗用品！

Key.Original: I've got nothing to work with here.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在这里什么也做不了。

Key.Original: One damp rag and my best intentions aren't going to cut it.
Key.Chinese: 我只有一條濕抹布，什麼也幹不了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我只有一块湿布，都舍不得割破它。

Container.name: 233_ex_vehicle_destroyed
Container.situation: doctor comments on the destruction of the vehicle.

Key.Original: Kurva!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！

Key.Original: You alright? We heard an explosion!
Key.Chinese: 你沒事吧？我聽見了爆炸聲！
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还好吗？我们听到爆炸声！

Key.Original: Talk to me - you okay?
Key.Chinesesimp: 说话啊 - 你没事吧？

Key.Original: Say something, what happened?
Key.Chinesesimp: 回答我，出什么事了？

Key.Original: Key the phone if you can't speak...
Key.Chinese: 你開不了口的話，就按一下按鈕……
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你开不了口，就按一下按键吧...

Key.Original: Are you injured?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你受伤了吗？

Key.Original: Huh? That two beeps for 'no', or...
Key.Chinese: 咦？嗶兩聲表示「沒事」，還是……
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊？滴两声表示“没事”，还有...

Key.Original: Alright, you fucking psycho. Forget about the ride.
Key.Chinese: 好了，你這該死的瘋子。別管車子了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好啊，这该死的疯子。别管车子了。

Key.Original: I guess we'll make our own way out!
Key.Chinese: 我想，我們得自己找出路了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我们会自己想办法的！

Container.name: 232_ta_research_papers
Container.situation: howard tasks player with locating his research papers.

Key.Original: Hey, Légionnaire. How's it looking?
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，Légionnaire。情况怎样？

Key.Original: Not great, right?
Key.Chinesesimp: 不太好，对吧？

Key.Original: And keep the money. It's enough for me to know that eventually, they'll reach a translator.
Key.Chinese: 然後把錢留下。我知道，它們遲早會流傳到一名翻譯手裡，這樣就足夠了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后把钱留下，我知道，它们迟早会流传到一名翻译手里，这样就足够了。

Key.Original: Just, be careful...
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是，记得小心点...

Key.Original: Listen. I'm an archaeologist.
Key.Chinesesimp: 听着，我是个考古学家。

Key.Original: I was researching - researching the indigenous people here.
Key.Chinese: 我正在研究這裡的原住民。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我正在研究这儿的土著居民。

Key.Original: The temple ruins.
Key.Chinesesimp: 就在寺院废墟那里。

Key.Original: We found an inscription, written in a proto-austronesian language.
Key.Chinese: 我找到了一些銘文，上面寫著某種原始的南洋語言。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们发现一则刻文，用古南岛语写的。

Key.Original: There's not many - not many who can read it.
Key.Chinese: 沒有多少人認得這種語言。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没多少 - 没多少人能看懂这种语言。

Key.Original: I'm one of a few...
Key.Chinese: 我就是少數幾個人之一……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我就是少数几个人之一...

Key.Original: Please. Retrieve my notes. They are hidden in an old plane wreck. I can mark it on a map...
Key.Chinese: 拜託了，請取回我的筆記。它們就藏在古老的飛機殘骸中，我可以在你的地圖上做個標記……
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托了，请取回我的笔记。它们藏在一架旧飞机残骸里。我可以在地图把它标出来...

Key.Original: Sell them through the black market.
Key.Chinesesimp: 到黑市把它们卖掉。

Key.Original: The wreckage where I hid my papers. Syndikat used to use it as a weapon stash. There's a -
Key.Chinese: 我藏筆記的地方，Syndikat 以前把那裡當作武器存放點。那裡有個－－
Key.Chinesesimp: 我藏笔记的地方，辛迪加以前把那里当做武器存放点。那里有个 -

Key.Original: There's a mine before you enter the fuselage, don't step on it.
Key.Chinese: 進入機身前，地上埋有個地雷，別踩著了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进机身之前，注意地雷，别踩上了。

Container.name: 230_eve_threat_level_safe_miller
Container.situation: miller contacts player to let him know he's safe.

Key.Original: Hey, it's me, we're still monitoring comms. Seems like things are cooling down a little.
Key.Chinese: 喂，是我，我們還在監控通訊。看來情況緩和了一些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，是我，我们仍在监听通讯。看来事情缓和一点了。

Container.name: 228_eve_threat_level_warning_miller
Container.situation: miller contacts player to let him know it's not safe.

Key.Original: Santiago, it's Keystone, look, word of warning.
Key.Chinese: Santiago，我是 Keystone，聽好了，我要提醒你。
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我是"基石"，听好了，我要提醒你。

Key.Original: My team's picking up reports; somebody's got CSAT all riled up...
Key.Chinese: 我的隊伍收到了報告，有人驚動了 CSAT……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的队伍接到报告：有人把广协惹毛了...

Key.Original: I recommend you keep a low profile.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我建议你保持低调。

Container.name: 226_ta_lucas_rescued
Container.situation: arthur thanks player for rescuing his son, lucas.

Key.Original: It's Artie.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是 Artie。

Key.Original: I got a call from Lucas. Mon ami...
Key.Chinese: 我接到了盧卡斯的電話，Mon ami……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我接到 Lucas 的电话。Mon ami...

Key.Original: He owes you big. I - I owe you big.
Key.Chinese: 他欠你一份人情，我也是。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他欠你个大人情。我 - 我也欠你个大的。

Key.Original: I just wanted to say it: thank you.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想跟你说声谢谢。

Container.name: 225_ta_rescue_lucas
Container.situation: arthur tells player that lucas has been arrested.

Key.Original: Heya, mec...
Key.Chinesesimp: 哎唷，mec...

Key.Original: My son, Lucas - he's been arrested.
Key.Chinese: 我兒子，盧卡斯－－他被逮捕了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我儿子，Lucas - 他被捕了。

Key.Original: Le gamin stupide...
Key.Chinesesimp: 傻小子...

Key.Original: The gendarmes found his explosives.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵找到了他的炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队发现了他的炸药。

Key.Original: They turned him over to CSAT. Look, you gotta do something.
Key.Chinese: 他們把他交給 CSAT。你得想想辦法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们把他交给了广协。你得想想办法。

Key.Original: There's a safe place on the largest of the three Yani islands, near the main airport.
Key.Chinese: 雅尼群島中最大的一座島嶼上有個安全的地方，就在主機場附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 雅尼岛群岛中最大的一座岛屿上有个安全的地方，就在主机场附近。

Key.Original: Please, find him... take him there.
Key.Chinese: 拜託，找到他……然後帶他到那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托你，找到他...把他带到这儿来。

Container.name: 224_eve_smuggler
Container.situation: smuggler warns player to leave the area.

Key.Original: Hey - hey! Sors d'ici! Get the fuck out of here, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 嘿！Sors d'ici！快给我滚，mec。

Container.name: 223_eve_mechanic
Container.situation: mechanic receives intel from player.

Key.Original: Ah, merci.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，merci。

Key.Original: I was expecting you.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在等着你呢。

Key.Original: I will give this to the boss-man...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会把这个交给老大...

Container.name: 222_eve_renly_no_good
Container.situation: renly explains to player that a first aid kit won't help him much.

Key.Original: Non...
On manque de médicaments !
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的药快用完了！

Container.name: 221_eve_lucas_no_good
Container.situation: lucas explains to player that a first aid kit won't help him much.

Key.Original: Je vous remercie.
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢你。

Key.Original: But it's no good.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过没什么用。

Key.Original: Nous avons besoin de médicaments...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要药品...

Container.name: 220_eve_jean_no_good
Container.situation: jean explains to player that a first aid kit won't help him much.

Key.Original: Merci - merci, mais, j'ai besoin de médicaments...
Key.Chinese: 謝謝你－－謝謝你，可是我需要藥品……
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢 - 谢谢你，不过，我需要药品...

Container.name: 219_eve_howard_no_good
Container.situation: howard explains to player that a first aid kit won't help him much.

Key.Original: Thanks...
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢了...

Key.Original: But, we need drugs.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，我们需要药物。

Container.name: 218_eve_doctor_captured_call
Container.situation: doctor is captured during phone call with player.

Key.Original: Légio? Drábek.
Key.Chinesesimp: Légio？是 Drábek。

Key.Original: There's some guys with guns here...
Key.Chinese: 這裡有些帶著槍的傢伙……
Key.Chinesesimp: 这儿有些家伙拿着枪...

Key.Original: They're pulling apart the camp, and I don't -
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们把营地打乱了，我 -

Key.Original: Stop shooting!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别开枪了！

Key.Original: These people, they're sick!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些家伙，他们有病！

Key.Original: Personnes malades - do you understand?
Key.Chinesesimp: Personnes malades - 你懂吗？

Container.name: 217_in_doctor_report_d_out
Container.situation: doctor concludes his report.

Key.Original: So, er, yeah. Basically. Situation, it's not great.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，是啊，大致來說，情況不太樂觀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那么，哎，是啊，基本上吧。情况不太乐观。

Key.Original: I'll call back if things get worse.
Key.Chinese: 如果情況惡化，我會告訴你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果事情恶化，我会告诉你。

Container.name: 216_in_doctor_report_c_out
Container.situation: doctor concludes his report.

Key.Original: And, yeah, that's it - I'll let you know if anything changes...
Key.Chinese: 嗯，就這樣－－有什麼變化我會通知你……
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，嗯，就这样 - 有什么变化我会通知你...

Container.name: 215_in_doctor_report_b_out
Container.situation: doctor concludes his report.

Key.Original: And, well...
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且，这个嘛...

Key.Original: I'll call again if there's any more developments.
Key.Chinese: 有進展的話我會通知你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有进展我会通知你的。

Container.name: 214_in_doctor_report_a_out
Container.situation: doctor concludes his report.

Key.Original: But, er, that's all I have for now.
Key.Chinese: 可是，我手上就剩這些了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可是，哎，我现在只剩这些了。

Container.name: 213_in_doctor_report_drugs_running_low
Container.situation: doctor tells player he is out of medical supplies.

Key.Original: I'm running low on medicine...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没多少药了...

Container.name: 212_in_doctor_report_drugs_running_out
Container.situation: doctor tells player he is out of medical supplies.

Key.Original: I'm almost out of medical supplies.
Key.Chinese: 我的醫療用品快耗盡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的医疗用品快用完了。

Container.name: 211_in_doctor_report_drugs_out
Container.situation: doctor tells player he is out of medical supplies.

Key.Original: I've got no drugs...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我手上没药物了...

Container.name: 210_in_doctor_report_dying_f
Container.situation: doctor tells player that people are dying.

Key.Original: There's a number of people dying...
Key.Chinesesimp: 很多人快死了...

Container.name: 209_in_doctor_report_dying_e
Container.situation: doctor tells player that renly is getting worse.

Key.Original: There's a guy dying...
Key.Chinesesimp: 有个伙计快死了...

Container.name: 208_in_doctor_report_dying_d
Container.situation: doctor tells player that jean is getting worse.

Key.Original: One guy is in a critical condition.
Key.Chinesesimp: 又一个人病危了。

Container.name: 207_in_doctor_report_dying_c
Container.situation: doctor tells player that howard is getting worse.

Key.Original: Howard's situation's deteriorating.
Key.Chinese: 霍華德的病情正在惡化。
Key.Chinesesimp: Howard 的病情在恶化。

Container.name: 206_in_doctor_report_dying_b
Container.situation: doctor tells player that lucas is getting worse.

Key.Original: Lucas isn't doing well...
Key.Chinesesimp: Lucas 情况很糟糕...

Container.name: 205_in_doctor_arthur_dying_a
Container.situation: doctor tells player that arthur is getting worse.

Key.Original: Arthur's in bad shape...
Key.Chinesesimp: Arthur 状况不妙...

Container.name: 204_in_doctor_report_casualties
Container.situation: doctor tells player several people have died.

Key.Original: Several people are dead.
Key.Chinesesimp: 死了几个人。

Container.name: 203_in_doctor_report_casuality_e
Container.situation: doctor tells player that renly died.

Key.Original: Our so-called 'malaria' has claimed someone else...
Key.Chinese: 我們的這種「瘧疾」又奪走了一條性命……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们所谓的“疟疾”又夺去了一位...

Container.name: 202_in_doctor_report_casuality_d
Container.situation: doctor tells player that jean died.

Key.Original: I'm afraid I just lost a patient...
Key.Chinese: 恐怕我又失去了一名病患……
Key.Chinesesimp: 恐怕我又失去了一位病患...

Container.name: 201_in_doctor_report_casuality_c
Container.situation: doctor tells player that howard died.

Key.Original: Howard's gone - he's dead...
Key.Chinesesimp: Howard 也死了...

Container.name: 200_in_doctor_report_casuality_b
Container.situation: doctor tells player that lucas died.

Key.Original: Bad news. Lucas is dead...
Key.Chinesesimp: 坏消息。Lucas 死了...

Container.name: 199_in_doctor_report_casuality_a
Container.situation: doctor tells player that arthur died.

Key.Original: No easy way to say this.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不知该如何开口。

Key.Original: It's Arthur. He didn't make it...
Key.Chinesesimp: 是 Arthur，他没撑过来...

Container.name: 198_in_doctor_report_d
Container.situation: doctor calls player to give him a report.

Key.Original: Légio. Drábek here.
Key.Chinesesimp: Légio。是我， Drábek。

Container.name: 197_in_doctor_report_c
Container.situation: doctor calls player to give him a report.

Key.Original: Hey, listen.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，听着。

Container.name: 196_in_doctor_report_b
Container.situation: doctor calls player to give him a report.

Key.Original: Hi, it's me.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨，是我。

Container.name: 195_in_doctor_report_a
Container.situation: doctor calls player to give him a report.

Key.Original: Hey, udpate.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你听好。

Container.name: 194_eve_doctor_goodbye
Container.situation: doctor bids player farewell.

Key.Original: And, bonne chance!
Key.Chinesesimp: 另外，祝你好运！

Container.name: 192_eve_doctor_set_free
Container.situation: doctor receives the sample for the 'malaria' counteragent from player.

Key.Original: You got the counteragent.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你找到解药了。

Key.Original: Ježiš Marja!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天啊...

Key.Original: Let's hope it works, huh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望它有效，嗯？

Key.Original: You need to go. Syndikat - L'Ensemble, every thug on the Horizon Islands will be gunning for you now.
Key.Chinese: 你得離開了。Syndikat、L'Ensemble，Horizon 島上的所有流氓現在都會來找你的麻煩。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你得走了。辛迪加 - 大帮会，现在地平线岛上的每个匪徒都会追杀你了。

Key.Original: But look, I think I may know a way.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过嘛，我想我可能有个办法。

Key.Original: The guards, they were talking about CSAT using a 'petit submersible'...
Key.Chinese: 那些警衛提到，CSAT 在用某種「小型潛水艇」……
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些卫兵提到，广协在用一艘“小型潜艇”...

Key.Original: A small submarine, at the harbor in Tavu. It's on the map.
Key.Chinese: 小型潛水艇就在塔夫的碼頭。在地圖上有標記。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一艘小型潜艇，在塔夫的港口那儿，在地图上有标记。

Key.Original: It won't be easy, but you could use it to escape.
Key.Chinese: 這並不容易，不過你能夠用它逃走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没那么容易，但你可以用它逃走。

Key.Original: Get all the way to La Roche, maybe?
Key.Chinese: 快趕去 La Roche 吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 快赶去拉罗歇吧？

Container.name: 191_eve_doctor_get_the_key
Container.situation: doctor calls for help from within a locked building.

Key.Original: Hey!
Key.Chinesesimp: 喂！

Key.Original: Someone out there?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿有人吗？

Key.Original: The door is locked...
Key.Chinesesimp: 门锁住了...

Key.Original: One of the guards, he's got a black beret. He has the key!
Key.Chinese: 有一個警衛，戴著一頂黑色的貝雷帽。他有鑰匙！
Key.Chinesesimp: 其中一个卫兵，戴黑色贝雷帽的。他有钥匙！

Container.name: 190_eve_doctor_set_free_safe
Container.situation: player frees the captive doctor, after having dealt with some remaining guards.

Key.Original: We good?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的人还好吧？

Key.Original: Alright...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...

Container.name: 189_eve_doctor_set_free_danger
Container.situation: player frees the captive doctor, but there are still enemy soldiers closeby.

Key.Original: Légio!
Key.Chinesesimp: légio！

Key.Original: This a rescue?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你来救我的吗？

Key.Original: Better make sure it's safe, there's sick people here...
Key.Chinese: 確保安全，這裡還有病患呢……
Key.Chinesesimp: 最好能保证安全，这儿还有病人呢...

Container.name: 188_eve_doctor_set_free_in
Container.situation: player frees the captive doctor.

Key.Original: Légio!
Key.Chinesesimp: légio！

Key.Original: I'll say this, you don't disappoint.
Key.Chinese: 我就說嘛，你不會讓我失望的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我就说嘛，你不会让我失望的。

Container.name: 187_ta_vehicle_required
Container.situation: player is tasked by doctor to find transportation for his sick patients.

Key.Original: More important right now is we find ourselves a large truck.
Key.Chinese: 現在最重要的是，我們得去找一輛大卡車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 眼下更重要的是找辆大卡车。

Key.Original: Yeah. I think we ought to relocate.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。我想我们得转移了。

Key.Original: A military drone keeps flying over.
Key.Chinese: 軍事無人機不斷飛過此地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一架军用无人机总是飞来飞去。

Key.Original: Could be nothing but, people asking awkward questions tend to disappear out here, in the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 可能沒什麼，但是在叢林裡，很多提出奇怪問題的人往往會憑空消失。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可能没什么，但是在丛林里，很多提出奇怪问题的人往往凭空消失。

Key.Original: I don't want us to be amongst them.
Key.Chinese: 我可不想落得這樣的下場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我可不想落得如此下场。

Container.name: 186_eve_medicine_received
Container.situation: doctor thanks player for bringing in some medical supplies. he urges player to gather intel on csat.

Key.Original: Great. That should help.
Key.Chinese: 太好了，這應該會有幫助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好极了。那应该有用的。

Key.Original: I wished I could say it would solve our problems but, like I said, it's not real malaria.
Key.Chinese: 真希望這能夠解決我們的問題，不過我剛剛說了，這並不是真正的瘧疾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 希望我能说这可以解决我们的问题，不过我刚刚说了，这不是真正的疟疾。

Key.Original: Rumor is, CSAT were up to something in Luganville on the same night the outbreak hit.
Key.Chinese: 聽說，疫情爆發當晚 CSAT 在盧甘村有活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听说， 在疫情爆发的当晚广协在卢甘威尔有活动。

Key.Original: If they are responsible, there is a chance they have a cure.
Key.Chinese: 如果這是他們幹的，他們或許有解藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果这是他们干的，他们可能就有治愈的方法。

Key.Original: Or, if not that, maybe a vaccine or something, I don't know...
Key.Chinese: 就算沒有，他們可能也會有疫苗什麼的。我也不確定……
Key.Chinesesimp: 要么，如果没有，也可能会有疫苗或什么的，我不确定...

Container.name: 185_ex_doctor_medicine_reminder_b
Container.situation: doctor reminds player in person that he still requires medical supplies.

Key.Original: Any joy, légio?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有眉目了吗？légio？

Key.Original: These people still need medication.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些人需要药物治疗。

Container.name: 184_eve_doctor_medicine_reminder_a
Container.situation: doctor reminds player that he still requires medical supplies.

Key.Original: Heya, any luck with those supplies?
Key.Chinesesimp: 唉，那些物资有点眉目了吗？

Key.Original: Look, there may be an easier option for you.
Key.Chinese: 聽著，這裡可能有個更簡單的方式。
Key.Chinesesimp: 瞧，这里可能有个更容易的法子。

Key.Original: I made some calls. Apparently, IDAP lost a truckload of aid.
Key.Chinese: 我打了幾通電話，看來 IDAP 遺失了一卡車的補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我打了几次电话。看来 IDAP 损失了一卡车的救援物资。

Key.Original: Including, quirine and other drugs.
Key.Chinese: 裡面包含奎寧和其他藥物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 包括，奎宁和其他药品。

Key.Original: The driver was a local, so L'Ensemble might have paid him off.
Key.Chinese: 司機是本地人，可能是收了 L'Ensemble 的錢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 司机是当地人，可能收了大帮会的钱。

Key.Original: Could be an idea to check the black market for our medicine.
Key.Chinese: 我想，去黑市找找我們的藥品吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还是到黑市去看看有没有我们找的药品吧。

Container.name: 183_eve_doctor_leaves_tanoa
Container.situation: all the doctor's patients are dead. doctor explains to player he is leaving the island.

Key.Original: Hey, légio...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，légio...

Key.Original: Things are not looking so good here.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里情况有点不妙。

Key.Original: I'm not sure there's much I can do.
Key.Chinese: 我不知道我還能做些什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我没把握能帮上什么大忙。

Key.Original: Everybody's dead.
Key.Chinesesimp: 大家都死了。

Key.Original: I'm heading down to Georgetown, and getting on a boat back to La Roche.
Key.Chinese: 我要去喬治鎮，然後乘船回 La Roche。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我正在前往乔治敦，准备搭船返回拉罗歇。

Key.Original: I suggest you do the same, mon ami.
Key.Chinese: 我建議你也這麼做，mon ami。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我建议你也这么做，mon ami。

Container.name: 182_eve_location_change
Container.situation: doctor informs player that they have relocated camp and that medical supplies are still needed.

Key.Original: Hi - it's Drábek.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗨 - 我是 Drábek。

Key.Original: Our little operation was a success.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的小任务成功了。

Key.Original: Thanks again for getting us a ride.
Key.Chinesesimp: 再次感谢你让我们搭便车。

Key.Original: I've just sent an SMS with our location. Medicine though, is still a problem.
Key.Chinese: 我們剛剛傳送了一封包含我們位置的簡訊，不過，藥品仍然是個問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我刚发了条短信，告诉我们的位置。不过药物仍然是个问题。

Key.Original: I could really use more of what you found before.
Key.Chinese: 我需要更多你之前找到的那些東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你之前送来的那些东西再给我搞一些吧。

Key.Original: I know you'll do what you can. Bye.
Key.Chinese: 我知道你會盡力幫忙的，掰掰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道你会尽力的。再见。

Container.name: 181_ta_vehicle_received
Container.situation: doctor asks player not to drive their vehicle into the jungle.

Key.Original: So the owner, they didn't mind you, er, loaning it, eh?
Key.Chinese: 這些東西的主人不介意你……來「借」這些東西嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 那车主，他们没介意你，呃，把车借出去吗？

Key.Original: Okay - we'll decamp tomorrow night.
Key.Chinese: 好了－－我們明天晚上拔營。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的 - 我们明天晚上撤营。

Key.Original: I'll let you know where to find us.
Key.Chinese: 我會告訴你到哪裡去找我們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会告诉你可以在哪儿找到我们的。

Container.name: 180_ta_vehicle_instructions
Container.situation: doctor thanks player for delivering a vehicle.

Key.Original: Hey, that you coming our way?
Key.Chinese: 嘿，是你朝著我們趕來嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，你朝我们这边过来了吗？

Key.Original: Looks like you really came through!
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来你真的成功了！

Key.Original: Park somewhere nearby, in the open.
Key.Chinese: 把車子停在附近的空地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把车停在附近的空地。

Container.name: 179_eve_doctor_medicine_out
Container.situation: doctor tells player he has to leave after arranging the meet with syndikat_boss.

Key.Original: I got to go, I got patients - we're hiding out in the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 我得走了，我還有病患呢－－我們就躲在叢林裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得走了，我还有病人呢 - 我们就躲在丛林里。

Key.Original: Just, remember what I said: we must have those supplies soon...
Key.Chinese: 記得我剛剛說的話：我們需要趕快取得這些物資……
Key.Chinesesimp: 记得我刚刚说的话：我们得快点搞到那些物资...

Container.name: 178_eve_doctor_medicine_lucas_arrested
Container.situation: doctor informs player that lucas has been arrested.

Key.Original: But be discreet.
Key.Chinesesimp: 但要低调一点。

Key.Original: CSAT found some C-4 on a local kid.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 在一個當地孩子身上找到了 C-4。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协在当地一个小孩身上找到一些 C-4。

Key.Original: They're practically taking vehicles apart at checkpoints now.
Key.Chinese: 他們在哨站檢查車輛時非常仔細，好像巴不得把車子給拆了一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在他们在关卡查车巴不得把车给拆了。

Key.Original: Might be wise not to get dragged into anything too stupid - alright?
Key.Chinese: 或許，沒事的話，別去牽扯什麼亂七八糟的事，好嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 也许得放聪明点，别卷入任何蠢事 - 对吧？

Container.name: 177_eve_doctor_medicine
Container.situation: doctor asks after the medical supplies he needs.

Key.Original: It's Luganville.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是卢甘威尔。

Key.Original: People have started getting sick...
Key.Chinesesimp: 人们开始发病了...

Key.Original: And not the cheap chloroquine shit.
Key.Chinese: 那些廉價的氯喹沒有用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些廉价的氯奎垃圾没有效。

Key.Original: I need primaquine, and antibiotics.
Key.Chinese: 我需要伯氨喹和抗生素。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我需要伯氨喹，还有抗生素。

Key.Original: The first calls came in last night.
Key.Chinese: 昨晚出現了第一個病例。
Key.Chinesesimp: 昨晚出现了第一批病例。

Key.Original: Since then, half the village has been infected.
Key.Chinese: 現在，半個村落都被感染了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，半个村落被感染了。

Key.Original: There are mosquitoes, but the salient symptom; it's not malarial.
Key.Chinese: 雖然有蚊蟲，但如此明顯的症狀並非瘧疾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然有蚊子，但症状明显不是疟疾。

Key.Original: In every case, I've seen significant ulceration of the skin.
Key.Chinese: 我看到的所有病例都有嚴重的皮膚潰瘍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在每个病例中，我都发现了严重的皮肤溃疡。

Key.Original: Almost like an allergic reaction...
Key.Chinesesimp: 几乎和过敏反应一个样...

Key.Original: Anyway, thing is, I can't treat it.
Key.Chinese: 重點是，我根本束手無策。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管怎么说，问题是，我根本束手无策啊。

Key.Original: I need medicine.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我需要药物。

Key.Original: Proper medicine.
Key.Chinesesimp: 对症的药物。

Key.Original: You know the plantation, just south of the old temple ruins?
Key.Chinese: 你知道老神殿遺跡南方的農園嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道旧寺院废墟南边的种植园吗？

Key.Original: There's a way we can contact someone there - someone, connected.
Key.Chinese: 我們能夠和那裡的人聯絡－－那裡有個很有人脈的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们能够和那里的人联络 - 那里有个很有人脉的人。

Key.Original: But, it's a, er...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，那是，呃...

Key.Original: Quid pro quo kind of setup, and out my comfort zone.
Key.Chinese: 這種交易行為我不太拿手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这种讲条件的交易我不太拿手。

Key.Original: If you could talk to him, maybe you can make a deal?
Key.Chinese: 你能夠跟他談談嗎？或許跟他做個交易？
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你能和他谈谈，也许能谈成吧？

Container.name: 176_eve_doctor_medicine_not_home
Container.situation: doctor asks after the medical supplies he needs.

Key.Original: I tried your house, but you weren't at home...
Key.Chinese: 我打到你家，但是你不在家……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我去了你家，但你不在...

Container.name: 175_eve_doctor_medicine_in
Container.situation: doctor asks after the medical supplies he needs.

Key.Original: Hey - situation.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 有情况。

Container.name: 174_eve_doctor_csat
Container.situation: doctor explains to player that csat activities may be responsible for the malaria outbreak.

Key.Original: I know, don't say it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道，不用你说。

Key.Original: I look like shit, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看上去很糟，是吧？

Key.Original: CSAT are treating it like any other outbreak.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 的治療方式跟其他的疫情一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协的治疗方式跟其他疫情一样。

Key.Original: I mean, make of that what you will.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，随你怎么想了。

Key.Original: Yeah, well. No sleep.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，嗯，整晚没睡。

Key.Original: All the coughing and night runs and deals for artesunate...
Key.Chinese: 整天咳個不停、晚上得跑腿，然後還得去買青蒿琥酯……
Key.Chinesesimp: 咳个不停，晚上得跑腿，还得去买青蒿琥酯...

Key.Original: Oh, and the research!
Key.Chinesesimp: 哦，还有研究任务呢！

Key.Original: They talk about malaria - but this?
Key.Chinese: 他們說的是瘧疾，不過這個？
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们说的是疟疾 - 但这个呢？

Key.Original: This is inexplicable.
Key.Chinesesimp: 这真是不可思议。

Key.Original: There's parasitic protozoans but no plasmodia!
Key.Chinese: 有寄生原生生物，但是沒有瘧原蟲！
Key.Chinesesimp: 有寄生原虫，但没有疟原虫！

Key.Original: No evidence for a logical mutation!
Key.Chinese: 這樣的突變根本不合邏輯！
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样的突变根本不合逻辑！

Key.Original: And you know what's really strange?
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且你知道真正奇怪的事情是什么吗？

Key.Original: But me? I'm getting pretty nervous!
Key.Chinesesimp: 可是我呢？我是坐立不安！

Container.name: 173_eve_doctor_knocking_at_door_delay_c_spec
Container.situation: doctor continues to call to player from outside his house.

Key.Original: Come on, we need to talk!
Key.Chinesesimp: 行了，我们需要谈一谈！

Container.name: 172_eve_doctor_knocking_at_door_delay_b_spec
Container.situation: doctor continues to call to player from outside his house.

Key.Original: Hello? Anybody home?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人吗？有人在吗？

Container.name: 171_eve_doctor_knocking_at_door_delay_a_spec
Container.situation: doctor continues to call to player from outside his house.

Key.Original: Légio!
Key.Chinesesimp: légio！

Container.name: 170_eve_doctor_knocking_at_door_spec
Container.situation: doctor calls to player from outside his house.

Key.Original: Légio!
Key.Chinesesimp: légio！

Key.Original: Légionnaire, open up!
Key.Chinesesimp: Légionnaire，开门！

Key.Original: It's me, Dr. Drábek!
Key.Chinesesimp: 是我，Drábek 医生！

Container.name: 135_eve_escape_departure
Container.situation: miller leaves tanoa with player.

Key.Original: Okay, we good?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，好了吗？

Key.Original: Then masks on, let's go. Proteus is pumping dry and on the hover.
Key.Chinese: 把面罩戴上，我們走吧。普羅提斯號正在排水與懸浮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把面罩戴上，我们走吧。普罗提斯号正在排干艇库，在水下悬浮。

Container.name: 134_eve_escape_on_beach_diving_gear
Container.situation: miller and player reach a beach where a some swimmer delivery vehicles are waiting. player does not have any diving gear.

Key.Original: Santiago, we're going under, grab a rebreather.
Key.Chinese: Santiago，我們要下潛了，準備好呼吸器。
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我们下潜了，拿个水下呼吸器。

Container.name: 133_eve_escape_on_beach
Container.situation: miller and player reach a beach where a some swimmer delivery vehicles are waiting. player has diving gear.

Key.Original: Into the mini sub, move!
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入迷你潜艇，快！

Container.name: 132_eve_miller_angry
Container.situation: player does not leave the area after miller tells them they are on their own.

Key.Original: You still got something you want to say, old man?
Key.Chinese: 你難道有什麼意見，老頭？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还有什么话要说吗？老头儿？

Container.name: 131_eve_miller_threatened_continued
Container.situation: player puts down his weapon.

Key.Original: Okay. Now leave it there - and fuck off, you're on your own...
Key.Chinese: 好，把它留在那－－給我滾，我不會再幫你了……
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧。现在可以走了 - 滚吧，你自由了...

Container.name: 130_eve_miller_attacks
Container.situation: miller attacks player.

Key.Original: Alright. You know what, old man...?
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。老头，知道吧...？

Container.name: 129_eve_miller_drop_the_gun
Container.situation: miller tells player to drop his weapon.

Key.Original: Put that gun on the ground or I'll drop you where you stand!
Key.Chinese: 把槍放在地上，不然我就把你當場槍斃！
Key.Chinesesimp: 把枪放到地上，要不我会就地毙了你！

Container.name: 128_eve_miller_threatened
Container.situation: player points his weapon at miller.

Key.Original: Hey, lower that gun...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，把枪放下...

Container.name: 127_ta_escape_rv_a
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: The mission's over, we were able to find a sample for a cure. But, it's just that: a sample.
Key.Chinese: 任務結束了，我們找到了解藥的樣本，不過這僅僅是樣本而已。
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成了，我们设法找到了特效药的样本。不过，只是一份样本。

Key.Original: Bottom line is, we just can't spare any to help the people here.
Key.Chinese: 底線是，我們不能分配人手來幫助這裡的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 要命的是，我们不能腾出手来帮这儿的人们了。

Container.name: 126_ta_escape_rv_resumed
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: Alright, that's better. So. Anyway.
Key.Chinese: 好了，不管怎麼樣，這樣好多了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吗，那样更好。就这样。无论如何。

Container.name: 125_ta_escape_rv_malaria_info_h
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: Come on. I got you a way out, we've got to go. Now!
Key.Chinese: 走吧。我給你準備了出路。我們必須趕快離開！
Key.Chinesesimp: 行了。我给你们找到一条出路，我们得动身了。快！

Container.name: 124_ta_escape_rv_malaria_info_e
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: The long game's the only thing that matters, we have to have a solution for the future.
Key.Chinese: 重要的是長遠之計，我們必須為未來著想。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长远打算是关键，我们要为未来找到解决办法。

Container.name: 123_ta_escape_rv_malaria_info_d
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: There is no point giving up what we have to save so few.
Key.Chinese: 我們怎麼能為了就這區區幾個人而放棄這一切。
Key.Chinesesimp: 眼下救不了几个人就放弃可不好。

Container.name: 122_ta_escape_rv_malaria_info_c
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: Try to focus on the bigger picture!
Key.Chinesesimp: 要把眼光放大点！

Container.name: 121_ta_escape_rv_malaria_info_b
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: You disagree.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不同意。

Container.name: 120_ta_escape_rv_malaria_info_a
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab. miller explains his mission.

Key.Original: There isn't any time to explain...
Key.Chinesesimp: 没时间解释...

Key.Original: CSAT are responsible for the malaria epidemic. It's part of a covert, biogenetic weapons program.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 是瘧疾爆發的幕後黑手，他們正在進行一次機密的生物基因武器計畫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是广协制造了虐疾疫情。它是一项秘密生物基因武器项目的一部分。

Key.Original: Good news is, we got a sample for a counteragent.
Key.Chinese: 好消息是，我們取得了解藥的樣本。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好消息是，我们搞到了解药的样本。

Key.Original: But, it's just that: a sample. It's not enough to help the people here.
Key.Chinese: 不過，問題是，這只是樣本而已，它並不足以幫助這裡的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，也只是一份样本。这不足以帮这儿的人们解决问题。

Container.name: 119_ta_escape_rv_in
Container.situation: player meets miller after the destruction of csat's weapons lab.

Key.Original: Santiago, good.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，好的。

Container.name: 118_ta_lab_destroyed_call
Container.situation: miller contacts player and responds to the destruction of the weapon's lab.

Key.Original: That was one hell of a distraction!
Key.Chinese: 那真是一場非常不錯的干擾！
Key.Chinesesimp: 那可是天大的干扰！

Key.Original: My team are moving in, we'll try to get the counteragent.
Key.Chinese: 我的隊伍正在進軍，我們會試圖取得解藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的队伍正在行进，我们会设法搞到解药。

Key.Original: Head for the island of Sainte-Marie. I'll link-up with you there.
Key.Chinese: 前往聖瑪莉島。我會在那裡與你聯繫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往圣玛丽岛。我会在那儿与你会合。

Container.name: 117_ta_lab_destroyed_not_known_call
Container.situation: miller contacts player and responds to the destruction of the weapon's lab. miller is unaware of it.

Key.Original: Things just kicked off on Tuvanaka! That anything to do with you?
Key.Chinese: 土萬納卡出事了！那是你幹的嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 突瓦纳加的行动开始了！那和你有什么关系吗？

Key.Original: My team's moving in, using the chaos as a distraction. Our mission here is almost done.
Key.Chinese: 我的隊伍正用混亂當作掩護逐步在逼近。我們的任務就快完成了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的队伍在行进，利用混乱分散注意力。我们这儿的任务就要完成了。

Key.Original: Head for the island of Sainte-Marie. I'll link-up with you there!
Key.Chinese: 前往聖瑪莉島。我會在那裡與你聯繫！
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往圣玛丽岛。我会在那儿与你会合！

Container.name: 116_ta_lab_destroyed_in_call
Container.situation: miller contacts player and responds to the destruction of the weapon's lab.

Key.Original: Santiago - update!
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"- 最新消息！

Container.name: 115_ta_all_radar_sites_destroyed_call
Container.situation: miller confirms that all radar sites have been destroyed.

Key.Original: Santiago, we're picking up a lot of chatter over here!
Key.Chinese: Santiago，我們在那裡收到了很多訊號！
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我们这截获了大量通话！

Key.Original: Enemy radar's out.
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军雷达挂了。

Key.Original: Those missile sites aren't going to be a problem anymore.
Key.Chinese: 那些導彈不會再構成威脅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些导弹阵地不再算个事了。

Key.Original: Just, keep in mind, we're running a cloak and dagger op here.
Key.Chinese: 記住了，我們這可是機密任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只是，要记住，我们在这儿进行一场秘密行动。

Key.Original: Even if we had a clear run, I can't go calling in airstrikes.
Key.Chinese: 即便沒有防禦，我也不能夠呼叫空襲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 即使我们做得到，我也不能呼叫空袭。

Key.Original: Though, options are always welcome.
Key.Chinese: 不過，有得選擇當然是好事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，有选择总是不错的。

Container.name: 114_eve_radar_station_out_call
Container.situation: miller responds to player's destruction of a radar site.

Key.Original: I guess that's your handiwork?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想这是你的杰作？

Key.Original: I'm impressed! Keep it up. The more chaos we can make, the better.
Key.Chinese: 了不起！再接再厲，我們造成越多混亂越好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 佩服！继续努力。制造的乱子越多越好。

Container.name: 113_eve_second_radar_destroyed_call
Container.situation: miller responds to player's destruction of a secondary radar site.

Key.Original: One of my guys just confirmed CSAT's mobile radar station's down!
Key.Chinese: 我的人剛剛確認了 CSAT 的機動雷達站關閉了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的一个伙计刚刚确认广协的移动雷达站挂了！

Container.name: 112_eve_main_radar_destroyed_call
Container.situation: miller responds to player's destruction of a key radar site, at the inactive volcano.

Key.Original: One of my guys just confirmed CSAT's main radar station's down!
Key.Chinese: 我的人剛剛確認了 CSAT 的主雷達站關閉了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的一个伙计刚刚确认广协的主雷达站挂了！

Container.name: 111_eve_radar_destroyed_in_call
Container.situation: miller responds to player's destruction of a radar site.

Key.Original: Santiago, Keystone.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，"基石"。

Container.name: 110_ta_second_radar_found_main_call
Container.situation: player sees secondary radar site and sends an sms to miller. miller explains to player the threat of aa on the island and asks him to help take down the radar. there is also a primary radar site, miller warns.

Key.Original: But don't get too excited. It's an auxiliary station.
Key.Chinese: 不過別太興奮了，這不過是輔助站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过别太激动，这只是个辅助雷达站。

Key.Original: The main one's over on Mont Tanoa.
Key.Chinesesimp: 主站在那边的塔诺亚山上。

Key.Original: Both would have to go to take those launchers offline.
Key.Chinese: 解決掉這兩個後，發射器就會關閉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 得把两个站都干掉才能让那些发射器失灵。

Container.name: 109_ta_second_radar_found_main_known_call
Container.situation: player sees secondary radar site and sends an sms to miller. miller explains to player the threat of aa on the island and asks him to help take down the radar. there is also a primary radar site, miller warns.

Key.Original: It must be the back-up I mentioned.
Key.Chinese: 那肯定就是我提到的備用雷達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它肯定就是我说过的备用雷达。

Container.name: 108_ta_second_radar_found_in_call
Container.situation: player sees primary radar site and sends an sms to miller. miller explains to player the threat of aa on the island and asks him to help take down the radar. there is also a secondary radar site, miller warns.

Key.Original: Heya - it's me.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿 - 是我。

Key.Original: That radar's providing target acquisition for CSAT's SAM sites...
Key.Chinese: 那個雷達正在為 CSAT 的地對空武器提供瞄準輔助……
Key.Chinesesimp: 那个雷达在为广协的 SAM 导弹阵地截获目标...

Container.name: 107_ta_destroy_radar_main_intel_call
Container.situation: player discovers primary radar station and sends an sms to miller. miller explains to player the threat of aa on the island and asks him to help take down the radar.

Key.Original: Santiago - great going.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"- 干得好。

Key.Original: CSAT rely on two radar stations for coverage.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 僅靠兩台雷達站來進行監測。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协依赖两个雷达站提供制导。

Key.Original: The main one we now know about. The other, an auxiliary, we haven't got a fix on yet.
Key.Chinese: 主站位置我們已知道，而另一個輔助站的確切位置仍然不詳。
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前我们知道主雷达站的情况。另一处，辅助雷达站，我们还不确定。

Key.Original: But if we destroy both, all their SAM sites would be useless, leaving only lesser AA threats.
Key.Chinese: 若我們能摧毀它們，那些地對空武器就跟廢鐵沒兩樣。這樣的話就只剩下威脅較小的防空武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过如果我们把两个雷达站都摧毁，所有 SAM 发射场都会失去作用，只剩下威力较小的 AA 构成威胁了。

Container.name: 106_ta_destroy_radar_a_call
Container.situation: player discovers intel on aa and sends an sms to miller. miller explains to player the threat of aa on the island and asks him to help take down the radar.

Key.Original: Santiago - great going on that last bit of intel.
Key.Chinese: Santiago－－你找到情報真是太好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"- 最后那份情报干得好。

Key.Original: Now we have the positions of CSAT's air defenses.
Key.Chinese: 現在我們知道了 CSAT 防空系統的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在我们知道了广协防空系统的方位。

Key.Original: The mobile SAM sites...
Key.Chinese: 機動地對空導彈的位置……
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动 SAM 位置...

Key.Original: They rely on two radar stations for coverage.
Key.Chinese: 他們僅靠兩台雷達站來進行監測。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们依赖两个雷达站提供制导。

Key.Original: The main one is on Mont Tanoa. The other, an auxiliary, we haven't got a fix on yet.
Key.Chinese: 主雷達站位於塔諾雅山，另一個輔助雷達站的確切位置仍然不詳。
Key.Chinesesimp: 主雷达站位于蒙特塔诺阿。至于辅助雷达站的位置，我们还不确定。

Key.Original: But if we destroy both, those launchers would be useless, leaving only lesser AA threats.
Key.Chinese: 但是，如果我們能摧毀這兩個雷達站，那些發射器就跟廢鐵沒兩樣。這樣的話就只剩下威脅較小的防空武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过如果我们把两个雷达站都摧毁，那些发射器就会失去作用，只剩下威力较小的 AA 构成威胁了。

Container.name: 105_ta_reboot_fail
Container.situation: miller alerts player that the system reboot has been interrupted and that their plan failed.

Key.Original: Ah, fuck!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，妈的！

Key.Original: Go! Move!
Key.Chinesesimp: 走！快走！

Key.Original: The upload didn't complete, someone must have stopped it!
Key.Chinese: 上傳沒有完成，一定是被人中斷了！
Key.Chinesesimp: 上传没完成，肯定有人终止了它！

Container.name: 104_ta_reboot_complete_urgent
Container.situation: miller notifies player that the reboot is complete.

Key.Original: Alright, that's it - we're in - go!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，就这样了 - 我们进来了 - 快走！

Container.name: 103_ta_reboot_complete
Container.situation: miller notifies player that the reboot is complete.

Key.Original: Alright, we're in. Exfil.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，我们进来了。撤离。

Container.name: 102_eve_reboot_c_urgent
Container.situation: miller gives player an update. system is in the process of rebooting with the alarm active.

Key.Original: Almost done, 78 percent!

Container.name: 101_eve_reboot_b_urgent
Container.situation: miller gives player an update. system is in the process of rebooting with the alarm active.

Key.Original: Okay, we're halfway there. Hold on!
Key.Chinese: 好了，我們完成一半了，撐著點！
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，已经一半了。坚持住！

Container.name: 100_eve_reboot_a_urgent
Container.situation: miller gives player an update. system is in the process of rebooting with the alarm active.

Key.Original: 22 percent!

Container.name: 099_eve_reboot_c
Container.situation: miller gives player an update. system is in the process of rebooting.

Key.Original: Almost done. 78 percent.

Container.name: 098_eve_reboot_b
Container.situation: miller gives player an update. system is in the process of rebooting.

Key.Original: Okay, we're halfway there. Hold on.
Key.Chinese: 好了，完成一半了，撐著點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，完成一半了。坚持住。

Container.name: 097_eve_reboot_a
Container.situation: miller gives player an update. system is in the process of rebooting.

Key.Original: 22 percent.

Container.name: 096_eve_reboot_alarm_call
Container.situation: player triggers the alarm during the reboot. miller responds.

Key.Original: Ah, shit!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，该死！

Key.Original: That's the alarm, hold your ground!
Key.Chinesesimp: 警报响了，留在原地！

Container.name: 095_eve_reboot_starts_alarm_call
Container.situation: player starts the reboot of csat's computer and inadvertently raises the alarm.

Key.Original: Ah, shit!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，该死！

Key.Original: Okay, listen - we can't gain access before the OS kicks in.
Key.Chinese: 好了，聽著－－作業系統啟動前，我們無法存取電腦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，听着 - 在操作系统启动之前，我们没法访问。

Key.Original: Stay put.
Key.Chinesesimp: 留在原地。

Key.Original: Don't let CSAT pull the plug!
Key.Chinesesimp: 别让广协把插头拔掉！

Container.name: 094_eve_reboot_starts_call
Container.situation: player starts the reboot of csat's computer.

Key.Original: The second the OS kicks in, get out of there, we'll have access.
Key.Chinese: 作業系統啟動後趕快離開，這樣我們就能存取它了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 操作系统一启动，马上离开那儿，我们就能访问了。

Container.name: 093_eve_flashdrive_inserted_call
Container.situation: miller contacts player and reminds him to reboot the system.

Key.Original: Santiago. Connection's good.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"。连接通畅。

Key.Original: Close down that computer then start it up again.
Key.Chinese: 關閉那台電腦，然後重新啟動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 关掉那台电脑，再启动它。

Container.name: 092_eve_miller_focus_on_task_angry_call
Container.situation: miller calls player and urges him to focus on the task he has assigned.

Key.Original: Santiago, get your arse in gear. Install that virus!
Key.Chinese: Santiago，快準備好，然後去安裝病毒！
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，集中精神。植入病毒！

Key.Original: Once those defenses are offline, we can make a move on the weapon's lab and end this thing.
Key.Chinese: 一旦防禦系統關閉，我們就能攻擊武器實驗室並摧毀那個東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦防守系统离线，我们就能进入实验室，把这事了结掉。

Container.name: 091_eve_miller_focus_on_task_call
Container.situation: miller calls player and urges him to focus on the task he has assigned.

Key.Original: It's Keystone.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是"基石"。

Key.Original: How's our upload looking?
Key.Chinesesimp: 上传任务完成得怎么样了？

Key.Original: Remember, you'll have to get inside a restricted area.
Key.Chinese: 記得了，你必須進入禁區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记住，你得进入一个禁区。

Key.Original: There's no way around it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有别的办法。

Key.Original: Once you're in, locating a computer should be easy.
Key.Chinese: 進去後，應該不難找到電腦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进去后，应该很容易找到一台电脑。

Key.Original: I'm sending you some information on a viable target site now.
Key.Chinese: 我現在給你傳一些可行的目標位置資料。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我现在给你发送一些关于合适目标地点的消息。

Container.name: 090_ta_virus_collected
Container.situation: player collects the flash drive.

Key.Original: All you have to do is stick it into one of CSAT's computers.
Key.Chinese: 你只需要把它插入 CSAT 的一台電腦就行了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你只需要把它插入广协的一台电脑就行了。

Key.Original: And then, force a hard reboot. Just be aware - an isolated restart will set off the alarm.
Key.Chinese: 然後，強制重啟。不過小心了，獨立重啟會觸發警報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然后强行重启。只是要注意 - 单独重启将触发警报。

Key.Original: And it may take several minutes for our man to do his thing.
Key.Chinese: 而且，我們的人需要幾分鐘的時間完成入侵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且我们的人可能需要几分钟才能完成他要做的事。

Key.Original: You'll need an officer's keycard if you want to keep things quiet...
Key.Chinese: 如果你想要偷偷進行，你就得找到軍官的鑰匙卡……
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你想偷偷进行，你就得找到军官的钥匙卡…

Container.name: 089_eve_upload_virus
Container.situation: player receives instructions from miller on disabling the autonomous turrets.

Key.Original: So, er, we've put together a virus.
Key.Chinese: 這，嗯，我們準備好了一個病毒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是这样的，呃，我们制造了一种病毒。

Key.Original: It's old school, I know, but we can make it work.
Key.Chinese: 雖然說有些古板，但是，我們可以做到的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我知道这办法很老套，不过能奏效。

Key.Original: Of course, doing a manual upload...
Key.Chinese: 當然了，這還需要手動上傳……
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然，得把它手动上传...
