Key.Original: That's not going to be easy - we'll need an insider.
Key.Chinese: 這不會太輕鬆的，我們需要有人在裡面接應。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这不会太轻松的 - 我们需要有人潜入。

Key.Original: Someone who knows their way around.
Key.Chinesesimp: 某个熟悉周围环境的人。

Key.Original: You in, Santiago...? Alright. Good.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你想去吗，"圣地亚哥"...？好吧。很好。

Key.Original: Take that little yellow flash drive over there, on the log.
Key.Chinese: 把那個黃色的隨身碟拿著，木頭上那一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿上那边那个黄色的小闪存卡，就在圆木上。

Container.name: 088_ta_virus_prepared_call
Container.situation: miller informs player that a virus has been prepared to disable the autonomous turrets.

Key.Original: It's Keystone.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是"基石"。

Key.Original: Return to the RV. Same place as before. We're about ready to deal a knockout blow.
Key.Chinese: 回到會和點，跟先前同一個地方，我們準備好進行致命一擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回集合点。就在上次那个地方。我们已经准备好来个致命一击了。

Container.name: 087_ta_autonomous_turrets_early_out_call
Container.situation: miller assigns player with the task of disabling defenses around an important facility.

Key.Original: And, thanks to you, we can do that.
Key.Chinese: 還有，多虧了你，我們才能這麼做。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，多亏了你，我们能做到这事。

Key.Original: Those documents you brought in were Network Structure Plans...
Key.Chinese: 你帶回的這些檔案包含有網路架構圖……
Key.Chinesesimp: 你带来的那些文件是网络结构规划图...

Key.Original: Apparently, we can use them to shut down CSAT's defenses.
Key.Chinese: 看來，我們能夠使用它們關閉 CSAT 的防禦系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 显然，我们可以利用它来关闭广协的防御系统。

Key.Original: But it will take time. I'll contact you as soon as we know more.
Key.Chinese: 不過這需要點時間，如果有更多資訊，我會與你聯絡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过这需要时间。如果有更多消息，我们会马上和你联系。

Container.name: 086_eve_network_intel_early
Container.situation: player meets miller and gives him intel.

Key.Original: Ah, thanks.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，多谢。

Key.Original: I'm not even going to ask you where you found this...
Key.Chinese: 我也不會問你是在哪裡找到它的……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我甚至不会问你是从哪儿找到它的...

Key.Original: Looks important, though.
Key.Chinese: 不過這看起來非常重要。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过看上去挺重要。

Key.Original: There's a tech guy on my team. I'll have him go over it.
Key.Chinese: 我的團隊裡有個技術人員，我會讓他研究一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的小队里有个懂技术的家伙。我会让他看看这个。

Container.name: 085_eve_network_intel_early_call
Container.situation: player sents a text message to miller about discovering some intel. miller responds.

Key.Original: Santiago - I just read your text...
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"- 我刚看了你的信息...

Key.Original: I'm at the RV point, in the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 我正在叢林裡的會和點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在丛林里的会合点。

Key.Original: Bring that intel and meet me there.
Key.Chinese: 帶著情報來這裡與我會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 带上那份情报，在那儿和我会面。

Container.name: 084_ta_network_intel
Container.situation: player provides miller with intel that will enable him to disable autonomous turrets.

Key.Original: Outstanding...
Key.Chinesesimp: 太棒了...

Key.Original: Knew you could pull it off. This is exactly what we need.
Key.Chinese: 我就知道你能完成任務，這正是我們需要的東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我就知道你能成功。这正是我们需要的。

Key.Original: Our tech guy should be able to work some magic.
Key.Chinese: 我們的技術人員應該好好善用它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的技术人员应该能施展一下魔法。

Key.Original: But it will take time. I'll contact you when we have a plan.
Key.Chinese: 不過這需要一點時間，計畫籌備好時我會跟你聯絡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过这需要时间；计划筹备好时我会跟你联络。

Container.name: 083_ta_network_intel_call
Container.situation: player sends miller an sms and explains he has the network structure plans. miller responds.

Key.Original: This is Keystone, message received.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是"基石"，消息收到。

Key.Original: Make your way back here - and don't lose that data!
Key.Chinese: 回到這裡來，還有，別把資料給搞丟了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 回到这里来 - 还有，别把资料弄丢了！

Container.name: 082_ta_autonomous_turrets_out_call
Container.situation: miller assigns player with the task of disabling defenses around an important facility.

Key.Original: One of my guys says he can do that.
Key.Chinese: 我這有個人自稱能夠完成任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的一个手下说他能做到。

Key.Original: If he had a Network Structure Plan.
Key.Chinese: 不過他需要網路架構圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果他有网络结构规划图的话。

Key.Original: Only trouble is, getting it requires stealing intel from one of CSAT's larger bases.
Key.Chinese: 問題是，我們得從 CSAT 另一處大型基地偷取此情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 唯一的麻烦是，要拿到规划图，得到广协的一个大型基地去窃取情报。

Key.Original: It's not an enviable task, I admit.
Key.Chinese: 我得坦白說，這個任務很困難。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我承认，这不是什么值得羡慕的任务。

Key.Original: But you have been trained for this.
Key.Chinese: 不過你是這方面的專家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过你是这方面的专家。

Key.Original: As soon as you've got the documents, bring them to me. I'm at our earlier RV - in the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 你取得檔案後，把它交給我。我就在先前叢林中的會和點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你一拿到文件就交给我。我在我们上次的会合点等你 - 在丛林里。

Container.name: 081_ta_autonomous_turrets_in_call
Container.situation: miller assigns player with the task of disabling defenses around an important facility.

Key.Original: Hey. It's me.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，是我。

Key.Original: I got an update on our primary.
Key.Chinese: 我有關於主目標的新資訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我收到了主目标的最新消息。

Key.Original: The facility is protected by a number of automated weapon systems.
Key.Chinese: 這個設施裝備了許多自動化武器系統進行保護。
Key.Chinesesimp: 设施受到某些自动武器系统的保护。

Key.Original: If we want to get in, we'll need to disable them.
Key.Chinese: 想進去的話，我們得先關閉這些系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果我们想进去，得让它们失效。

Container.name: 080_ta_plane_intel_collected_call
Container.situation: player sends miller the intel from the plane wreck.

Key.Original: Santiago, it's Keystone.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我是"基石"。

Key.Original: Great job, we got a PID on the lab.
Key.Chinese: 做得好，我們找到了實驗室 PID 圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得漂亮，我们找到了实验室的有效 PID 图。

Key.Original: Only thing to do now is investigate defenses.
Key.Chinese: 現在我們只需要調查其防禦設施。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在唯一要做的是调查防守情况。

Key.Original: Give me some time. Our analysts are studying the photos now.
Key.Chinese: 在給我點時間，我們的分析師正在研究那些照片。
Key.Chinesesimp: 给我点时间。我们的分析师正在研究照片。

Container.name: 079_ta_collect_plane_intel_gear_call
Container.situation: miller contacts player and asks him to retrieve important intel from a plane wreck.

Key.Original: Be sure to check your phone - we'll shoot you a line on where to source some scuba gear.
Key.Chinese: 記得檢查你的手機，我們會告訴你到哪裡找潛水裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 记得查看你的手机 - 我们会给你发信息，告诉你去哪儿拿到潜水装备。

Container.name: 078_ta_collect_plane_intel_call
Container.situation: miller contacts player and asks him to retrieve important intel from a plane wreck.

Key.Original: Hey. There's been a complication...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。遇到麻烦了...

Key.Original: One of our local assets made a pass of Tuvanaka.
Key.Chinese: 我們的一名當地人員試圖前往土萬納卡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的一个当地线人通过了突瓦纳加。

Key.Original: He was trying to pinpoint the exact location of CSAT's research site in a light aircraft.
Key.Chinese: 他本來想要駕駛輕型飛機來尋找 CSAT 研究場地的確切位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他驾驶一辆轻型飞机，试图查明广协研究设施的确切位置。

Key.Original: But he flew into their no-fly zone, and got himself shot down somewhere over the straits.
Key.Chinese: 不過他飛進了他們的禁飛區，並在海峽附近被擊落了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可是他飞进了他们的禁飞区，被击中后坠毁在海峡的某个地方。

Key.Original: Good news is, we believe he got our photos. Bad news is, they're at the bottom of the drink.
Key.Chinese: 好消息是，我們相信他取得了我們要的照片。壞消息是，照片還在海底。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好消息是，我们相信他拍到了我们需要的照片。坏消息是，这些照片沉入了水底。

Key.Original: I need you to dive down there, find our intel, and bring it back.
Key.Chinese: 我要你潛入水底，找到我們的情報並把它帶回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我需要你潜到水底，找到我们的情报，把它带回来。

Container.name: 077_in_additional_information_call
Container.situation: player receives further intel from miller.

Key.Original: Santiago. That intel you recovered. It confirms what we suspected.
Key.Chinese: Santiago，你取回的情報證實了我們的想法。
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"。你发现的那个情报证实了我们的猜测。

Key.Original: But it also implies there's a cure.
Key.Chinese: 不過，這也表示肯定有解藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过它也暗示着有治疗的方法。

Key.Original: If you can shut down CSAT's facility, my team can try to secure it. Maybe we can even inoculate the local CIVPOP. Save some lives.
Key.Chinese: 如果你能夠關閉 CSAT 的設施，我的隊伍或許能夠佔領它。這樣一來，我們或許能夠為當地的百姓接種疫苗。這樣能救更多的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你们能关闭广协的设施，我的队伍就能设法夺取它。也许我们甚至可以给当地的平民接种。挽救一些人的生命。

Container.name: 076_ta_situation_explained_out
Container.situation: miller explains the current situation to player and gives them an update on recent events.

Key.Original: Yeah, I know. It's not ideal.
Key.Chinese: 嗯，我知道。情況並不理想。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，我知道。这不是什么值得夸耀的事。

Key.Original: Just don't lose sight of the bigger picture - it's imperative we locate and knock out that lab.
Key.Chinese: 別忘了最重要的事－－我們必須找到並摧毀實驗室。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只是别忘了更重要的目标 - 我们必须找到并摧毁那个实验室。

Container.name: 075_br_situation_explained_syndikat_meeting
Container.situation: miller advises player to contact l'ensemble, and reveals he has arranged a meeting.

Key.Original: A meet's been arranged, half a klick, due west, at the plantation.
Key.Chinese: 我安排了會面，就在西方半公里外的農園中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已经约好在西面约半公里外的种植园里会面。

Container.name: 074_ta_situation_explained
Container.situation: miller explains the current situation to player and gives them an update on recent events.

Key.Original: Thanks.
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢谢。

Key.Original: You got a knack for this, Santiago.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在这方面挺厉害的啊，"圣地亚哥"。

Key.Original: That must be where they are engineering these outbreaks.
Key.Chinese: 他們肯定就是在那裡製造這些疾病。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里肯定是他们研发这些疾病的地方。

Key.Original: If we destroy it, we can expose the operation - drag these bastards out into the open...
Key.Chinese: 要是我們摧毀它，我們就能揭發這個陰謀，將這些混蛋的惡行公佈於眾……
Key.Chinesesimp: 要是我们摧毁它，我们就能揭发这个阴谋，将这些混蛋的恶行公诸于众…

Key.Original: And it seems we're making progress.
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来我们正在取得进展。

Key.Original: Our INTREPs all agree on one thing.
Key.Chinese: 我們的情報都表明同一件事情。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的情报都表明同一件事。

Key.Original: CSAT have developed a mosquito-borne parasite; lethal only to certain genotypes.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 研發出了一種以蚊蟲散播的寄生蟲，這東西僅對擁有特定基因型的人致命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协研发了一种由蚊子传播的寄生虫；它只对某些基因族群是致命的。

Key.Original: They've dubbed it the Atrox strain.
Key.Chinese: 他們稱這種品系為「阿特洛斯」菌株。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们称之为阿托克斯毒株。

Key.Original: And they're testing it out here, on ethnic Tanoans.
Key.Chinese: 他們正在這裡使用塔努安人進行實驗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们正在这儿的塔诺安人身上做试验。

Key.Original: Creating a disaster they themselves can respond to.
Key.Chinese: 他們自導自演了一場災難。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们自导自演一场灾难。

Key.Original: Now, according to data from our eye in the sky, there were construction materials transported to the island of Tuvanaka.
Key.Chinese: 現在，根據我們收集到的資料，有些建築材料被運到了土萬納卡島上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 目前，根据我们的空中监控设施收集的资料，有建筑材料运到图瓦那卡岛。

Key.Original: There's even rumors that a geodesic dome is being built there...
Key.Chinese: 現在還有傳言說，有人要在這裡建了網格圓頂……
Key.Chinesesimp: 甚至有传言，那里正在建造一个网格穹顶...

Key.Original: Obviously, we'll need some support.
Key.Chinesesimp: 显然，我们需要得到支援。

Key.Original: That means working with L'Ensemble.
Key.Chinese: 這意味著，我們得跟 L'Ensemble 合作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这意味着与大帮会合作。

Key.Original: Or, in other words, doing a devil's deal with Syndikat.
Key.Chinese: 換句話說，我們得跟 Syndikat 做個買賣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 换句话说，跟辛迪加这个魔鬼做交易。

Container.name: 073_eve_greeting_quest_complete_c
Container.situation: miller greets player.

Key.Original: Okay, so welcome back.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，欢迎回来。

Container.name: 072_eve_greeting_quest_complete_b
Container.situation: miller greets player.

Key.Original: Ah, good, you made it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，很好，你回来了。

Container.name: 071_eve_greeting_quest_complete_a
Container.situation: miller greets player.

Key.Original: Ah, still alive I see.
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，你还活着啊。

Container.name: 070_eve_alarm_raised
Container.situation: miller contacts player and explains the alarm has been raised. access across the bridge will now be problematic.

Key.Original: Hey, problem. CSAT's on high alert.
Key.Chinese: 嘿，出問題了。CSAT 提高了戒備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，出问题了。广协提高了戒备。

Key.Original: They've locked down the bridge across the straits. You're cut off.
Key.Chinese: 他們封鎖了跨越海峽的橋樑，你的路線被截斷了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们封锁了横跨海峡的大桥。你的去路断了。

Key.Original: Try to wait it out or, nick a boat.
Key.Chinese: 避避風頭吧，或是去偷一艘船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 避避风头吧，或者去偷条船。

Container.name: 069_ta_documents_recovered
Container.situation: player collects sensitive materials from the csat base in harcourt.

Key.Original: Santiago, I got your message. Let's hope that intel's solid.
Key.Chinese: Santiago，我收到了你的訊息，希望那情報可靠。
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我收到了你的消息。希望那个情报是可靠的。

Key.Original: Get out of there and meet me at our last RV. Excellent work.
Key.Chinese: 離開那裡，到我們上一個會合點和我碰面。做得好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开那儿，在我们上次的集合点和我碰面。干得漂亮。

Container.name: 068_eve_keep_searching_c
Container.situation: miller encourages player to keep searching for intel.

Key.Original: It's evidence alright, just not the sort we're after.
Key.Chinese: 這是證據，不過，不是我們需要的那種。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是证据，不过不是我们要找的那种证据。

Container.name: 067_eve_keep_searching_b
Container.situation: miller encourages player to keep searching for intel.

Key.Original: See what else you can find...
Key.Chinesesimp: 看看你还能发现什么...

Container.name: 066_eve_keep_searching_a
Container.situation: miller encourages player to keep searching for intel.

Key.Original: Continue searching, we need more to go on.
Key.Chinese: 繼續搜尋，我們需要更多資訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续搜索，我们需要更多情报才能采取行动。

Container.name: 065_eve_intel_found_f_call
Container.situation: player spots a collection of body bags. a photo is sent to miller.

Key.Original: Those must be patients. Or I dunno, maybe victims.
Key.Chinese: 這些一定是病患，還是說……他們是被害者。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这些一定是患者，或者可以说他们是被害者。

Container.name: 064_eve_intel_found_e_call
Container.situation: player comes across pools of blood. a photo is sent to miller.

Key.Original: Grim...
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕...

Key.Original: I'd say someone made a hard pass on CSAT's treatment.
Key.Chinese: 我看有人不願意接受 CSAT 的治療。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看有人不愿意接受广协的治疗。

Container.name: 063_eve_intel_found_d_call
Container.situation: player identifies tracks, leading away from the encampment. a photo is sent to miller.

Key.Original: Mm. Tracks, heading west.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，有痕迹，朝西边去了。

Key.Original: Good thinking, but that much we got on our remote surveillance...
Key.Chinese: 做得好，不過遠端監控也發現了這點……
Key.Chinesesimp: 做得好，不过我们已经从远程监控发现这点...

Container.name: 062_eve_intel_found_c_call
Container.situation: player discovers a note containing intel. a photo is sent to miller.

Key.Original: Yeah, also interesting...
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，也挺有意思...

Key.Original: See what's written there?
Key.Chinese: 你看看那上面寫了什麼？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你看看写了什么？

Key.Original: That's another namecheck. The town, it's got to be important.
Key.Chinese: 又是這個名字。這座小鎮一定很重要。
Key.Chinesesimp: 又是这个名字。这个城镇一定很重要。

Container.name: 061_eve_intel_found_b_call
Container.situation: player finds a leaflet with some intel. a photo is sent to miller.

Key.Original: Again. Harcourt...
Key.Chinesesimp: 又是哈科特...

Key.Original: It's unlikely that's a coincidence. There must be a connection.
Key.Chinese: 這應該不是巧合。肯定有所關聯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不可能是巧合。肯定有什么关联。

Key.Original: Head over there - see if we're onto something.
Key.Chinese: 到那裡去－－看看有沒有蛛絲馬跡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到那去 - 看看我们能不能发现线索。

Key.Original: I'll do some digging, find out what I can from here.
Key.Chinese: 我去調查一下，看看能不能從這裡找到線索。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会调查一下，看看我在这儿能不能发现线索。

Container.name: 060_eve_intel_found_a_call
Container.situation: player locates intel on a whiteboard. a photo is sent to miller.

Key.Original: Okay - great.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧 - 太好了。

Key.Original: Harcourt. That's a town over on the Îles de Lijn.
Key.Chinese: 哈爾科特是 Îles de Lijn 的一座小鎮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈科特。那是里恩群岛上的一个城镇。

Key.Original: A nice place for a quiet operation. Keep looking.
Key.Chinese: 這地方很適合秘密行動。繼續尋找。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是个适合进行秘密行动的好地方。继续找。

Container.name: 059_in_traitor_reward
Container.situation: traitor tells player about some money he has stashed in an ammo tin, behind a large grave in a nearby cemetery.

Key.Original: I can pay you. I got money. It's in an ammo box...
Key.Chinese: 我能給你錢，我有錢，藏在一個彈藥箱裡……
Key.Chinesesimp: 我能给你钱，我有钱。藏在一个弹药箱里...

Key.Original: Check behind the big shrine, at the cemetery in Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 你到瓦加拉拉墓園的大神祠後面找找。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到瓦加拉拉公墓的大神龛后面找找。

Key.Original: Take it and forget you ever see me.
Key.Chinese: 東西你拿去，然後就當作你沒見到我吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把钱拿走，就当你没见过我吧。

Container.name: 058_eve_traitor_escape
Container.situation: traitor tells player to take his id card as proof of death.

Key.Original: No way I'm goin' back.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我才不会回去呢。

Key.Original: The boss don't know I never talked.
Key.Chinese: 老大不知道我根本沒開口。
Key.Chinesesimp: 老大不知道我根本没开口。

Key.Original: He'll bury me out in the mangroves.
Key.Chinese: 他會把我給殺了然埋在紅樹林裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他会把我拖到红树林里埋了。

Key.Original: It's a death sentence...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这根本是死路一条...

Key.Original: Take my wallet and ID, on the table over there.
Key.Chinese: 帶上我的皮夾和 ID，就在那邊的桌子上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 带上我的钱包和身份证，就在那边的桌子上。

Key.Original: Say you find that and nothing else!
Key.Chinesesimp: 就说你只找到了它！

Key.Original: Give it to Solé. He's got a garage, near the temple ruins.
Key.Chinese: 把東西給索爾。他在神殿遺跡附近有個車庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把它们交给 Solé。他在寺院废墟那边有个车库。

Key.Original: Or - or leave it at our stash, near Lakatoro.
Key.Chinese: 或是把它放在拉卡托羅附近的存放點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 或者 - 或者把它留在我们在拉卡托罗附近的藏身处。

Container.name: 057_eve_traitor_untied_no_guards
Container.situation: player unties traitor. traitor warns player about the guards outside.

Key.Original: But, er...
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，呃...

Container.name: 056_eve_traitor_untied_guards
Container.situation: player unties traitor. traitor warns player about the guards outside.

Key.Original: But I'm not movin' with them guards outside, mec!
Key.Chinese: 不過外頭有警衛的話，我可不會行動，夥計！
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，外面有警卫，我可不会乱动，伙计！

Container.name: 055_eve_traitor_untied
Container.situation: player unties traitor.

Key.Original: Alright.
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。

Container.name: 054_eve_traitor_found
Container.situation: player locates the captive traitor.

Key.Original: So, they send you, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，他们派你来了，嗯？

Container.name: 053_ta_photo_taken
Container.situation: player sends an image to syndikat_boss speaker.

Key.Original: Salut, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，Képi。

Key.Original: Too bad about our man, he big loss.
Key.Chinese: 失去了他真是可惜，這損失真慘重。
Key.Chinesesimp: 失去了他真是可惜，损失惨重啊。

Key.Original: I will be in touch.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们再联络。

Container.name: 052_in_black_market_prices
Container.situation: player is given information about the black market.

Key.Original: Ah, I almost forget, Képi, we gotta room for you.
Key.Chinese: 啊，我差點忘了，Képi，我們給你準備了個房間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，我差点忘了，Képi，我们给你准备了一个房间。

Key.Original: In a safehouse, near Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 就在瓦加拉拉附近的密屋中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在瓦加拉拉附近的一间密屋里。

Key.Original: Sometimes good to lay low, eh?
Key.Chinese: 有時候避避風頭也不錯，是吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 有时做做缩头乌龟也不错，嗯？

Key.Original: House is green color, to the south.
Key.Chinese: 是一棟綠色的房子，就在南邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是一栋绿色的房子，就在南边。

Key.Original: There is also weapon for you there.
Key.Chinese: 那裡還給你準備了一把武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿还给你准备了一件武器。

Key.Original: If you to want more, we control the black market.
Key.Chinese: 如果你需要更多東西，我們還掌控著黑市。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你需要更多东西，我们控制着黑市呢。

Container.name: 051_ta_house_destroyed
Container.situation: player successfully completes a task.

Key.Original: Salut, Képi.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，Képi。

Key.Original: You do good, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还好吧？

Key.Original: Time government learn no-one beyond our reach.
Key.Chinese: 現在該讓政府知道誰也無法逃出我們的手掌心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是时候让政府明白，没人能逃脱我们的掌心。

Key.Original: I will be in touch. L'Ensemble need a soldier-man like you.
Key.Chinese: 我們再聯絡，L'Ensemble 需要像你這樣的士兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们再联络，大帮会需要像你这样的士兵。

Container.name: 049_eve_syndikat_webcam_q_out
Container.situation: player is told by unkown speaker that they will be in touch.

Key.Original: My name is Samjo.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我叫"山姆卓"。

Key.Original: I will send you the location, attends.
Key.Chinese: 我會把地點傳給你，注意查收。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会把位置发给你，稍等。

Container.name: 048_eve_syndikat_webcam_p
Container.situation: player is told to go to a nearby camp and collect the medicine.

Key.Original: There is médecine at a camp nearby.
Key.Chinesesimp: 附近的一个营地有些药品。

Container.name: 047_eve_syndikat_webcam_o_out
Container.situation: player is told to notify unknown speaker when the task is complete.

Key.Original: Save this number and send a message once you're done.
Key.Chinese: 儲存這個號碼，完成後給他傳個訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保存这个号码，一完事就发个消息。

Container.name: 046_eve_syndikat_webcam_n_out
Container.situation: player is promised medicinal support once the assigned task is complete.

Key.Original: Save this number and send a message once you're done.
Key.Chinese: 儲存這個號碼，完成後給他傳個訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保存这个号码，一完事就发个消息。

Key.Original: I will arrange for your médicament.
Key.Chinese: 我會為你安排你要的 médicament。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会安排好你要的药品。

Container.name: 045_eve_syndikat_webcam_m
Container.situation: player is told to check a laptop for further information about the tasks he's been assigned.

Key.Original: The laptop on the table has more information.
Key.Chinese: 桌上的筆記型電腦裡有更多資訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 桌上的手提电脑里有更多信息。

Container.name: 044_eve_syndikat_webcam_l
Container.situation: player is accepted by unknown speaker.

Key.Original: Ah, well...
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，好吧...

Key.Original: You already a friend to L'Ensemble!
Key.Chinese: 你本來就是 L'Ensemble 的朋友！
Key.Chinesesimp: 你本来就是大帮会的朋友！

Key.Original: How'd you know we want a house gone in Vagalala?
Key.Chinese: 你怎麼知道我們要摧毀瓦加拉拉的一棟房子？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你怎么知道我们想摧毁瓦加拉拉的一幢房子？

Container.name: 043_eve_syndikat_webcam_k
Container.situation: player is tasked with rescuing the traitor and is given a description of the situation.

Key.Original: And if you can, rescue our comrade.
Key.Chinese: 如果你有辦法，請救出我們的同伴。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你有办法，去救救我们的同志吧。

Container.name: 042_ta_syndikat_webcam_j
Container.situation: player is tasked with rescuing the traitor, after having been sent by miller.

Key.Original: But, L'Ensemble, it don't know you.
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，大帮会不认识你。

Key.Original: And I don't trust strangers. Not without an act of good faith...
Key.Chinese: 而且，除非對方向我們示好，否則，我不會輕易相信陌生人…
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且，我不会轻易相信陌生人。除非他们先向我们示好...

Container.name: 041_ta_syndikat_webcam_i
Container.situation: player is tasked with rescuing the traitor, after having been sent by doctor.

Key.Original: That is good - L'Ensemble can help.
Key.Chinese: 這樣很好－－L'Ensemble 能幫得上忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样很好 - 大帮会能帮上忙。

Key.Original: But, we must be helped as well, eh?
Key.Chinese: 不過，我們也需要幫助，知道吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，我们也需要帮助，对吧？

Container.name: 040_ta_syndikat_webcam_h
Container.situation: player is tasked with destroying the traitor's house.

Key.Original: So you must go - blow up the house.
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以你必须去 - 炸掉那所房子。

Key.Original: See the government get our message.
Key.Chinese: 讓政府知道我們的想法。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让政府明白我们的意思。

Container.name: 039_ta_syndikat_webcam_g
Container.situation: the traitor is alive and the unknown speaker tells this to the player.

Key.Original: La gendarmerie, they take our man.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵抓了我們的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队带走了我们的人。

Key.Original: And then raid his home in Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 然後襲擊他在瓦加拉拉的家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 之后还袭击了他在瓦加拉拉的家。

Container.name: 038_ta_syndikat_webcam_f
Container.situation: the traitor is dead and the unknown speaker tells this to the player.

Key.Original: La gendarmerie, they kill our man.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵殺了我們的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队杀了我们的人。

Key.Original: And take away his home in Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 然後奪走了他在瓦加拉拉的家。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还夺走了他在瓦加拉拉的家。

Container.name: 037_eve_syndikat_webcam_e
Container.situation: player has arrived late. the traitor is dead and player only receives the task to destroy the house.

Key.Original: That is good - L'Ensemble can help.
Key.Chinese: 這樣很好－－L'Ensemble 能幫得上忙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这样很好 - 大帮会能帮上忙。

Key.Original: But, we must be helped as well, eh?
Key.Chinese: 不過，我們也需要幫助，知道吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，我们也需要帮助，对吧？

Container.name: 036_eve_syndikat_webcam_d
Container.situation: player has already completed the intended objective.

Key.Original: Ah, well...
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，好吧...

Key.Original: You already a friend to L'Ensemble!
Key.Chinese: 你本來就是 L'Ensemble 的朋友！
Key.Chinesesimp: 你本来就是大帮会的朋友！

Key.Original: How'd you know we want a house gone in Vagalala?
Key.Chinese: 你怎麼知道我們要摧毀瓦加拉拉的一棟房子？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你怎么知道我们想摧毁瓦加拉拉的一幢房子？

Container.name: 035_eve_syndikat_webcam_c
Container.situation: player has been sent by miller.

Key.Original: Now you want us to talk things, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在你想和我们谈谈了，嗯？

Container.name: 034_eve_syndikat_webcam_b
Container.situation: player has been sent by doctor.

Key.Original: Now you want médecine. End all that Jungle Fever.
Key.Chinese: 現在你要藥物來解決瘧疾的問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在你想搞到药品。终结这种丛林热。

Container.name: 033_eve_syndikat_webcam_a_in
Container.situation: player enters a warehouse, observed by a webcam. unknown addresses him from computer.

Key.Original: I see you, Képi blanc.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我看到你了，Képi blanc。

Key.Original: Yes, there.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，那儿。

Key.Original: The laptop.
Key.Chinesesimp: 手提电脑。

Key.Original: You big man one time, dans La Légion.
Key.Chinese: 你在 La Légion 時曾經是了不起的人物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在军团物时候，你可是个大人物。

Container.name: 032_ta_sleeping_bag_found
Container.situation: player locates miller's sleeping bag.

Key.Original: You got it?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你拿到了吗？

Key.Original: There's a cache too.
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有个秘密仓库。

Key.Original: South. Near the old sawmill.
Key.Chinese: 南邊，就在老鋸木廠附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 南面。在老磨坊附近。

Container.name: 031_ex_download_reminder
Container.situation: miller reminds player that they need to download the geo-finder from the laptop.

Key.Original: Santiago...
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"...

Key.Original: The laptop?
Key.Chinesesimp: 手提电脑？

Container.name: 030_ex_app_reminder
Container.situation: miller reminds player that they need to turn on the geo-finder using their phone.

Key.Original: Yeah, and, er, like I said. You'll need to switch it on first.
Key.Chinese: 是啊，還有……這，就像我說的那樣，你得先開啟設備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，还有，呃，我之前说过。你得先把它打开。

Key.Original: Just click the icon on your mobile.
Key.Chinese: 按下手機上的圖標就行了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 点击你手机上的图标就行。

Container.name: 029_ex_app_downloaded_pack_found
Container.situation: player has already located miller's backpack and the sleeping bag.

Key.Original: Okay, so you're all set. I'd say we could do a dry run...
Key.Chinese: 好了，準備就緒。我覺得，我們要測試一下……
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，你都准备好了。我觉得我们要测试一下...

Key.Original: But, er, it seems you already found my pack and your sleeping bag.
Key.Chinese: 不過，嗯，看來你已經找到了我的包包和你的睡袋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，呃，看来你已经找到了我的背包和你的睡袋。

Key.Original: Just switch on the tracker and home in on the beeps.
Key.Chinese: 切換到追蹤器並追蹤嗶嗶聲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只要打开追踪器，跟着哔哔声走就好。

Container.name: 028_ta_app_downloaded
Container.situation: player downloads geo-finder app from miller's laptop, as instructed.

Key.Original: Okay, so you're all set. Let's do a dry run.
Key.Chinese: 好了，準備就緒。我們來測試一下吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，你都准备好了。我们来演练一下。

Key.Original: I've got a sleeping bag for you, in my pack.
Key.Chinese: 我這裡有個睡袋給你，就在我的包包裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我带了个睡袋给你，就在我的背包里。

Key.Original: Just switch on the tracker and home in on the beeps.
Key.Chinese: 切換到追蹤器並追蹤嗶嗶聲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 只要打开追踪器，跟着哔哔声走就好。

Container.name: 027_in_app_tutorial_in
Container.situation: miller tells player to download the geo-finder app from his laptop.

Key.Original: Download the app from my laptop and activate it with your phone.
Key.Chinese: 在我的筆記型電腦上下載應用程式，然後用手機啟動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从我的手提电脑下载应用，用你的手机激活它。

Container.name: 026_ta_at_rv_location
Container.situation: player arrives at the rv with miller.

Key.Original: CSAT have just abandoned their camp in Ouméré.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 剛剛拋棄了他們在 Ouméré 的基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协刚抛弃了他们在奥默里的营地。

Key.Original: I guess they heard about L'Ensemble planning an attack.
Key.Chinese: 我看他們收到了 L'Ensemble 正計畫展開攻擊的消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我猜他们听说了大帮会计划发起攻击。

Key.Original: If you want any extra kit we have a few hidden caches.
Key.Chinese: 你要是想多帶些裝備，我們有些秘密存放點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你需要任何额外的装备，我们有一些秘密仓库。

Key.Original: You can locate them with a standard geo-finder.
Key.Chinese: 你可以使用標準的地型態測器找到它們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以用标准的地理位置查找软件找到它们。

Key.Original: Anyway, lucky break for us.
Key.Chinese: 反正，這對我們來說是好消息。
Key.Chinesesimp: 反正，我们能歇口气了，这挺好。

Key.Original: Those guys left in a hurry.
Key.Chinesesimp: 那些家伙匆忙离开了。

Key.Original: Might still be something there that can help us trace them.
Key.Chinese: 或許，他們留下的東西能幫我們追蹤他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那儿也许还有些东西能帮我们追踪他们。

Key.Original: I need you to go and investigate...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我需要你去调查一下...

Key.Original: A truck drove off in the night, carrying boxes marked with the same suspicious symbol we spoke about...
Key.Chinese: 一輛卡車晚上開走了，裡面裝的箱子上標有我們先前提到的可疑標誌……
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆卡车夜里开走了，运走的箱子上标着我们提到过的可疑标记...

Key.Original: It arrived at Luganville and, hours later, people started getting sick.
Key.Chinese: 它到了盧甘村，而幾個小時後，那裡的人便開始發病。
Key.Chinesesimp: 它到了卢甘威尔，几小时之后，人们开始生病。

Key.Original: You see what I'm getting at here...
Key.Chinesesimp: 你明白我的意思吧...

Key.Original: This situation may be worse than we imagined. We've got to act.
Key.Chinese: 這情況比我們想像的還要糟糕。我們必須立即行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里的情况也许比我们预想的还要糟糕。我们得采取行动。

Key.Original: Good morning, sunshine...
Key.Chinesesimp: 早上好，亲爱的...

Container.name: 024_eve_at_rv_greeting
Container.situation: miller greets player on first meeting.

Key.Original: Ah, good - you're here.
Key.Chinesesimp: 噢，好啊 - 你来了。

Container.name: 023_eve_jungle_rv
Container.situation: miller contacts player and explains they must meet in person.

Key.Original: Santiago, change of plan.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，计划有变。

Key.Original: Meet me in 4 hours. I'm sending you coordinates...
Key.Chinese: 4 個小時後跟我碰面，我把座標傳給你……
Key.Chinesesimp: 4 小时后和我碰面。我会把坐标发给你...

Container.name: 022_eve_computer_accessed_call
Container.situation: miller provides player with information.

Key.Original: Okay, Santiago, it seems you're in.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，"圣地亚哥"，看来你已经连上了。

Key.Original: This picture appeared one month ago in the News Today.
Key.Chinese: 這張照片一個月前刊登在《News Today》上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这张照片一个月前刊登在《今日新闻》上。

Key.Original: In the light of the current crisis, you can see why we're so concerned.
Key.Chinese: 在最近發生的事後，你能理解我們為什麼會這麼擔心吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 鉴于当前的危机，你应该明白我们为什么这么担心。

Key.Original: Anyway, rest up.
Key.Chinesesimp: 反正，你好好休息吧。

Key.Original: It's Tobakoro.
Key.Chinesesimp: 是托巴科罗。

Key.Original: A village no-one ever heard of 'til malaria wiped it off the map.
Key.Chinese: 在被瘧疾從地圖上抹去之前，這個村子一直默默無聞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在被疟疾从地图上抹去之前，这个村子一直默默无闻。

Key.Original: Here is the same photo, only enhanced.
Key.Chinese: 這是同一張照片，不過放大了一些。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是同一张照片，只是更清晰一些。

Key.Original: Note the stencil on the side of the container.
Key.Chinesesimp: 注意集装箱侧面的图案。

Key.Original: Look familiar?
Key.Chinesesimp: 眼熟吗？

Key.Original: That symbol was on a cargo truck we caught with our surveillance.
Key.Chinese: 我們監控時在貨車上看見了同一個標誌。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的监控捕捉到的一辆货运卡车上也有那个标记。

Key.Original: Alright. Last image. You see?
Key.Chinese: 好了，最後一個圖像，看見了嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，最后一张图。你看到了吗？

Key.Original: Our analysts believe it's linked to a biogenetic weapons program.
Key.Chinese: 我們的分析師認為，這跟某種生物遺傳武器計畫有關。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的分析师认为，这跟某种生物基因武器计划有关。

Key.Original: More information's still coming in.
Key.Chinese: 我們還會收到更多資訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们还会收到更多消息。

Key.Original: I'll call at 06:30. Maybe we'll get some answers.
Key.Chinese: 我會在 06:30 再打給你，或許我們會有些答案。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会在 06:30 再打电话给你。也许我们能找到一些答案。

Container.name: 021_ta_miller_intel_available_call
Container.situation: miller informs player he has sent files, with intel from the surveillance camera.

Key.Original: Santiago. This is Keystone. Listen.
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"，我是"基石"，听着。

Key.Original: Intel from our remote surveillance.
Key.Chinese: 我們遠端監控取得的情資。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的远程监控传来情报。

Key.Original: Looks like we got a hit. Good work.
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来有成果了，干得漂亮。

Key.Original: I'm going to send you the data now.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我现在就把数据传给你。

Key.Original: If you're at home, check it on your secure connection.
Key.Chinese: 你要是在家，記得在安全的網路上查看。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你在家，用安全连接查看。

Key.Original: I'll call, as soon as I can see the one-time link is active.
Key.Chinese: 如果我看到這個一次性連結啟動後，我就撥電話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我一看到这个一次性链接激活，就拨电话。

Container.name: 020_ta_explosives_taken
Container.situation: arthur thanks player for his help and offers him a sum of money.

Key.Original: You got it?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你拿到了吗？

Key.Original: Good going.
Key.Chinesesimp: 好样的。

Key.Original: And, I just transferred your money.
Key.Chinese: 還有，我剛剛把你的錢匯過去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 另外，我刚才给你转账了。

Key.Original: It's there, with interest. Consider it housekeeping, eh?
Key.Chinese: 都在這裡，利息也算進去了。就當作清理費吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 已经到帐了，包括利息。就把它当作清理费吧，嗯？

Key.Original: And, er, best you don't risk CSAT's checkpoint.
Key.Chinese: 還有，這個嘛，你最好別去 CSAT 的哨站冒險。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，呃，你最好别冒险通过广协的关卡。

Key.Original: Not now you got something on you...
Key.Chinese: 現在不行，你那還有些麻煩……
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在不行，你那还有一些麻烦...

Container.name: 019_eve_at_shed
Container.situation: arthur arrives at the shed and points out the explosives to player.

Key.Original: It's just in there.
Key.Chinesesimp: 它就在那儿。

Container.name: 018_ta_walking_to_the_shed
Container.situation: arthur leads player to the shed where an explosive charge has been hidden.

Key.Original: Come on, I'll take you to the shed.
Key.Chinesesimp: 来吧，我带你去棚屋。

Container.name: 017_fil_arrival
Container.situation: the player arrives at the village with arthur.

Key.Original: C'est bien. Bon. So, here we are, mec.
Key.Chinese: 很好。我們這就到了，夥計。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。我们到了，伙计。

Container.name: 016_fil_driving_tractor
Container.situation: arthur comments on a tractor that has broken down on the road ahead, recommending the player turns left.

Key.Original: Ah. Tractor's broken again!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，拖拉机又坏了！

Key.Original: Okay, take a left and go between the cane fields.
Key.Chinese: 好了，左轉，到甘蔗田裡去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，左转，从甘蔗地里穿过去。

Container.name: 015_fil_driving_idap
Container.situation: arthur begins speaking about idap and the good work they are doing, with regards to a devastating malaria outbreak.

Key.Original: IDAP's keeping busy.
Key.Chinesesimp: IDAP 有得忙了。

Key.Original: Rumor is they all getting sick too.
Key.Chinesesimp: 听说他们也都得病了。

Key.Original: Even with the shots.
Key.Chinesesimp: 连打针都没用。

Key.Original: You remember Dr. Drábek? He says he ain't seen nothing like it.
Key.Chinese: 你記得德拉貝克醫生嗎？他說他沒見過這樣的東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你记得 Drábek 医生吗？他说他没见过那样的病。

Key.Original: The malaria, I mean.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我说的是疟疾。

Key.Original: It's some kinda super-strain. Kills in hours, instead of weeks...
Key.Chinese: 這是某種超級突變，被感染後都不用幾週，幾個小時就足以致命……
Key.Chinesesimp: 它像是某种超级变种，染病后不用几周，几小时就身亡...

Key.Original: CSAT's gotta medical division doing research on Tuvanaka.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 派了一支醫療部門來土萬納卡進行研究。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协派遣了医疗部门在突瓦纳加做研究。

Key.Original: But no-one's giving us any answers.
Key.Chinese: 但誰也沒有給我們確切的答案。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但谁也没有给我们确切的答复。

Container.name: 014_ex_driving_escape
Container.situation: arthur expresses his alarm as player acts unexpectedly and bundles instructions given at the checkpoint.

Key.Original: Merde alors, what you doing? Drive! Go! Get us outta here!
Key.Chinese: Merde alors，你在幹嘛？快開車，快！帶我們離開這裡！
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的天哪，你在做什么？开车！快走！我们快离开这儿！

Container.name: 013_in_driving_csat_situation
Container.situation: arthur speaks about csat and their insidious invasion of the island.

Key.Original: Fucking CSAT, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死的广协，嗯？

Key.Original: They offer doctors and we get this.
Key.Chinese: 他們有醫生，我們卻只有這個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们有医生，而我们却只有这个。

Key.Original: It don't matter how you look at it, mec. Government got everybody pissed off - it feels like occupation.
Key.Chinese: 不管怎麼想，夥計，政府把大家都給惹毛了－－現在這裡感覺就像是被佔領了一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不管你怎么想，政府把每个人都惹毛了 - 感觉像是占领。

Key.Original: And Syndikat, well, as y'know, it's all political now.
Key.Chinese: 還有 Syndikat，這個嘛，你也知道，現在都扯上政治了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于辛迪加，你知道的，现在政治挂帅。

Key.Original: No way of telling what will happen.
Key.Chinesesimp: 无法预料会发生什么事。

Container.name: 012_ta_driving_drive_on
Container.situation: arthur comments on the fact that they can now continue on their journey to the village.

Key.Original: Okay - let's go...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧 - 我们走...

Container.name: 011_in_driving_doing_good
Container.situation: arthur tells player to keep the vehicle stopped.

Key.Original: Huh, that's new...
Key.Chinesesimp: 咦，那可是新鲜事...

Key.Original: Never seen them use a drone before.
Key.Chinese: 以前沒見過他們用無人機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 以前从未见他们用过无人机。

Container.name: 010_in_driving_looking_for_weapons
Container.situation: arthur explains that the soldiers at the checkpoint are probably looking for weapons.

Key.Original: Yeah - these guys. They're nervous.
Key.Chinese: 是啊－－這些傢伙可緊張了呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊 - 这些家伙。他们挺紧张。

Key.Original: Syndikat made an attack last night.
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加昨晚展开了攻击。

Key.Original: Took down a radio tower. Stop the propaganda.
Key.Chinese: 解決了無線電塔，這樣就阻止了他們的宣傳。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁了一座无线电发射塔。暂停了他们的宣传。

Key.Original: Must be worried we're having guns.
Key.Chinese: 他們肯定擔心我們有槍枝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一定是担心我们有枪。

Container.name: 009_in_driving_follow_instructions
Container.situation: arthur advises player to follow instructions.

Key.Original: Ah, merde. It looks like they wanna stop us...
Key.Chinese: 啊，merde。看來他們要我們停下來……
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，该死。看来他们会拦住我们...

Key.Original: Better pull over to the right, mec.
Key.Chinesesimp: 最好靠右停车，mec。

Container.name: 008_ta_driving_checkpoint
Container.situation: arthur warns player about a military checkpoint on the road ahead, and tells him to slow his speed.

Key.Original: Alright - alright, take it slow.
Key.Chinesesimp: 行 - 好吧，慢慢来吧。

Key.Original: That's a military checkpoint, don't give them any trouble.
Key.Chinese: 那是軍事哨站，別給他們惹麻煩。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那是个军事关卡，别惹什么麻烦。

Container.name: 007_fil_driving_profiteers
Container.situation: arthur mentions about the steady growth of a black market.

Key.Original: Check out the truck.
Key.Chinesesimp: 你去卡车上看看。

Key.Original: Profiteers. You see the IDAP stuff?
Key.Chinese: 一堆奸商，你看見那些 IDAP 的貨了嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 一群奸商，你看到那些 IDAP 的货了吗？

Key.Original: The black market's flooded with it.
Key.Chinese: 那些東西在黑市可多了呢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 黑市上到处都是。

Container.name: 006_fil_driving_situation_c
Container.situation: arthur resumes his conversation with player, after ending his call with lucas.

Key.Original: Mon dieu, you see what I am saying?
Key.Chinese: Mon dieu！你看見我說的東西了嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: Mon dieu，你明白我在说什么吗？

Key.Original: Five minutes with some abrutis shouting on a megaphone and he thinks he's a guérillero.
Key.Chinese: 隨便來個低能兒就朝著擴音器喊話五分鐘，現在他就自以為是個游擊隊員了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随便来个蠢货就朝着扩音器喊了五分钟，他就以为自己是个游击队员了。

Key.Original: And I'm out there, breaking my back for bananas...
Key.Chinese: 我在外頭拼命，難道就是為了這些香蕉……
Key.Chinesesimp: 而我在外面拼命，难道就是为了这些香蕉…

Key.Original: Literally - bananas. But Lucas? Ah!
Key.Chinese: 真的只是香蕉。可是盧卡斯？啊！
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说真的 - 真是为香蕉。可 Lucas 呢？哈！

Key.Original: He's more afraid of pesticides than gangsters with guns.
Key.Chinese: 相較於持槍的黑道，他好像更怕農藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 比起带枪的暴徒，他更害怕杀虫剂。

Key.Original: Je pourrais le tuer !
Key.Chinesesimp: 我该杀了他！

Key.Original: Y'know what he hid in my shed, mec?
Key.Chinese: 你知道他在我的小屋裡藏了什麼嗎，mec？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道他在我的棚屋里藏了什么吗，mec？

Key.Original: Half a kilo of it. So, that's why I called you.
Key.Chinese: 大概半公斤。所以我才會打給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有半公斤。所以我给你打电话。

Key.Original: I was thinking that you could make it, go away.
Key.Chinese: 我在想，或許你能解決這件事。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想你可以把这个问题处理掉，去吧。

Container.name: 005_fil_driving_situation_b
Container.situation: arthur argues with his son, lucas, on the phone.

Key.Original: Lucas.
Key.Chinesesimp: Lucas。

Key.Original: Ta gueule, écoute !
Key.Chinesesimp: 闭嘴，听好了！

Key.Original: L'Ensemble - whatever. Like there's a difference.
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会 - 随便啦。反正都一样。

Key.Original: The hell you will! It's gone, we're getting rid of it.
Key.Chinese: 這還用說！我們必須把它處理掉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你会才怪！行了，我们该把它处理掉了。

Key.Original: Je ne suis pas seul, je vais parler en anglais.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有其他人，我說英文好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不是一个人，我要说英语。

Key.Original: Boy, who raise you to be so stupid?
Key.Chinesesimp: 小子，谁把你养这么笨的？

Key.Original: I found the explosives!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我找到了炸药！

Key.Original: I mean, what were you gonna do, eh?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是说，你打算怎么办？

Key.Original: No, no, no, no, wait. I don't wanna know, I don't want.
Key.Chinese: 不不不，等等，我不想知道，別說。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，不，不，等等。我不想知道，我不想知道。

Key.Original: What...?
You think Syndikat care about that?
Key.Chinese: 你覺得 Syndikat 會在乎這種事嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 你觉得辛迪加会在乎这事？

Key.Original: A revolution!
Key.Chinesesimp: 一场革命！

Key.Original: No! No, not you! Le Légionnaire and moi. You stay out of this.
Key.Chinese: 不！不，你不行！Le Légionnaire 跟我。你別來攪和。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不！不，你不行！Le Légionnaire 跟我。你别管这事。

Container.name: 004_fil_driving_situation_a
Container.situation: arthur talks to player while they are driving. he begins to explain his problem, but is interupted by a phonecall.

Key.Original: La petite merde...
Key.Chinesesimp: 这小王八蛋...

Key.Original: He's gone too far, let me tell you.
Key.Chinese: 依我看來，他這次太過份了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我告诉你，他太过分了。

Key.Original: The idiocy here...
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是个白痴...

Key.Original: The idiocy here... that's the real malaria, mec, y'know?
Key.Chinese: 這才是真正的瘧疾，mec，知道吧？
Key.Chinesesimp: 这才是真正的疟疾，你知道吧，mec？

Key.Original: So many minds, like, er, bad water.
Key.Chinese: 很多人就像……嗯，死水一潭。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很多人就像，呃，死水一潭。

Key.Original: CSAT, Syndikat; all mosquitoes.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 和 Syndikat 都跟蚊子一樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协和辛迪加，都跟蚊子一样。

Key.Original: Infecting us, sucking up our blood.
Key.Chinese: 他們感染我們、吸食我們的鮮血。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们感染我们，吸光我们的血。

Key.Original: Huh, bordel. Look who's calling!
Key.Chinesesimp: 啊，bordel，看看谁打电话来了！

Container.name: 003_ta_go_to_village
Container.situation: player meets arthur and together they go his village, to deal with a difficult situation.

Key.Original: Salut, good to see you.
Key.Chinesesimp: Salut，很高兴见到你。

Key.Original: This problem? It's a Lucas problem.
Key.Chinese: 這個問題？這是盧卡斯的問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这个问题？是 Lucas 的问题。

Key.Original: Gonna need a ride back to my place.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我得搭车回我那去。

Container.name: 002_ta_meet_arthur_call
Container.situation: arthur calls player and asks him to meet him over the phone, due to an urgent situation.

Key.Original: Hey, it's Artie.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿，我是 Artie。

Key.Original: I got your money, mec. And one more problem.
Key.Chinese: 你的錢在我手上，mec。不過還有一個問題。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的钱在我手上，mec。而且还有一个问题。

Key.Original: It ain't nothing heavy - not for an old gros dur like you.
Key.Chinese: 這對你這樣的老 gros dur 來說不算什麼。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这没什么大不了的 - 对你这把老骨头来说。

Key.Original: But, er, yeah. I can't talk. Better you get over here, now.
Key.Chinese: 不過嘛，這……嗯。我現在說不清楚，你最好趕快過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过，呃，嗯。我现在不能说，你最好现在就到这来。

Key.Original: I'm at the shanties in Ouméré.
Key.Chinese: 我在 Ouméré 的小屋子裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在奥默里的棚屋里。

Key.Original: Follow the dirt road by the harbor. Last house on the left.
Key.Chinese: 順著碼頭的泥路走到底，左邊最後一棟屋子。
Key.Chinesesimp: 沿着港口旁的土路走。左边的最后一幢房子。

Key.Original: Acquire an airport access pass. This can be taken from L’Ensemble’s contact, who owns a <marker name = '%2'>nightclub in Lifou</marker>. Otherwise, it can be obtained by bribing <marker name = '%1'>airport security</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 取得機場通行證。你可以從 L’Ensemble 的聯繫人手中取得該通行證；此人在<marker name = '%2'> Lifou 有一間夜店</marker>。或者，你也可透過賄賂<marker name = '%1'>機場保安</marker>來取得通行證。
Key.Chinesesimp: 获得机场通行证。可从大帮会的联系人那里搞到通行证；此人是<marker name = '%2'>利福夜总会</marker>的老板。另外，也可以通过贿赂<marker name = '%1'>机场保安</marker>搞到通行证。

Key.Original: Tanoa. 2038.
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚。2038 年。

Key.Original: Get Airport Access Card
Key.Chinesesimp: 获得机场门禁卡

Key.Original: Exercise Safe Horizon has ended.
Key.Chinesesimp: “安全地平线演习”结束了。

Key.Original: Collect the airplane at <marker name = '%1'>Aéroport de Tanoa</marker> and take it to <marker name = '%2'>Bala airstrip</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 在<marker name = '%1'>塔諾雅機場</marker>取得飛機並將其帶至<marker name = '%2'>巴拉小機場</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在<marker name = '%1'>塔诺亚机场</marker>接收飞机并把它飞到<marker name = '%2'>巴拉小机场</marker>。

Key.Original: NATO have reneged on their commitments. A malaria epidemic spreads...
Key.Chinese: NATO 背棄了他們的承諾。瘧疾疫情持續擴散…
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约违背了自己的承诺。虐疾疫情蔓延开了...

Key.Original: Transport Plane
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输机

Key.Original: And a newly elected government calls for humanitarian support - from CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 新當選的政府向 CSAT 請求人道援助。
Key.Chinesesimp: 新当选的政府向广协请求人道支援。

Key.Original: Get Lucas to a <marker name = '%1'>secure location</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 帶盧卡斯到<marker name = '%1'>安全地點</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将 Lucas 送到一个<marker name = '%1'>安全的地方</marker>。

Key.Original: First they sent their doctors. Then, they sent their soldiers.
Key.Chinese: 開始時，他們派來了醫生。然後，他們開始派遣士兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们先派来了医生。然后又派来了士兵。

Key.Original: Help Lucas
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助 Lucas

Key.Original: The criminal organization, known as Syndikat, has become 'politique'...
Key.Chinese: 犯罪組織 Syndikat 開始涉政了…
Key.Chinesesimp: 名为辛迪加的犯罪组织卷入“政治”运动...

Key.Original: Arthur's son, Lucas, has been captured by CSAT. Try to locate his whereabouts and get him to a safe place.
Key.Chinese: 亞瑟的兒子盧卡斯被 CSAT 抓住了。試著找出他的位置並將他帶到安全的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: Arthur 的儿子 Lucas 被广协逮捕。设法找到他的行踪并把他带到一个安全的地方。

Key.Original: After a power struggle and 3 years of gang warfare, a legitimate insurgency has been born.
Key.Chinese: 在權力紛爭和 3 年的幫派爭鬥後，一場真正的暴動就此誕生了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 经过一场权力斗争和三年的帮派战争，一场合法的起义应运而生。

Key.Original: Find Lucas
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到 Lucas

Key.Original: And now, it threatens to tear the beautiful South Pacific archipelago apart.
Key.Chinese: 現在，它將對美麗的南太平洋群島造成災難性打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，这眼看就要对这个美丽的南太平洋群岛带来致命打击。

Key.Original: It seems CSAT have some sort of counteragent for this super-strain of malaria. Its location however, remains a mystery. Do your best to get hold of it.
Key.Chinese: 看來 CSAT 手中有這種超級瘧疾的解藥，不過，我們並不知道解藥在哪裡。盡力取得解藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协似乎有这种超级虐疾毒株的解药。不过，解药放在什么地方却是一个谜。竭尽全力去搞到解药吧。

Key.Original: But not everybody's abandoned the old ways.
Key.Chinese: 不過，並非所有人都背棄了傳統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不过并非每个人都放弃了传统。

Key.Original: Get the Counteragent
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞到解药

Key.Original: Some still remember what it means to have fidelity, and honor.
Key.Chinese: 還是有些人記得忠誠與榮譽的意義。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有人仍然记得忠诚和荣誉意味着什么。

Key.Original: Take the sample of CSAT's counteragent to Dr. Drábek.
Key.Chinese: 把 CSAT 解藥的樣本交給德拉貝克醫生。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把广协的解药样品交给 Drábek 医生。

Key.Original: Old Man
Key.Chinesesimp: 老头

Key.Original: Give Doctor the Counteragent
Key.Chinesesimp: 把解药交给医生

Key.Original: NATO has abandoned the Horizon Islands to CSAT and a deadly super-strain of malaria. But not everyone is giving up the fight...
Key.Chinese: NATO 放棄了 Horizon 群島，CSAT 取而代之；並且，致命的超級品系瘧疾席捲整個群島。不過，並非所有人都放棄了抗爭…
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约放弃了地平线群岛，让它落入广协和致命超级虐疾毒株的魔掌。但并非每个人都放弃了战斗...

Key.Original: Search for a truck or other large vehicle and take it to Dr. Drábek in the <marker name = '%1'>jungle</marker>. He and his patients are in danger and need to relocate...
Key.Chinese: 找到一輛卡車或其他大型載具，並將其帶到 <marker name = '%1'>叢林</marker>中給德拉貝克醫生。他和他的病患們處於危險中，他們必須遷離…
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到一辆卡车或其他大型载具并将其交给<marker name = '%1'>丛林</marker>中的 Drábek 医生。他和他的患者们处于危险之中，需要挪个地方...

Key.Original: A former French Légionnaire and his CTRG handler monitor suspicious CSAT activity in the town of Ouméré.
Key.Chinese: 法國兵團退役軍士和他的 CTRG 管理人在 Ouméré 小鎮中監視可疑的 CSAT 活動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一位前法国军人和他的战研大队接头人在监视奥默里镇内广协的可疑活动。

Key.Original: Deliver Transport
Key.Chinesesimp: 交付运输车

Key.Original: Investigate Camp
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查营地

Key.Original: Recover Howard the archaeologist's <marker name = '%1'>documents</marker> and sell them on the black market.
Key.Chinese: 取回考古學家霍華德的<marker name = '%1'>檔案</marker>並拿到黑市中出售。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找回考古学家 Howard 的<marker name = '%1'>文件</marker>并在黑市上卖掉这些文件。

Key.Original: Keystone has been monitoring suspicious CSAT activity in <marker name = '%1'>Ouméré</marker>. Go to the now abandoned camp and search for evidence. It's possible the unit stationed there was connected in some way to the malaria outbreak in <marker name = '%2'>Luganville</marker>.
Key.Chinese: Keystone 在監視 CSAT 於 <marker name = '%1'>Ouméré</marker>的可疑活動。前往廢棄營地尋找證據。駐守此處的單位可能與<marker name = '%2'>盧甘村</marker>的瘧疾疫情有關。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"一直在监视广协在<marker name = '%1'>奥默里</marker>的可疑活动。前往已经废弃的营地并搜寻证据。驻扎在那儿的部队可能与<marker name = '%2'>卢甘威尔</marker>的虐疾疫情爆发有关联。

Key.Original: Research Papers
Key.Chinesesimp: 研究论文

Key.Original: Destroy Radars
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁雷达

Key.Original: Dr. Drábek needs medicine. Bring any anti-malarial drugs you can find to his <marker name = '%1'>camp in the jungle</marker>. The clock is ticking...
Key.Chinese: 德拉貝克醫生需要更多藥物。將你找到的抗瘧疾藥物帶至他在<marker name = '%1'>叢林裡的營地</marker>。抓緊行動，時間緊迫…
Key.Chinesesimp: Drábek 需要药物。把你能找到的所有抗虐疾药送到<marker name = '%1'>丛林中的营地</marker>。时间紧迫，要争分夺秒...

Key.Original: Disrupting CSAT's radar coverage on Tanoa by removing both their primary and auxiliary radar sites could open the possibility of an airstrike. Keystone, however, cannot provide any kind of air support…
Key.Chinese: 摧毀主雷達站與輔助雷達站，中斷 CSAT 在塔諾雅的雷達範圍；這樣我們就能夠展開空襲。然而，Keystone 無法提供任何空中協助…
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁广协的主雷达站和备用雷达站，中断其对塔诺亚的雷达覆盖，为空袭做好准备。不过，"基石"无法提供任何形式的空中支援...

Key.Original: Get Doctor Medicine
Key.Chinesesimp: 为医生搞到药物

Key.Original: Disable autonomous turrets
Key.Chinesesimp: 关闭自动炮塔

Key.Original: Once you have found anti-malarial medicine, get it to <marker name = '%1'>Dr. Drábek</marker>. He'll need a couple of boxes worth, at least.
Key.Chinese: 你找到抗瘧疾藥物後，將它帶給<marker name = '%1'>德拉貝克醫生</marker>。他至少需要幾箱藥物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到抗虐疾药后，立即把药物交给 <marker name = '%1'>Drábek 医生</marker>。他至少需要好几箱药物。

Key.Original: Recent intel reveals CSAT's lab on Tuvanaka is protected by a series of autonomous weapons. If they could be shut down somehow, it would be open to attack.
Key.Chinese: 最近的情報表明，土萬納卡上的 CSAT 實驗室配備許多自動武器進行保護。如果我們能夠關閉這些武器，或許我們就能夠展開攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最近的情报表明，广协在突瓦纳加的实验室装备了一系列自动武器来加强保护。如果能设法关闭这些武器，实验室的防御就形同虚设了。

Key.Original: Get Doctor Medicine
Key.Chinesesimp: 为医生搞到药物

Key.Original: Reconnaissance Photos
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察照片

Key.Original: Appropriate the dirty money belonging to the corrupt <marker name = '%1'>gendarme</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 取得腐敗的國<marker name = '%1'>家憲兵</marker>的非法財物。
Key.Chinesesimp: 盗用属于腐败<marker name = '%1'>宪兵</marker>的赃款。

Key.Original: Retrieve the photos of the military island from the plane on the bottom of the ocean.
Key.Chinese: 從沈入海底的飛機上取得軍事島嶼的相片。
Key.Chinesesimp: 取回沉入海底的飞机上的军事岛屿照片。

Key.Original: Steal Gendarme's Money
Key.Chinesesimp: 偷宪兵的钱

Key.Original: Support L'Ensemble
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援大帮会

Key.Original: Leave the City
Key.Chinesesimp: 离开城市

Key.Original: Cooperate with former Syndikat criminals and local insurgents, united by L'Ensemble, to oppose CSAT's operations on Tanoa.
Key.Chinese: 與 L'Ensemble 麾下的前 Syndikat 罪犯和當地的反抗軍合作，以反抗 CSAT 在塔諾雅的行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与大帮会联合起来的前辛迪加罪犯和当地叛乱分子合作，对抗广协在塔诺亚的行动。

Key.Original: Do as Samjo says and get out of Georgetown.
Key.Chinese: 照山姆卓的指引逃離喬治鎮。
Key.Chinesesimp: 依照"山姆卓"的指示逃出乔治敦。

Key.Original: Help Civilians
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助平民

Key.Original: Rendezvous with Keystone on the <marker name = '%1'>island of Sainte-Marie</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 在<marker name = '%1'>聖瑪莉島</marker>與 Keystone 會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在<marker name = '%1'>圣玛丽岛</marker>与"基石"会合。

Key.Original: Dr. Drábek is doing what he can to care for civilians infected with the super-strain malaria in Luganville. He has asked for your assistance.
Key.Chinese: 德拉貝克醫生正在盡力照顧被超級瘧疾感染的盧甘村平民。他請求你的協助。
Key.Chinesesimp: Drábek 正在卢甘威尔尽力照顾感染超级虐疾毒株的平民。他请求你给予帮助。

Key.Original: Meet Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见"基石"

Key.Original: Prevent Malaria Crisis
Key.Chinesesimp: 阻止虐疾危机

Key.Original: It's time to get as far away from the Tanoan archipelago as possible...
Key.Chinese: 現在，你該盡量逃離塔諾雅群島，越遠越好…
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在该离开塔诺亚群岛了，能走多远就走多远...

Key.Original: A mysterious and deadly malaria epidemic is spreading across Tanoa. And it seems that CSAT are somehow responsible. Do what you can to prevent an escalation of this crisis.
Key.Chinese: 神秘而致命的瘧疾瘟疫在塔諾雅全境擴散。看來是出自 CSAT 的手筆。盡力防止此危機繼續惡化。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一场神秘而且致命的虐疾疫情正在塔诺亚全境蔓延。看来广协似乎是始作甬者。尽力防止危机升级。

Key.Original: Escape Tanoa
Key.Chinesesimp: 逃离塔诺亚

Key.Original: Help Arthur
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助 Arthur

Key.Original: Go to L'Ensemble's dead-drop in Tanoa's capital city, Georgetown. Leave the counteragent sample in the back of a blue van, behind the meat market, opposite the cathedral.
Key.Chinese: 前往塔諾雅首都的 L'Ensemble 秘密情報傳遞點。把解藥樣本放在大教堂對面、肉品市場後方的藍色廂型車後座。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往大帮会在塔诺亚首都的秘密传递点。将解药样品放在大教堂对面、肉市后面的蓝色货车后座上。

Key.Original: Arthur, an old friend of yours, has a 'problem'. Do what you can to help.
Key.Chinese: 亞瑟，你的老朋友遇到「麻煩」了。快去幫幫他。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的老朋友 Arthur 遇到了“麻烦”。尽力帮助他。

Key.Original: Deliver the Counteragent
Key.Chinesesimp: 送解药

Key.Original: Rescue Lucas
Key.Chinesesimp: 解救 Lucas

Key.Original: A vehicle has been prepared for you and rigged with explosives. Collect it from L’Ensemble’s <marker name = '%1'>garage</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 車輛已經為你準備好了，車上裝滿了炸彈。到 L’Ensemble 的<marker name = '%1'>車庫</marker>提取車輛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为你准备了一辆车，里面装了炸弹。去大帮会的<marker name = '%1'>车库</marker>取车。

Key.Original: CSAT counter insurgency operators discovered an explosive charge in a shed outside Arthur's house. They arrested his son, Lucas, and took him away. Rescue him!
Key.Chinese: CSAT 反暴動調查人員在亞瑟房子外的小屋中發現了炸藥。他們逮捕並帶走了他的兒子盧卡斯。去把他救出來！
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协平叛作战人员在 Arthur 家外的棚屋里发现一枚炸弹！他们逮捕并带走了 Arthur 的儿子 Lucas。去解救 Lucas。

Key.Original: Collect Car
Key.Chinesesimp: 取车

Key.Original: Support Attack
Key.Chinesesimp: 协助进攻

Key.Original: Detonate explosives outside an office block belonging to the gendarmerie in <marker name = '%1'>Katkoula</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 在<marker name = '%1'>卡特庫拉</marker>國家憲兵辦公室大樓外引爆炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引爆<marker name = '%1'>凯特库拉</marker>宪兵队办公楼外的炸弹。

Key.Original: %3 insurgents are assaulting an <marker name = '%1'>enemy base</marker> at %2. Help them so L'Ensemble will assist you in the future.
Key.Chinese: %3 名反抗軍正在突擊位於 %2 的<marker name = '%1'>敵方基地</marker>。幫助他們，這樣的話，L'Ensemble 以後就會協助你。
Key.Chinesesimp: %3 个叛军将于 %2 攻击一处<marker name = '%1'>敌军基地</marker>。帮助他们，这样大帮会以后也会帮你。

Key.Original: Destroy Police Station
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁警察局

Key.Original: Distraction
Key.Chinesesimp: 转移注意力

Key.Original: Set down on the <marker name = '%1'>open fields</marker> near the Tanoa Sugar Company, so L'Ensemble guerrillas can load your aircraft with some special cargo.
Key.Chinese: 在塔諾雅製糖公司附近的<marker name = '%1'>空地</marker>降落，以便於 L'Ensemble 的游擊兵把特殊貨櫃搬上你的飛機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在塔诺亚糖业公司附近<marker name = '%1'>空地</marker>上降落，以便大帮会游击队将一些特殊的货物装到你的飞机上。

Key.Original: almost dead
Key.Chinesesimp: 奄奄一息

Key.Original: Collect Cargo
Key.Chinesesimp: 取货

Key.Original: bad
Key.Chinesesimp: 糟糕

Key.Original: Fly the plane to <marker name = '%1'>Bala Airstrip</marker> and land with its illicit cargo.
Key.Chinese: 將飛機駕駛至<marker name = '%1'>巴拉小機場</marker>並帶著非法貨櫃降落。
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶飞机飞往<marker name = '%1'>巴拉小机场</marker>，并带着非法货物降落在机场上。

Key.Original: dies in an hour
Key.Chinesesimp: 一小时内死亡

Key.Original: Land at Bala Airstrip
Key.Chinesesimp: 在巴拉小机场降落

Key.Original: dying fast
Key.Chinesesimp: 即将死亡

Key.Original: There's been a change of plan. Get to the new staging area in <marker name = '%1'>Koumac</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 計畫有變；前往<marker name = '%1'>庫馬克</marker>的新集結區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 计划有变。前往<marker name = '%1'>库马克</marker>的新集结区。

Key.Original: fine
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好

Key.Original: Go to Koumac
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往库马克

Key.Original: good
Key.Chinesesimp: 良好

Key.Original: Insurgents sympathetic to L'Ensemble are almost ready for the operation against CSAT. It will begin from <marker name = '%1'>Cerebu</marker>, at 20:00.
Key.Chinese: 支援 L'Ensemble 的反抗軍就快完成了針對 CSAT 的作戰準備。此行動將在 20:00 於<marker name = '%1'>西盧布</marker>展開。
Key.Chinesesimp: 支持大帮会的叛军就要准备好对广协采取行动了。他们将从<marker name = '%1'>塞热布</marker>展开行动，时间是 20:00。

Key.Original: not good
Key.Chinesesimp: 不好

Key.Original: Go to Cerebu
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往塞热布

Key.Original: slowly dying
Key.Chinesesimp: 慢慢死去

Key.Original: L'Ensemble are getting ready for a major offensive. As it's planned to be a night-time attack, they require night vision goggles. Get hold of at least 5 devices and take them to the designated insurgent <marker name = '%3'>stash</marker> before the %4. The optics themselves can be captured from isolated CSAT patrols or poorly defended checkpoints. The <marker name = '%2'>gendarme depot</marker> suggested by Samjo may also be a good target.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 正在準備一場大型攻勢。由於這次攻擊計畫在夜間進行，他們需要夜視鏡。在 %4 前取得至少 5 個夜視鏡並將其帶至指定的反抗軍<marker name = '%3'>藏匿點</marker>。你能從分散的 CSAT 巡邏隊手中、或在防禦鬆懈的管制哨取得夜視鏡。山姆卓提及的<marker name = '%2'>國家憲兵倉庫</marker>也可能是個不錯的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会准备发动一场重要攻势。由于计划在夜间展开进攻，他们需要夜视镜。至少搞到 5 件并在 %4 之前将其送到指定的叛军<marker name = '%3'>藏匿点</marker>。可从广协巡逻队或防御薄弱的关卡中夺取夜视镜。"山姆卓"推荐的<marker name = '%2'>宪兵队补给站</marker>也可能是个不错的目标。

Key.Original: very bad
Key.Chinesesimp: 非常糟糕

Key.Original: Get NVGs
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到夜视镜

Key.Original: Destroy Weapons Lab
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁武器实验室

Key.Original: Join the <marker name = '%2'>anti-government insurgents</marker> in their boat, ferry them across Yanukka Bay, and disembark at the <marker name = '%1'>insertion point</marker> on the opposite shore.
Key.Chinese: 登上<marker name = '%2'>反政府反抗軍</marker>的船艦，幫助他們渡過雅努卡灣。在海岸對面的<marker name = '%1'>插入</marker>下船。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上船加入<marker name = '%2'>反政府叛军</marker>，开船帮他们穿过雅努加湾，并在对岸的<marker name = '%1'>插入点</marker>上岸。

Key.Original: Take down CSAT's biogenetic weapons lab, located on the heavily defended <marker name = '%1'>island of Tuvanaka</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀 CSAT 的生物基因武器實驗室；該實驗室位於防禦嚴密的<marker name = '%1'>土萬納卡島嶼</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 破坏广协的生物基因武器实验室；该实验室位于<marker name = '%1'>图瓦那卡岛</marker>，防御非常严密。

Key.Original: Transport Team
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输队

Key.Original: Take Explosive Charge
Key.Chinesesimp: 取炸药

Key.Original: Sabotage one of the two silos in CSAT's <marker name = '%1'>fuel depot</marker> using an explosive charge.
Key.Chinese: 使用炸藥破壞 CSAT <marker name = '%1'>燃料庫</marker> 的兩個儲倉中的一個。
Key.Chinesesimp: 用炸药破坏广协<marker name = '%1'>油库</marker>两个油罐中的一个。

Key.Original: A charge has been hidden in a <marker name = '%1'>shed</marker>, next to Arthur's house. Take it away and keep it safe.
Key.Chinese: 炸藥藏在亞瑟家旁的<marker name = '%1'>小屋</marker>中。取走炸藥並確保炸藥安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: 炸药藏在 Arthur 房屋旁的一处<marker name = '%1'>棚屋</marker>里。取走炸药并确保安全。

Key.Original: Destroy Silos
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁油罐

Key.Original: Destroy House
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁房屋

Key.Original: Disable CSAT's main radar site on <marker name = '%1'>Mont Tanoa</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀 CSAT 在<marker name = '%1'>塔諾雅山</marker>的主雷達站。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁广协在<marker name = '%1'>塔诺亚山</marker>上的主雷达站。

Key.Original: Blow up the <marker name = '%1'>house</marker> that the gendarmerie have seized in Vagalala. Explosives can be found at the <marker name = '%3'>Red Spring Mine</marker> or the evidence room of the nearby <marker name = '%4'>police station</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 炸毀國家憲兵在瓦加拉拉奪取的<marker name = '%1'>房屋</marker>。你能在<marker name = '%3'>紅泉礦場</marker>或附近的<marker name = '%4'>警察局</marker>證物室中找到炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 炸毁宪兵队在瓦加拉拉夺取的那幢<marker name = '%1'>房屋</marker>。可在<marker name = '%3'>红泉矿场</marker>或附近<marker name = '%4'>警察局</marker>的证物室内找到炸药。

Key.Original: Destroy Radar
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁雷达

Key.Original: Deliver ID Card
Key.Chinesesimp: 送交身份证

Key.Original: Knock out the <marker name = '%1'>auxiliary radar station</marker> belonging to CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀 CSAT 的<marker name = '%1'>輔助雷達站</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁广协的<marker name = '%1'>备用雷达站</marker>。

Key.Original: Take the captive's ID card to his <marker name = '%1'>friend</marker>. He should be at his garage between 12:00 and 20:00. Alternatively, drop it at <marker name = '%2'>L'Ensemble's cache</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 把俘虜的 ID 卡交給他的<marker name = '%1'>朋友</marker>。他應該會在 12:00 至 20:00 間出現在車庫附近。另外，你也可以把 ID 卡放在 <marker name = '%2'>L'Ensemble 的隱藏點</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将俘虏的身份证交给他的<marker name = '%1'>朋友</marker>。此人应该会在 12:00 到 20:00 点之间出现在车库附近。或者，将身份证放到<marker name = '%2'>大帮会的密室</marker>里。

Key.Original: Destroy Mobile Radar
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁机动雷达

Key.Original: Cocoa Plantation
Key.Chinesesimp: 可可种植园

Key.Original: To reboot CSAT's network and install Keystone's virus, restart the uninterruptible power supply. It should be somewhere near the computers.
Key.Chinese: 要重啟 CSAT 的網路並安裝 Keystone 的病毒，你必須重啟不間斷電源。不間斷電源應該會在電腦附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如要重启广协的网络并安装"基石"的病毒，先重新启动不间断电源。该电源应位于计算机附近。

Key.Original: It appears Samjo's comrade has been taken to a nearby cocoa farm. Kill his captors and help him escape.
Key.Chinese: 看來山姆卓的同伴被帶到附近的可可農園。殺了挾持他的人並幫助他逃脫。
Key.Chinesesimp: "山姆卓"的同伙似乎被带到附近一处可可农场。干掉俘虏他的人并帮他逃跑。

Key.Original: Reset the UPS
Key.Chinesesimp: 重置不间断电源

Key.Original: Rescue Captive (Optional)
Key.Chinesesimp: 解救俘虏（可选任务）

Key.Original: Keystone has prepared a program which will disable CSAT's autonomous weapons once uploaded to their network. Meet with him <marker name = '%1'>in the jungle</marker> and collect the flash drive with the virus.
Key.Chinese: Keystone 準備好了一個程式，把它上載至對方的網路後，該程式將會關閉 CSAT 的自動武器。到<marker name = '%1'>叢林中</marker>與他碰面並取得病毒的隨身碟。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"编写了一个程序，将程序上传到广协的网络即可破坏他们的自动武器。<marker name = '%1'>在丛林里</marker>与他碰面，并取走带病毒的闪存盘。

Key.Original: Release Samjo's man from the <marker name = '%2'>police station</marker> in Vagalala, if he's still there...
Key.Chinese: 從瓦加拉拉的<marker name = '%2'>警察局</marker>救出山姆卓的人手；希望他還在那裡…
Key.Chinesesimp: 把"山姆卓"的人从瓦加拉拉的<marker name = '%2'>警察局</marker>救出来，如果他还在那儿的话...

Key.Original: Install Virus
Key.Chinesesimp: 安装病毒

Key.Original: Get Some Sleep
Key.Chinesesimp: 睡一会儿

Key.Original: Network Structure Plans are required to neutralize CSAT's autonomous weapon systems. Secure this intel and return it to your handler, <marker name = '%1'>Keystone</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 我們需要網路架構圖來關閉 CSAT 的自動武器系統。取得此情報並交給你的管理人<marker name = '%1'>Keystone</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 需要网络结构图来摧毁广协的自动武器系统。取到情报并将其交给你的接头人 <marker name = '%1'>"基石"</marker>。

Key.Original: Rest up on your sofa. Keystone will contact you again at 6:30.
Key.Chinese: 在沙發上休息一下；Keystone 會在 6:30 與你聯絡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在沙发上休息。"基石"会在 6:30 再与你联系。

Key.Original: Network Structure Plans
Key.Chinesesimp: 网络结构图

Key.Original: Sensitive information has been sent to you. Go <marker name = '%1'>home</marker> and access your laptop.
Key.Chinese: 我把重要資訊傳給你了。回<marker name = '%1'>家</marker>並使用你的筆電存取資訊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已将敏感信息发送给你。回到<marker name = '%1'>家里</marker>，打开笔记本电脑查阅。

Key.Original: Prevent CSAT from interrupting the virus upload.
Key.Chinese: 阻止 CSAT 阻斷病毒上載
Key.Chinesesimp: 防止广协中断病毒上传。

Key.Original: Check Emails
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查电子邮件

Key.Original: Defend the PC
Key.Chinesesimp: 保护电脑

Key.Original: Meet Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见"基石"

Key.Original: Go to the <marker name = '%1'>location</marker> where Keystone's reconnaissance plane was last seen and dive beneath the waves. Search for the wreckage and recover the intel on CSAT's weapons lab.
Key.Chinese: 前往 Keystone 偵察機最後出現的<marker name = '%1'>地點</marker>，並潛入海底。搜索殘骸，並取回 CSAT 武器實驗室的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往"基石"侦察机最后出现的<marker name = '%1'>地点</marker>，然后潜入水下。搜寻残骸并取回广协武器实验室上的情报。

Key.Original: Talk with your handler, Keystone, at your rendezvous point <marker name = '%1'>in the jungle</marker>. He should be there from %2.
Key.Chinese: 到<marker name = '%1'>叢林中</marker>的會合點和你的管理人 Keystone 碰面。他應該會在 %2 後出現在那裡
Key.Chinesesimp: 在<marker name = '%1'>丛林中的</marker>会合点与你的接头人"基石"交谈。他应该会 %2 之后就在那儿。

Key.Original: Recover Intel
Key.Chinesesimp: 取回情报

Key.Original: Meet Contact
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见联络人

Key.Original: Find a rebreather for deep sea diving, either by <marker name = '%2'>buying one</marker> or stealing one from the maritime gendarme station in the <marker name = '%1'>village of Lösi</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 為了進行深海潛水，你必須找到呼吸器。你可以選擇<marker name = '%2'>購買</marker>或到<marker name = '%1'> Lösi 村莊</marker>的海上國家憲兵基地偷取一個呼吸器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞到呼吸器，以进行深海潜水；你可以<marker name = '%2'>购买一副</marker>，也可从<marker name = '%1'>罗西村</marker>的海上宪兵站偷一副。

Key.Original: Dr. Drábek has organized a meeting with an important figure in Tanoa's insurgency, at a warehouse <marker name = '%1'>in the big banana plantation</marker> near Ouméré. Go there, talk to him, and earn his trust.
Key.Chinese: 德拉貝克醫生安排你和一名重要的塔諾雅反抗軍見面，地點就在 Ouméré 附近<marker name = '%1'>大型香蕉農園</marker>的倉庫中。前往此處，和他談談並贏得他的信任。
Key.Chinesesimp: Drábek 安排了一次会面，对方是参与塔诺亚叛乱的重要人物，地点是奥默里附近的<marker name = '%1'>大香蕉种植园</marker>仓库。前往该处，和他谈谈并取得他的信任。

Key.Original: Get Rebreather
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞到呼吸器

Key.Original: Meet Contact
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见联络人

Key.Original: Go to <marker name = '%3'>Ouméré</marker> and collect evidence for Keystone by taking photographs of anything interesting.
Key.Chinese: 前往 <marker name = '%3'>Ouméré</marker> 並拍下任何有關的事物，為 Keystone 收集情資。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往<marker name = '%3'>奥默里</marker>并为"基石"收集证据：拍下任何有价值的东西。

Key.Original: Keystone has organized a meeting with an important figure in Tanoa's insurgency, at a warehouse <marker name = '%1'>in the big banana plantation</marker> near Ouméré. Go there, talk to him, and earn his trust.
Key.Chinese: Keystone 安排你和一名重要的塔諾雅反抗軍見面，地點就在 Ouméré 附近的<marker name = '%1'>大型香蕉農園</marker>倉庫中。前往此處，和他談談並贏得他的信任。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"安排了一次会面，对方是参与塔诺亚叛乱的重要人物，地点是奥默里附近的<marker name = '%1'>大香蕉种植园</marker>仓库。前往该处，和他谈谈并取得他的信任。

Key.Original: Locate CSAT Unit
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到广协部队

Key.Original: Meet Arthur
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见 Arthur

Key.Original: Investigate the fate of the man washed up on the shore, based on his journal notes...
Key.Chinese: 閱讀日記來調查被波浪沖上岸邊的男子的命運…
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据那个被冲上岸的人的日志，探究他的命运...

Key.Original: Go to Arthur in the <marker name = '%1'>shanties</marker>, on the east side of Ouméré.
Key.Chinese: 到 Ouméré 東邊的<marker name = '%1'>小屋中</marker>與亞瑟碰面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在奥默里东侧的<marker name = '%1'>棚屋</marker>找到 Arthur。

Key.Original: Mysterious Body
Key.Chinesesimp: 神秘的尸体

Key.Original: Drive to Village
Key.Chinesesimp: 开车前往村庄

Key.Original: Accompany Arthur to his <marker name = '%1'>home</marker>, just outside Luganville.
Key.Chinese: 陪同亞瑟一起前往盧甘村外的<marker name = '%1'>房屋</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将 Arthur 送到他<marker name = '%1'>家里</marker>，就在刚出卢甘威尔镇的地方。

Key.Original: Await Call from Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待"基石"的电话

Key.Original: Get to Cerebu
Key.Chinesesimp: 到达塞热布

Key.Original: Meet Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见"基石"

Key.Original: The attack on CSAT's <marker name = '%1'>fuel depot</marker> will begin in 5 minutes. Find a good position and wait.
Key.Chinese: 5 分鐘後對 CSAT 的<marker name = '%1'>燃料庫</marker>展開攻擊。找個好位置等著。
Key.Chinesesimp: 5 分钟后将对广协的<marker name = '%1'>油库</marker>发起攻击。找个好位置等着。

Key.Original: Take the documents back to <marker name = '%1'>Keystone</marker>.
Key.Chinesesimp: 将文件取回交给 <marker name = '%1'>"基石"</marker>。

Key.Original: Infiltrate a CSAT base, restart the power supply, and upload Keystone's virus on a computer. To do so without raising the alarm, you will need to steal an access card from an enemy officer.
Key.Chinese: 潛入 CSAT 基地，重啟電源，然後將 Keystone 的病毒上載至電腦中。要避免觸發警報，你必須從敵方軍官手中偷取一張門禁卡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 潜入广协基地，重启电源，并将"基石"的病毒上传到电脑。要完成这项任务而不触发警报，就必须从敌军军官那里窃取一张门禁卡。

Key.Original: Follow-up on the intel you found in Ouméré and look for another lead in <marker name = '%1'>Harcourt</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 深入調查你在 Ouméré 取得的情資，並調查<marker name = '%1'>哈爾科特</marker>的另一個線索。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跟进你在奥默里找到的情报，并调查<marker name = '%1'>哈科特</marker>找到的另一条线索。

Key.Original: Take the documents you recovered to <marker name = '%1'>Keystone</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 把你取回的檔案帶給 <marker name = '%1'>Keystone</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将你取回的文件交给 <marker name = '%1'>"基石"</marker>。

Key.Original: Destroy CSAT's <marker name = '%1'>weapons lab</marker> on the militarized island of Tuvanaka.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀 CSAT 在土萬納卡軍事化島嶼上的 <marker name = '%1'>武器實驗室</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁广协位于图瓦那卡军事化岛屿上的<marker name = '%1'>武器实验室</marker>。

Key.Original: It seems as though Samjo's man has been relocated to a police safe house at a <marker name = '%1'>cocoa farm</marker>, just outside Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 看來山姆卓的手下已經被帶到了一處警方密屋；該密屋位於瓦加拉拉外的<marker name = '%1'>可可農場</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "山姆卓"的人似乎转移到<marker name = '%1'>可可农场</marker>的一所警察密屋里去了，就在瓦加拉拉外面一点的地方。

Key.Original: You wanting guns, Képi blanc? I know place. Orange ship container in Blue Pearl. Next to IDAP one. Only one like it in the port. But you no have easy time of it. Big time guarded.
Key.Chinese: 你需要槍嗎，Képi blanc？我知道一個地方。Blue Pearl 有個橘色的貨櫃；就在 IDAP 標記的貨櫃旁邊。全港就它一個，不過想成功奪取並不容易，那裡戒備森嚴。
Key.Chinesesimp: 想搞到枪支吗，Képi blanc？我有路子。蓝珠港有个橙色集装箱。挨着 IDAP 集装箱的那个。港口里就一个这样的集装箱。不过你可得当心。守卫很严。

Key.Original: Arthur's son, Lucas, is being interrogated by CSAT counter insurgency operatives. It's likely he's being held at the <marker name = '%1'>harbor</marker>, near Leqa.
Key.Chinese: 亞瑟的兒子盧卡斯正在被 CSAT 的反暴動調查人員拷問。他應該被關在樂加（Leqa）附近的<marker name = '%1'>港口</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协平叛作战人员正在审讯 Arthur 的儿子 Lucas。他似乎被关在勒卡附近的<marker name = '%1'>港口</marker>。

Key.Original: I forgot to mention. I heard it on good authority there's a shipping container in Blue Pearl Industrial Port - full of guns. It belongs to Syndikat. Apparently, it's bright orange and near one labeled IDAP. Just - be warned - that place is well-guarded. Be careful if you want to check it out.
Key.Chinese: 我忘了跟你說，根據可靠的消息，Blue Pearl 工業港口有個貨櫃，裡面放滿了槍械。那是 Syndikat 的東西。貨櫃為亮橘色，而且旁邊有個標有 IDAP 的貨櫃。不過小心了，那裡戒備森嚴。如果你想去看看，可得小心！
Key.Chinesesimp: 忘记说了。据可靠的消息，蓝珠工业港那儿有个集装箱装满了枪支。这集装箱属于辛迪加。鲜橙色的，一看便知，在贴有 IDAP 标签的那个集装箱旁边。只是 - 得小心 - 那地方守卫很严。如果你想去瞧一瞧，那就留点神。

Key.Original: GENDARMERIE: Vagalala Laptop
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵：瓦加拉拉筆電
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队：瓦加拉拉笔记本电脑

Key.Original: Disable Autonomous Weapons
Key.Chinesesimp: 破坏自动炮塔

Key.Original: I noticed some information on a laptop in Vagalala's police station. Looks like they got a bad apple in their midst - an officer on the take. Apparently, corruption is so rife in this precinct he's writing emails about his illicit money in the office...
Key.Chinese: 我發現瓦加拉拉的警局筆電中有些資訊。看來他們之中有個貪官。這個分局非常腐敗，此人竟然明目張膽地在辦公室寫關於收賄的電子郵件…
Key.Chinesesimp: 我注意到瓦加拉拉警察局一台笔记本电脑上的信息。看来他们中间有颗老鼠屎 - 一个受贿如流的警官。显然，这地方腐败成风，他竟然就在办公室里写捞黑钱的邮件...

Key.Original: Download App
Key.Chinesesimp: 下载应用

Key.Original: GENDARMERIE: L'Ensemble Captive
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队：大帮会俘虏

Key.Original: Explore
Key.Chinesesimp: 探索

Key.Original: The captive that Samjo wanted rescued has been taken by the police to a safe house at a cocoa farm <marker name = '%1'>near Vagalala</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 山姆卓要救的俘虜被警察帶到了一處密屋；該密屋它就位於<marker name = '%1'>瓦加拉拉附近</marker>的可可農場中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "山姆卓"想要解救的俘虏被警察带到<marker name = '%1'>瓦加拉拉附近</marker>可可农场的一间密屋里。

Key.Original: Take Photo
Key.Chinesesimp: 拍照

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Camp
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：营地

Key.Original: Turn Off Lights
Key.Chinesesimp: 关灯

Key.Original: An encampment in the <marker name = '%1'>jungle</marker>, used by the insurgents.
Key.Chinese: <marker name = '%1'>叢林</marker>中的一處營地，由反抗軍所使用。
Key.Chinesesimp: <marker name = '%1'>丛林</marker>里的一处营地，为叛军所用。

Key.Original: Reset System
Key.Chinesesimp: 重置系统

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Operation Plans
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：作战计划

Key.Original: Reset UPS
Key.Chinesesimp: 重置 UPS

Key.Original: L'Ensemble's guerrillas have sketched some plans on a whiteboard. Looks like an amphibious assault on a CSAT fuel depot. One team's crossing the Yanukka Straits in a boat. Another has taken up an overwatch position. I guess the idea is both teams will assault the depot and the first one to the silos will set an explosive charge. Simple hit and run. Once the target's destroyed, it's every man for himself. Least. that's what it looks like.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 的游擊兵在白板上擬定了一些計畫。看起來像是要對 CSAT 燃料庫展開兩棲攻勢。一支隊伍將乘船跨越雅努卡海峽，另一支隊伍則進行掩護。我覺得，他們的設想是，兩支隊伍會一起攻擊燃料庫，而先抵達儲存槽的隊伍將安裝炸藥。簡單的打帶跑戰術。在目標被摧毀後，大家各自為戰。目前看來計畫就是這樣。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会游击队员在白板上拟定了一项计划。看上去似乎是要对广协油库来一次两栖攻击。一支队伍乘船横渡雅努加海峡。另一支进行观察掩护。我猜他们的主意是两支队伍同时攻击油库，到达油罐的第一支队伍装好炸药。打了就跑。摧毁目标后，各自跑路。尽量缩小动静。目前看来，计划就是这个样。

Key.Original: A formidable battery of <marker name = '%1'>S-750 Rhea surface to air missile launchers</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 一組強大的<marker name = '%1'>S-750 Rhea 地對空飛彈發射器</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一组威力强大的<marker name = '%1'>S-750 Rhea 地对空导弹发射器</marker>。

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Ouméré)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（奥默里）

Key.Original: CSAT: AA Site (Harbor)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：防空阵地（港口）

Key.Original: Some <marker name = '%1'>CSAT soldiers</marker> took over the playing field and community centre in Ouméré this morning. Looks like they've setup a mobile hospital - which doesn't make a lot of sense. The worst of the malaria outbreak's over on the Îles de Lijn.
Key.Chinese: 一些 <marker name = '%1'>CSAT 士兵</marker>在今早佔領了 Ouméré 的遊樂場與社區中心。看來他們架設了一處機動醫院，這不是很符合常理。Îles de Lijn 群島瘧疾爆發最糟糕的時刻早已過去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天早上，一些 <marker name = '%1'>广协士兵</marker>接管了奥默里的运动场和社区中心。他们似乎开设了一家流动医院 - 这说不通。里恩群岛上虐疾疫情的最糟阶段已经过去了。

Key.Original: There are two radars, linked to CSAT's AA missile defenses. One is the conspicuous radome on Mont Tanoa. The other will be a mobile back-up.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有兩個雷達；它們連接到 CSAT 防空飛彈防禦系統。第一個很顯眼，就在塔諾雅山上。另一個是備用的行動雷達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有两部雷达，都与广协的防空导弹防御系统连接。其中一部是塔诺亚山上那个显眼的雷达天线罩。别一部将作为机动备用雷达。

Key.Original: An encampment in <marker name = '%1'>Ouméré</marker>, recently deserted by CSAT's secretive medical units.
Key.Chinese: 位於<marker name = '%1'>Ouméré</marker>的一處營地；此營地最近被 CSAT 的秘密醫療單位遺棄了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 位于<marker name = '%1'>奥默里</marker>的一处营地，最近被广协的秘密医疗队遗弃。

Key.Original: KEYSTONE: Orders
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"- 命令

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Abandoned)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（已废弃）

Key.Original: Surprisingly, there was some physical intel on my handler, Keystone: '[...] knock out CSAT's biogenetic weapon's lab and acquire the counteragent. Exploit the situation; use local agents if you have to. Everyone's expendable - including you, Miller'.
Key.Chinese: 令人意外的是，我的管理人 Keystone 身上竟然有些情報：[……]摧毀 CSAT 的生物基因武器實驗室並取得解藥。隨機應變，必要時使用當地特務。犧牲任何人都在所不惜－也包含你，米勒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 意外的是，我的接头人"基石"身上有一些货真价实的情报：“[...]摧毁广协的生物基因武器实验室并搞到解药。随机应变；必要的话可以利用当地的特工。牺牲任何人都在所不惜 - 包括你，Miller”。

Key.Original: A CSAT <marker name = '%1'>base</marker> with armored vehicles, east of Tuvanaka Airbase.
Key.Chinese: 一座擁有裝甲車的 CSAT <marker name = '%1'>基地</marker>，土萬納卡空軍基地東邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一处配备装甲车的广协<marker name = '%1'>基地</marker>，在图瓦那卡空军基地东侧。

Key.Original: KEYSTONE: RV Point
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"：会合点

Key.Original: CSAT reinforcements are located <marker name = '%1'>here</marker>, including an APC.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 的援軍就在<marker name = '%1'>這裡</marker>，其中有一輛裝甲運兵車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协增援部队位于<marker name = '%1'>此处</marker>，包括一辆装甲运兵车。

Key.Original: A <marker name = '%1'>rendezvous point</marker> in the jungle, selected by the CTRG operative named 'Keystone'.
Key.Chinese: 叢林中的<marker name = '%1'>會合點</marker>，由一名稱為「Keystone」的 CTRG 特務所選定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 丛林中的<marker name = '%1'>会合点</marker>，由名为“"基石"”的战研大队作战人员选定。

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (QRF)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（快速反应部队）

Key.Original: KEYSTONE: Position
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"：位置

Key.Original: A <marker name = '%1'>military site</marker> with a number of armored vehicles.
Key.Chinese: 一處<marker name = '%1'>軍事陣地</marker>，其中有數輛裝甲車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 配备若干装车车的<marker name = '%1'>军事地点</marker>。

Key.Original: KEYSTONE: Position
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"：位置

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (armor)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（装甲）

Key.Original: Current location of the CTRG operative, Keystone.
Key.Chinese: CTRG 特務 Keystone 的當前位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队作战人员"基石"的当前位置。

Key.Original: CSAT's <marker name = '%1'>biogenetic weapon's lab</marker> is guarded by state of the art remote turrets. Keystone's team may be able to disable them, if Network Structure Plans can be acquired...
Key.Chinese: CSAT 的<marker name = '%1'>生物基因武器實驗室</marker>由許多最先進的遙控砲塔保護。Keystone 的隊伍或許能夠關閉它們，不過他們需要網路架構圖…
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协的<marker name = '%1'>生物基因武器实验室</marker>由最先进的远程炮塔防卫。也许"基石"的队伍能够关掉它们，如果能搞到网络结构图的话...

Key.Original: KEYSTONE: Intel
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"：情报

Key.Original: CSAT: Autonomous Weapons
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：自动武器

Key.Original: Photographic evidence of CSAT personnel, handling containers of the deadly 'Atrox' strain malaria.
Key.Chinese: 相片證據捕捉到，CSAT 人員正在處理一箱箱致命的「阿特洛斯」品系瘧疾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 照片证据：广协人员正在搬运含有致命“Atrox”疟疾毒株的容器。

Key.Original: CSAT's <marker name = '%1'>biogenetic weapon's lab</marker> is guarded by state of the art remote turrets. Keystone's team may be able to disable them, if Network Structure Plans can be acquired...
Key.Chinese: CSAT 的<marker name = '%1'>生物基因武器實驗室</marker>由許多最先進的遙控砲塔保護。Keystone 的隊伍或許能夠關閉它們，不過他們需要網路架構圖…
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协的<marker name = '%1'>生物基因武器实验室</marker>由最先进的远程炮塔防卫。也许"基石"的队伍能够关掉它们，如果能搞到网络结构图的话...
