Key.Chinesesimp: 上传

Key.Original: Rest, wait, heal your wounds, shift time, and save the game.
Key.Chinese: 休息、等待、治療你的傷口、改變時間並儲存遊戲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 休息、等候、治疗你的伤口，改变时间和保存游戏。

Key.Original: A vehicle loaded with explosives and sensitive to the slightest knock. It can be detonated remotely by a phonecall.
Key.Chinese: 裝有炸藥的載具，對碰撞非常敏感。能夠透過電話遙控引爆。
Key.Chinesesimp: 装有炸药的载具，对最轻微的碰撞也很敏感。可以通过电话遥控引爆。

Key.Original: Transport Person
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送人员

Key.Original: Transport
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输

Key.Original: There is an abundance of mosquitoes carrying the malaria super-strain here. CSAT soldiers may also be present.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有大批蚊蟲，牠們都攜帶有超級品系瘧疾。CSAT 士兵也可能會出現於此。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有大量携带疟疾超级毒株的蚊子。广协士兵也可能在场。

Key.Original: Talk
Key.Chinesesimp: 谈话

Key.Original: Support
Key.Chinesesimp: 支援

Key.Original: Location
Key.Chinesesimp: 位置

Key.Original: Connect Keystone's flash drive to one of CSAT's computers.
Key.Chinese: 將 Keystone 的隨身碟連結至 CSAT 的電腦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 将"基石"的闪存驱动器连接到广协的一台电脑上。

Key.Original: Deliver
Key.Chinesesimp: 送货

Key.Original: Insurgent Attack
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军攻击

Key.Original: Destroy
Key.Chinesesimp: 破坏

Key.Original: Transport
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输

Key.Original: Transport Person
Key.Chinesesimp: 运送人员

Key.Original: Default Title
Key.Chinesesimp: 默认标题

Key.Original: Rescue a civilian from this location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 从该位置救出一位平民。

Key.Original: Patrol
Key.Chinesesimp: 巡逻

Key.Original: Mosquito Infested Area
Key.Chinesesimp: 蚊子滋生地区

Key.Original: There is an abundance of mosquitoes carrying the malaria super-strain here. CSAT soldiers may also be present.
Key.Chinese: 這裡有大批蚊蟲，牠們都攜帶有超級品系瘧疾。CSAT 士兵也可能會出現於此。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里有大量携带疟疾超级毒株的蚊子。广协士兵也可能在场。

Key.Original: You were ordered to deliver something to this location.
Key.Chinese: 你收到命令將東西遞送至此處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你收到命令把某个东西送至此地点。

Key.Original: Landmines are believed to be buried at this location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据情报，该位置埋有地雷。

Key.Original: Outbreak
Key.Chinesesimp: 疫情

Key.Original: An area where cases of Tanoa's deadly malaria epidemic have been reported.
Key.Chinese: 據報告，塔諾雅致命的瘧疾瘟疫出現在此區域中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是一个报告过塔诺亚致命疟疾病例的地区。

Key.Original: Someone would like to talk to you...
Key.Chinesesimp: 有人想和你谈谈...

Key.Original: A CSAT patrol has been reported at this position.
Key.Chinese: 據報告，有 CSAT 巡邏隊出現在此區域中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据报告，此位置有广协巡逻队。

Key.Original: Default Description
Key.Chinesesimp: 默认说明

Key.Original: Rescue a civilian from this location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 从该位置救出一位平民。

Key.Original: Insurgents are planning to attack this location. It may be an opportunity to elevate your standing with them.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍正在計畫攻擊此處。這可能是你提高名聲的好機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军准备攻击此位置。这也许是提升你在他们心目中地位的一次机会。

Key.Original: Destroy the target at this location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁该位置的目标。

Key.Original: You have sent some insurgents to attack this position!
Key.Chinese: 你派遣了一些反抗軍來攻擊此處！
Key.Chinesesimp: 你已派遣一些叛军去攻击此位置！

Key.Original: You were ordered to deliver something to this location.
Key.Chinese: 你收到命令將東西遞送至此處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你收到命令把某个东西送至此地点。

Key.Original: Move to this location.
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往此位置。

Key.Original: No problem. L'Ensemble can help. Look at a map. Find your target. Then let me me know the number of men you need.
Key.Chinese: 沒問題，L'Ensemble 能幫上忙。查看地圖，尋找你的目標，然後告訴我你需要多少人手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没问题。大帮会能帮忙。看看地图。找到目标。再告诉我你需要多少人。

Key.Original: Non, Képi. No one come help you. Do good for L'Ensemble - then we see.
Key.Chinese: Non，Képi。沒有人能幫你。你幫 L'Ensemble 做做事，然後我們再談。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，Képi。没人来帮你。为大帮会做点事情 - 然后我们再看看。

Key.Original: Really, Képi? No one come to fight for you right now - you want help, you talk to L'Ensemble. D’homme à homme.
Key.Chinese: 真的嗎，Képi？現在沒有人會為你而戰－－你要幫助，去和 L'Ensemble 談談。面對面地談。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真的吗，Képi？眼下没人来帮你战斗啦 - 想找人帮忙的话，就和大帮会谈谈吧。面对面地谈。

Key.Original: Take Photo
Key.Chinesesimp: 拍照

Key.Original: Hi, it's Drábek - we moved. Our new location is 121-094. C u soon.
Key.Chinese: 嗨，我是德拉貝克，我們搬走了。我們的新地點坐標是 121-094。回頭見。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你好，我是 Drábek - 我们搬地方了。我们的新位置是 121-094。回头见。

Key.Original: Take the medicine back to the <marker name = '%1'>doctor</marker>.
Key.Chinesesimp: 把药品带回去交给<marker name = '%1'>医生</marker>。

Key.Original: Insurgent Team
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军队伍

Key.Original: The medicine you require is at an <marker name = '%1'>insurgent camp</marker>. Collect it, and take it quickly to the <marker name = '%1'>doctor</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 你需要的藥品就在<marker name = '%1'>反抗軍營地</marker>。去提取藥品並趕快帶給<marker name = '%1'>醫生</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你需要的药品在一个<marker name = '%1'>叛军营地</marker>里。拿到药品，并尽快交给<marker name = '%1'>医生</marker>。

Key.Original: Request Insurgent Team
Key.Chinesesimp: 请求叛军队伍

Key.Original: I found a military site with a radome. Thoughts?
Key.Chinese: 我們找到了一個有雷達的軍事場地。你有什麼想法？
Key.Chinesesimp: 我发现了一个有雷达天线罩的军事基地。你有什么想法？

Key.Original: Insurgent Actions
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军行动

Key.Original: Caches
Key.Chinesesimp: 秘密仓库

Key.Original: Keystone, I found some intel about those AA defenses. I'm sending you what I got.
Key.Chinese: Keystone，我找到了一些關於防空系統的情資。我把這些東西傳送給你。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"，我找到有关防空系统的一些情报。我会把搞到的情报发给你。

Key.Original: Safe Houses
Key.Chinesesimp: 密屋

Key.Original: Keystone. I’ve got news on CSAT’s radar facilities. It looks like the main one has a backup…
Key.Chinese: Keystone，我找到了關於 CSAT 雷達設施的新消息。看來除了主雷達，還有備用雷達……
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"。我找到广协雷达设施的消息了。看来除了主雷达，还有个备用的…

Key.Original: I'm at the RV in the jungle - and you're late, old man. Get a move on.
Key.Chinese: 我在叢林中的會合點－－你遲到了，老頭。動作快一點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在丛林里的会合点 - 你迟到了，老头。快点。

Key.Original: I found something, looks important. Could be the plans you wanted?
Key.Chinese: 我找到了個東西，看起來挺重要。或者這就是你要的計畫？
Key.Chinesesimp: 我找到些东西，看来挺重要的。也许是你想弄到的图纸？

Key.Original: Santiago - where are you? You’ve got the coordinates for the RV. Get a fucking move on.
Key.Chinese: Santiago，你在哪裡？你有會合點的座標。動作快一點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "圣地亚哥"- 你在哪？你有会合点的坐标。该死的，赶紧来。

Key.Original: Keystone. I’ve got something that might be of interest.
Key.Chinese: Keystone，我得到些東西，你可能會感興趣。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"。我拿到一些东西，也许你会感兴趣。

Key.Original: Hey. I’ve got the documents.
Key.Chinesesimp: 嘿。我拿到了文件。

Key.Original: Insurgents are seeing to the mission you've set and are attacking a <marker name = '%1'>military base</marker> at %2. The group is %3 men strong.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍正在執行你設定的任務，並在 %2 開始攻擊一座<marker name = '%1'>軍事基地</marker>。此隊伍包含 %3 人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军正在执行你布置的任务，并将于 %2 对一个<marker name = '%1'>军事基地</marker>发动进攻。这支队伍有 %3 个人。

Key.Original: Speak with Keystone at his rendezvous point in the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 到叢林中的會合點來和 Keystone 談話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在丛林里的会合点与"基石"交谈。

Key.Original: Meet Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见"基石"

Key.Original: Meet Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见"基石"

Key.Original: Temporary Runway
Key.Chinesesimp: 临时跑道

Key.Original: Gendarmes are holding an insurgent captive at this cocoa farm.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵把一名反抗軍俘虜關在了可可農場中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队在这座可可农场中关押了一个叛军俘虏。

Key.Original: Rescue Captive (Optional)
Key.Chinesesimp: 解救俘虏（可选任务）

Key.Original: Speak with the doctor's contact.
Key.Chinesesimp: 与医生的联络人交谈。

Key.Original: Meet the Contact
Key.Chinesesimp: 与联络人会面

Key.Original: Meet the Contact
Key.Chinesesimp: 与联络人会面

Key.Original: Speak with Keystone's contact.
Key.Chinese: 和 Keystone 的聯絡人談談。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"基石"的联络人交谈。

Key.Original: Meet the Contact
Key.Chinesesimp: 与联络人会面

Key.Original: Meet the Contact
Key.Chinesesimp: 与联络人会面

Key.Original: Head into the jungle and speak with Keystone here.
Key.Chinese: 進入叢林並和 Keystone 談談。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入丛林，在此与"基石"交谈。

Key.Original: Meet Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见"基石"

Key.Original: Meet Keystone
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见"基石"

Key.Original: Keystone has shared some important information with you. Go home and access your laptop.
Key.Chinese: Keystone 和你分享了一些重要資訊。回家並存取你的筆電。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基石"发给你一些重要信息。回家查看你的笔记本电脑。

Key.Original: Check Laptop
Key.Chinesesimp: 查看笔记本电脑

Key.Original: Check Laptop
Key.Chinesesimp: 查看笔记本电脑

Key.Original: Talk with Arthur and find out what his 'problem' is...
Key.Chinese: 和亞瑟談談並找出「問題」所在…
Key.Chinesesimp: 与 Arthur 交谈，找出他的“问题”所在...

Key.Original: Meet Arthur
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见 Arthur

Key.Original: Meet Arthur
Key.Chinesesimp: 会见 Arthur

Key.Original: Secure Farm
Key.Chinesesimp: 控制农场

Key.Original: Secure Farm
Key.Chinesesimp: 控制农场

Key.Original: Find Key
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到钥匙

Key.Original: Dr. Drábek's being held captive inside a house with a locked door. Kill the soldier wearing a black beret and take the key.
Key.Chinese: 德拉貝克醫生正被關在一棟上鎖的屋子裡。擊殺穿著黑色貝雷帽的士兵，並取下鑰匙。
Key.Chinesesimp: Drábek 医生被关押在一幢上锁的房子里。干掉戴黑色贝雷帽的士兵，拿到钥匙。

Key.Original: Dr. Drábek's being held captive inside a house with a locked door. Kill the soldier wearing a black beret and take the key.
Key.Chinese: 德拉貝克醫生正被關在一棟上鎖的屋子裡。擊殺穿著黑色貝雷帽的士兵，並取下鑰匙。
Key.Chinesesimp: Drábek 医生被关押在一幢上锁的房子里。干掉戴黑色贝雷帽的士兵，拿到钥匙。

Key.Original: Take the counteragent developed by CSAT to Samjo in Georgetown and follow his instructions.
Key.Chinese: 把 CSAT 研發的解藥交給喬治鎮的山姆卓，並遵循他的指示行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把广协开发的解药带给乔治镇的"山姆卓"，并按他的指示行事。

Key.Original: Explosive Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 汽车炸弹

Key.Original: A vehicle has been rigged with explosives and is ready for collection.
Key.Chinese: 一輛載具已經被裝上炸藥；你現在已經可以取用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一辆汽车已装好炸药，可以随时取用。

Key.Original: Explosive Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 汽车炸弹

Key.Original: Runway
Key.Chinesesimp: 跑道

Key.Original: Runway
Key.Chinesesimp: 跑道

Key.Original: Infect a CSAT computer with the virus given to you by Keystone.
Key.Chinese: 用 Keystone 給你的病毒感染一台 CSAT 電腦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 用"基石"给你的病毒感染广协的一台电脑。

Key.Original: Locate some Network Structure Plans and take them to Keystone, in order to disable CSAT's autonomous weapon systems.
Key.Chinese: 找到一些網路價構圖並將它們交給 Keystone，以便關閉 CSAT 的自動武器系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到几份网络结构图并交给"基石"，以便禁用广协的自动武器系统。

Key.Original: Search Ouméré for a lead on CSAT's secretive medical group.
Key.Chinese: 搜索 Ouméré 尋找關於 CSAT 秘密醫療團隊的線索。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在奥默里搜寻广协秘密医疗小组的线索。

Key.Original: Rescue Captive
Key.Chinesesimp: 营救俘虏

Key.Original: Take a charge
Key.Chinesesimp: 接管

Key.Original:
Dear Customer. Your vehicle is ready for collection at our garage.
-- This is an automated SMS response --
Key.Chinese:
親愛的顧客，您現在能夠到我們的車庫提取您的載具。
-- 這是自動化簡訊回應 --
Key.Chinesesimp:
尊敬的顾客。您的汽车已经准备妥当，请到我们的车库来取车。
-- 这是自动短信回复 --

Key.Original: Sleep
Key.Chinesesimp: 睡觉

Key.Original: Get Intel
Key.Chinesesimp: 获取情报

Key.Original: Detonate Car Bomb
Key.Chinesesimp: 引爆汽车炸弹

Key.Original: Unload Vehicle Cargo
Key.Chinesesimp: 卸下车上的货物

Key.Original: Accept Task
Key.Chinesesimp: 接受任务

Key.Original: Hang Weapon
Key.Chinesesimp: 挂起武器

Key.Original: Plan Attack
Key.Chinesesimp: 策划进攻

Key.Original: Collect your vehicle.
Key.Chinesesimp: 取车。

Key.Original: Remove Explosives
Key.Chinesesimp: 拆除炸弹

Key.Original: Your Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的汽车

Key.Original: Remove Explosives
Key.Chinesesimp: 拆除炸弹

Key.Original: Your Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的汽车

Key.Original: Help Arthur by taking away the explosive charge hidden in the shed, next to his house.
Key.Chinese: 幫助亞瑟取得隱藏在他家旁邊小屋中的炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 帮助 Arthur 取走藏在棚屋里的炸药；就在他的房子旁边。

Key.Original: A mining complex, important to Tanoa's economy. It's guarded by gendarmes and CSAT counter insurgency operatives.
Key.Chinese: 一座採礦設施，對塔諾雅經濟非常重要。由國家憲兵與 CSAT 反暴動調查人員所保護。
Key.Chinesesimp: 矿业综合企业，对塔诺亚的经济至关重要。由宪兵队和广协平叛作战人员把守。

Key.Original: Your Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的汽车

Key.Original: Red Spring Mine
Key.Chinesesimp: 红泉矿山

Key.Original: Your Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的汽车

Key.Original: Red Spring Mine
Key.Chinesesimp: 红泉矿山

Key.Original: Collect your vehicle.
Key.Chinesesimp: 取车。

Key.Original: Steal a large transport vehicle and take it to Dr. Drábek so he can relocate his sick patients.
Key.Chinese: 竊取一輛大型運輸載具並將它帶給德拉貝克醫生；以便於他能夠遷移病患。
Key.Chinesesimp: 窃取一辆大型运输车，交给 Drábek 博士，以便他转移病人。

Key.Original: Locate Plane
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到飞机

Key.Original: Transport Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输车

Key.Original: Crash Site
Key.Chinesesimp: 坠毁地点

Key.Original: Transport Vehicle
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输车

Key.Original: Dive down to the seabed, find the airplane wreckage, and retrieve Keystone's intel.
Key.Chinese: 深潛至海底，搜索飛機殘骸並取回 Keystone 的情資。
Key.Chinesesimp: 潜入海底，找到飞机残骸，取回"基石"的情报。

Key.Original: Gendarmerie Base
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队基地

Key.Original: Gendarmerie Base
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队基地

Key.Original: Get in the rubber boat and take the insurgents across the straits.
Key.Chinese: 登上橡膠船並帶領反抗軍跨越海峽。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入橡皮艇，带领叛军越过海峡。

Key.Original: Maritime base for gendarmerie. There should be diving equipment on the premises.
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵的海上基地。這裡應該有潛水裝備。
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队的海上基地。这里应该有潜水设备。

Key.Original: Transport
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输

Key.Original: I got your intel from the plane wreck. Call me.
Key.Chinese: 我取得了關於飛機殘骸的情資；打電話給我。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我收到了你从飞机残骸找到的情报。给我打个电话吧。

Key.Original: Transport
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输

Key.Original: I think I found your weapon’s lab.
Key.Chinese: 我好像找到了你的武器實驗室。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想我找到了你的武器实验室。

Key.Original: Boat
Key.Chinesesimp: 船

Key.Original: CSAT Lab
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协实验室

Key.Original: Boat
Key.Chinesesimp: 船

Key.Original: CSAT Lab
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协实验室

Key.Original: Boat
Key.Chinesesimp: 船

Key.Original: A clandestine weapon's laboratory, where a biogenetic, mosquito-borne disease is being developed. It must be destroyed...
Key.Chinese: 一個秘密武器實驗室，他們在那裡開發一種生物基因性的蚊蟲傳染疾病。我們必須摧毀這個實驗室…
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个秘密武器实验室，正在研发一种由蚊子传播的生物基因疾病。一定要摧毁这个实验室...

Key.Original: Boat
Key.Chinesesimp: 船

Key.Original: Security Check
Key.Chinesesimp: 安检

Key.Original: There's a problem with the plane. Sry. Can't do the job.
Key.Chinese: 飛機出了問題。抱歉，這份差事我辦不成。
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞机有点问题。对不起。这活我干不了。

Key.Original: Get Airport Access
Key.Chinesesimp: 获得机场门禁卡

Key.Original: Get airport access here.
Key.Chinesesimp: 在此处获得机场门禁卡。

Key.Original: Job done. Plane's on the ground. Payment, pls. Thnx.
Key.Chinese: 完工。飛機降落了。請付款，謝謝。
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务完成。飞机已落地。请付款。谢谢。

Key.Original: Plane
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞机

Key.Original: Pay a visit to the manager of this night club and obtain his airport pass.
Key.Chinese: 去見夜店的經理，並取得他的機場通行證。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜访这家夜总会的经理，搞到他的机场通行证。

Key.Original: Transport Plane
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输机

Key.Original: Club
Key.Chinesesimp: 夜总会

Key.Original: Collect the illicit cargo and land this plane at Bala Airstrip.
Key.Chinese: 提取非法貨物，並將此飛機降落在巴拉小機場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 取走非法货物并将这架飞机降落在巴拉小机场。

Key.Original: Club
Key.Chinesesimp: 夜总会

Key.Original: Explore
Key.Chinesesimp: 探索

Key.Original: Old Man Update
Key.Chinesesimp: Old Man 更新

Key.Original: Arma 3 Apex: Old Man is an experimental singleplayer open world scenario set on the beautiful Tanoan archipelago. It is a free addition to the Apex expansion and the Armaverse.%1%1%2Sandbox Gameplay%1%2Exploration%1%2Multiple Quests%1%2Safehouses%1%2Hidden Caches%1%2Fast Travel%1%2Time Skipping%1%2Faction Reputation%1%1More about Old Man
Key.Chinese: 《Arma 3 Apex: Old Man》是一款實驗性開放遊戲場景單人遊戲，背景設定於美麗的塔諾雅群島。這是《Apex》擴充包與《Armaverse》的額外免費內容。%1%1%2沙盒遊戲%1%2探索%1%2多任務%1%2密屋%1%2隱藏點%1%2快速傳送%1%2時間跳轉%1%2勢力名聲%1%1瞭解更多《Old Man》詳情
Key.Chinesesimp: 《Arma 3 Apex：Old Man》是一款实验性开放游戏场景单人游戏，以美丽的塔诺亚群岛为背景。它是《Apex》扩展游戏和《Armaverse》的免费添加内容。%1%1%2沙盒游戏%1%2探索%1%2多任务%1%2密屋%1%2秘密仓库%1%2快速行进%1%2时间跳跃%1%2阵营声誉%1%1获取关于《Old Man》的更多信息

Key.Original: Reset UPS
Key.Chinesesimp: 重置 UPS

Key.Original: Weapon Stashes
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器存放点

Key.Original: Reset UPS
Key.Chinesesimp: 重置 UPS

Key.Original: Supporting the revolution by making regular drops at weapon stashes will improve even the worst of relations.
Key.Chinese: 經常給武器存放點投放武器來支援革命；無論你們的關係有多糟糕，這樣都會得到改善。
Key.Chinesesimp: 定期向武器存放点投放武器，从而为革命提供支持，那么，即使是最糟糕的关系也会得到改善。

Key.Original: Reset UPS
Key.Chinesesimp: 重置 UPS

Key.Original: You can help insurgents on Tanoa by bringing weapons and equipment to <t %5>weapon stashes</t>, marked on your map. Not only will you receive money for any items you supply, your <t %5>reputation</t> will improve too, giving you further advantages.
Key.Chinese: 你可以將武器與裝備帶到地圖上標註的<t %5>武器存放點</t>，以協助塔諾雅的反抗軍。你提供道具時不但能夠獲得金錢，你的<t %5>聲望</t>也會提升；這將可為你提供更多優勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以将武器和装备送到你的地图上标注的<t %5>武器存放点</t>，为塔诺亚的叛军提供帮助。提供任何物资后，你不仅会收到报酬，你的<t %5>声誉</t>也将得到提升，从而让你获得更多优势。

Key.Original: Bombmaker
Key.Chinesesimp: 炸弹制造者

Key.Original: It is possible to have multiple vehicles equipped with explosives. However, one phone call will trigger them all!
Key.Chinese: 可給數輛載具裝上炸藥。不過，一通電話將會觸發全部炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可给多辆汽车装上炸弹。不过，一个电话会将炸弹全部引爆！

Key.Original: Tanoa's insurgents include several <t %5>bombmakers</t>. These individuals can <t %5>rig vehicles</t> with high explosives - for a price. Once you complete a certain task or your <t %5>relation</t> with local guerrillas increases, their workshops will appear on your map.%1%2To fit a vehicle with a bomb, take your delivery vehicle to one of the special garages.%1%2Approach the <t %5>bombmaker</t>.%1%2Select and confirm which vehicle you wish to arm.%1%2You will receive an SMS confirmation when the work is done and your vehicle is ready to collect.%1%2To detonate the explosives, <t %5>call the phone number</t> given to you by the bombmaker.
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅的反抗軍有幾名<t %5>炸彈製造者</t>。這些人能夠使用高爆炸藥<t %5>改裝載具</t>－－不過你得支付他們一筆錢。完成特定任務，或是你與當地游擊兵的<t %5>關係</t>達到一定程度後，他們的工坊將出現在你的地圖上。%1%2要在載具上安裝炸藥，你得將運輸載具開到這些特殊的車庫中。%1%2與<t %5>炸彈製造者</t>交談。%1%2選擇你希望武裝的載具%1%2完成時，你將會收到確認簡訊通知你去提取你的載具。%1%2要引爆裝置，<t %5>可直接撥打炸彈製造者給你的電話號碼</t>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚的叛军里有几位<t %5>炸弹制造者</t>。这些人可在<t %5>汽车</t>上安装高爆炸药 - 但要给钱。完成一项任务后，或与当地游击队改善<t %5>关系</t>后，他们的车间会显示在你的地图上。%1%2如需在车上安装炸弹，需要将你的货车开到一间特殊的车库。%1%2与<t %5>炸弹制造者</t>接洽。%1%2选择并确认你要在哪辆车上安装炸弹。%1%2完工并可以取车时，你会收到一条确认短信。%1%2如需引爆炸药，<t %5>拨打炸弹制造者给你的电话号码</t>即可。

Key.Original: Hidden Caches
Key.Chinesesimp: 私密仓库

Key.Original: <t %5>Hidden caches</t> containing weapons and equipment can be located by using the geo-finder app on your phone (%11). The frequency of the beeps increases depending on your <t %5>direction</t> and your <t %5>proximity</t> to the cache.
Key.Chinese: <t %5>隱藏點</t>包含武器與器材，你可以用手機上的地理位置查找器來找到隱藏點（%11）。嗶嗶聲的頻率將會依據你與隱藏點的<t %5>方向</t>和<t %5>距離</t>而加快。
Key.Chinesesimp: 可使用你手机上的地理位置查找应用找到藏有武器和装备的<t %5>秘密仓库</t>（%11）。哔哔声的频率随着你的<t %5>方向</t>和与秘密仓库的<t %5>接近程度</t>而增加。

Key.Original: Reset UPS
Key.Chinesesimp: 重置 UPS

Key.Original: Fast Travel
Key.Chinesesimp: 快速行进

Key.Original: Download
Key.Chinesesimp: 下载

Key.Original: You can move quickly across long distances using <t %5>Fast Travel</t>. This can be triggered from <t %5>safehouses, hotels</t>, or if your relations with L'Ensemble are good, <t %5>insurgent camps</t>. You will receive a notification if the option is available.%1%2To transition to a new location, open your map with %11.%1%2Choose the place you want to go to; valid sites are visualized in-game with <t %5>markers</t>.%1%2Select the time you wish to arrive, by clicking on the <t %5>minute hand of the watch</t> with %12 and rotating it.%1%2There will always be a <t %5>minimum travel time</t>, corresponding to the distance covered.
Key.Chinese: 你可以使用<t %5>快速傳送</t>快速地抵達遠處。你可以在<t %5>密屋、旅館</t>中觸發它，如果你跟 L'Ensemble 的關係不錯，你也能使用<t %5>反抗軍營地</t>進行傳送。你會在能夠傳送時收到通知。%1%2要傳送至新地點時，使用 %11 開啟你的地圖。%1%2選擇你想去的地方，適用地點會有遊戲內以視覺化方式<t %5>標記</t>。%1%2使用 %12 點擊 <t %5>手錶分針</t>並透過旋轉來選擇你希望抵達的時間。%1%2<t %5>最短旅途時間</t>依據移動距離而定。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以通过<t %5>快速行进</t>进行远距离快速移动。这项技能可以从<t %5>密屋、酒店</t>触发，如果你与大帮会的关系不错，也可以从<t %5>叛军营地</t>触发。如果该选项可用，你会收到通知。%1%2如希望转移至新地点，请用%11打开你的地图。%1%2选择你要去的地点；有效地点在游戏中以可视化<t %5>标记</t>表示。%1%2要选择你希望到达的时间，用%12点击<t %5>表盘的分针</t>并旋转它。%1%2<t %5>最短行进时间</t>视行进的距离而定。

Key.Original: Phone
Key.Chinesesimp: 电话

Key.Original: To stay in touch with useful contacts and coordinate activites with Tanoa's insurgency, you can use your <t %5>phone</t>. To access it, simply press %11. It is useful for:%1%2Checking your personal finances%1%2Managing your tasks%1%2Browsing collected intel%1%2Reading recent messages and conversations%1%2Setting an alarm%1%2And coordinating attacks against the enemy
Key.Chinese: 你能夠使用<t %5>手機</t>來跟有用的聯絡人保持聯繫，並和塔諾雅反抗軍協調各種行動。按下 %11 即可使用。具體用途包括：%1%2查看各任財務%1%2管理你的任務%1%2瀏覽已收集的情報%1%2閱讀最近的訊息與對話%1%2設定鬧鐘%1%2協調對敵攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以使用<t %5>手机</t>与可利用的联系人保持联系，并协调塔诺亚叛军的活动。要使用手机，可直接按 %11。具体用途包括：%1%2查看个人财务状况%1%2管理你的任务%1%2浏览已收集的情报%1%2阅读最近的消息和交谈%1%2设置闹钟%1%2协调对敌攻击

Key.Original: Reputation
Key.Chinesesimp: 声誉

Key.Original: You can increase your <t %5>reputation</t> with insurgents on Tanoa by completing missions, sharing loot, and joining groups in small, impromptu engagements. Elevated status means <t %5>cheaper weapons and equipment</t> on the black market, as well as more <t %5>accommodation</t> options with <t %5>better prices</t>. Conversely, failing missions and attacking insurgents can result in a lack of local support, making strategic objectives harder to complete. The reputation scale starts at <t %5>0</t>, can increase to <t %5>+3</t> or be reduced to <t %5>-3</t>.
Key.Chinese: 你可以透過完成任務、分享戰利品、加入小型突發戰役等方式來提升在塔諾雅反抗軍中的<t %5>名聲</t>。提升關係將可享受<t %5>更便宜的黑市武器和裝備、</t>更多<t %5>住宿</t>選擇和<t %5>更便宜的價格</t>。反之，任務失敗或攻擊反抗軍可能會讓你失去當地人民的支援，並可能會使你更難完成戰略目標。初始名聲為 <t %5>0</t>，其可提升至 <t %5>+3</t> 或降低至 <t %5>-3</t>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以通过完成任务、分享战利品和加入团队参加小型突发战斗等方式提升你在塔诺亚叛军中的<t %5>声誉</t>。地位提升意味着可在黑市上买到<t %5>更便宜的武器和装备</t>，并以<t %5>优惠的价格</t>获得更多<t %5>住宿</t>选择。相反，任务失败和攻击叛军会导致你得不到当地人支持，更难实现战略性目标。声誉等级从<t %5>0</t>开始，可提升至<t %5>+3</t>或降低至<t %5>-3</t>。

Key.Original: Relations
Key.Chinesesimp: 关系

Key.Original: In ordinary circumstances, you will not be a target for military personnel or law enforcement. But <t %5>relations</t> can change. Certain actions will provoke confrontation:%1%2Not stopping at checkpoints.%1%2Taking weapons through checkpoints.%1%2Visibly carrying weapons.%1%2Wearing military uniforms or equipment, including guerrilla apparel and accoutrement.%1%2Trespassing in <t %5>restricted areas.</t>%1%2Harassing military personnel or law enforcement officers by getting too close.%1%2Disobeying orders given by armed individuals.
Key.Chinese: 一般情況下，你不會成為軍事人員或執法人員的目標。不過<t %5>關係</t>可能會改變。特定行為可能會引發衝突：%1%2企圖衝過管制哨；%1%2攜帶武器通過管制哨；%1%2攜帶可見武器；%1%2穿著軍事制服或裝備，包含游擊兵的衣服與配備；%1%2擅闖<t %5>受限區域；</t>%1%2因為過度靠近而干擾軍事人員或執法單位；%1%2違背武裝人士的指令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一般情况下，你不会成为军事人员或执法人员的目标。但<t %5>关系</t> 会发生变化。某些行动会引起对抗：%1%2企图冲过关卡；%1%2携带武器通过关卡；%1%2肉眼可见携带了武器；%1%2身穿军服或装备，包括游击队服装和装备；%1%2非法侵入<t %5>禁区；</t>%1%2因为距离太近而骚扰军事人员或执法人员；%1%2违背武装人员发布的命令。

Key.Original: Restricted Areas
Key.Chinesesimp: 禁区

Key.Original: As a civilian, there are <t %5>restricted areas</t> you are not allowed to enter:%1%2Military bases.%1%2Airports (without access pass).%1%2Police stations.%1%2Quarantined towns and villages.%1%2Insurgent camps (depending on < t%5>reputation</t>).%1%2Some factories and harbors.
Key.Chinese: 身為平民，你不能進入特定的<t %5>受限區域</t>：%1%2軍事基地；%1%2機場（沒有通行證時）；%1%2警察局；%1%2隔離城鎮與村莊；%1%2反抗軍營地（取決於你的< t%5>名聲</t>）；%1%2特定工廠與港口。
Key.Chinesesimp: 作为平民，你不得进入各种<t %5>禁区</t>：%1%2军事基地；%1%2机场（无通行证）；%1%2警察局。%1%2被隔离的城镇和村庄；%1%2叛军营地（取决于< t%5>声誉</t>）；%1%2某些工厂和港口。

Key.Original: Sleeping Bags
Key.Chinesesimp: 睡袋

Key.Original: You cannot make use of your sleeping bag if you are close to enemy units or are actively moving in a vehicle.
Key.Chinese: 你離敵方單位太近時，或乘坐移動中的載具，則無法使用睡袋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你接近敌人，或正乘坐行驶中的载具，则不能使用睡袋。

Key.Original: Old Man
Key.Chinesesimp: Old Man

Key.Original: To save hard-won progress, you can unfurl a <t %5>sleeping bag</t> by pressing %11 and rest. This will create a saved game. Sleeping bags can be found all over Tanoa, or purchased with weapons and other equipment on the <t %5>black market</t>. Be aware, these items only allow <t %5>one save</t> and are cumbersome to carry, occupying a great deal of space in your inventory.
Key.Chinese: 如需儲存寶貴的遊戲進度，可按下 %11 打開<t %5>睡袋</t>並開始休息。你能夠在塔諾雅各處找到睡袋，或可在<t %5>黑市</t>中與武器和裝備一起購買。小心了，這些道具只允許<t %5>一次存檔</t>。它們不方便攜帶且佔用大量道具欄空間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 要保存来之不易的游戏进展，可以按%11展开<t %5>睡袋</t>并休息。这样做可以创建一个游戏存档。在塔诺亚到处都能找到睡袋，也可在<t %5>黑市</t>上与武器和其他装备一起购买。请注意，这些物品仅允许<t %5>保存游戏一次</t>，而且不便携带，占据大量的库存空间。

Key.Original: OBJECTIVE SUCCEEDED
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标已实现

Key.Original: Threat Level
Key.Chinesesimp: 威胁等级

Key.Original: LOCATION REACHED
Key.Chinesesimp: 已到达地点

Key.Original: Sleeping in safe houses and other accommodation will remove your threat level.
Key.Chinese: 在密屋和其他住宿地點睡覺將會移除你的威脅等級。
Key.Chinesesimp: 睡在密屋和其他住处将可除你的威胁等级。

Key.Original: OBJECTIVE FAILED
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标未实现

Key.Original: CSAT soldiers and gendarmes will ignore you unless they become <t %5>suspicious</t>. If your <t %5>threat level</t> is high enough, combat will occur and you will be hunted by authorities. However, it will decrease again if you can hide or escape your pursuers.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 士兵與國家憲兵並不會理會你，除非他們認為你很<t %5>可疑</t>。如果你的<t %5>威脅等級</t>夠高，你將會引發戰鬥，並且，當局將會追捕你。不過，如果你能夠躲藏或逃脫追捕者，則會降低威脅等級。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协士兵和宪兵会忽视你，除非他们起了<t %5>疑心</t>。如果你的<t %5>威胁等级</t>够高，将发生战斗，当局将搜捕你。然而，如果你躲起来或逃脱追捕者，威胁等级将再次下降。

Key.Original: DESCRIPTION UPDATED
Key.Chinesesimp: 说明已更新

Key.Original: Sleeping
Key.Chinesesimp: 睡觉

Key.Original: OBJECTIVE CREATED
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标已创建

Key.Original: By sleeping you can save your progress, lower your threat and heal your wounds. To sleep you have to find a bed, sofa or unfolded sleeping bag. You have your own at home. You can also rent a bed in a hostel or, if your reputation with Syndikat is high enough, you can sleep in their camps.
Key.Chinese: 你可以透過睡覺儲存你的進度、降低威脅並治療傷口。你必須找到床、沙發或未開啟的睡袋來睡覺。你家中會有這些道具。你也可以在旅館中租床位，或者，如果你在 Syndikat 中的名聲夠高，你也能夠睡在他們的營地中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以通过睡觉来保存你的进度，降低你的威胁，治愈你的伤口。如要睡觉，得找到一张床、沙发或展开的睡袋。你的家里有你自己的沙发。你也可以在旅馆里租一张床位，或者，如果你在辛迪加的声誉足够好，你也可以睡在他们的营地里。

Key.Original: Accommodation
Key.Chinesesimp: 住处

Key.Original: If you need to <t %5>sleep</t> to regain your strength, < t%5>skip time</t>, or lower your <t %5>threat level</t>, there are a number of safe-houses and hotels. However, not all are free.
Key.Chinese: 如果你需要透過<t %5>睡覺</t>恢復體力、< t%5>快轉時間</t>或降低你的<t %5>威脅等級</t>，你能夠使用各種密屋與旅館。不過，有些地方可能會收費。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你需要<t %5>睡觉</t>来恢复体力，< t%5>跳过时间</t>或降低你的<t %5>威胁等级</t>，有多个密屋和酒店可供选择。然而，并不是所有地方都可免费使用。

Key.Original: Waiting
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待

Key.Original: Press %11 and rotate the watch hands to <t %5>move forwards in time</t>. The maximum number of hours you can skip is 12. If you have a sleeping bag item in your inventory, you have the option of exchanging it for a saved game.
Key.Chinese: 按下 %11 並轉動手表指針來<t %5>快轉時間</t>。你能快轉的時間上限為 12 個小時。如果你的道具欄中有睡袋，你也可以用它來儲存遊戲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 按%11并旋转表针<t %5>可将时间往前推进。</t>你可以跳过的最大小时数为 12 小时。如果你的库存中有个睡袋，你可以选择用它来换取保存游戏的机会。

Key.Original: Skipping Time
Key.Chinesesimp: 跳过时间

Key.Original: In some situations, you may wish to <t %5>skip time</t> and progress events. You can do this if no enemies are nearby.%1%2Use the 'sit down' key by pressing %11.%1%2Click on the <t %5>minute hand of the watch</t> with %12 and drag it around to the time you wish to skip to. You may shift time by a maximum of 12 hours.%1%2Then select <t %5>OK</t>.
Key.Chinese: 在特定情況下，你可能會需要<t %5>快轉時間</t>，並推進事件進度。你能夠在附近沒有敵人時這麼做。%1%2按下 %11 使用「坐下」鍵。%1%2使用 %12 點擊<t %5>手錶分針</t>並將其拖曳至你希望快轉至的時間。每次快轉上限為 12 小時%1%2然後選擇 <t %5>確定</t>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在某些情况下，你也许希望<t %5>跳过时间</t>并将事件往前推进。附近没有敌人时，你可以这样做。%1%2按%11来使用“坐下”键。%1%2用%12点击<t %5>表盘的分针</t>，并将它拖动至你想跳至的时间。你可更改的时间以 12 小时为限。%1%2然后选择<t %5>OK</t>。

Key.Original: Sleeping
Key.Chinesesimp: 睡觉

Key.Original: Old men need their rest. <t %5>Sleeping</t> can save your progress, heal injuries, and remove any threat level you have received. It will also enable you to <t %5>skip time</t>.%1%2Approach a <t %5>bed (or sofa)</t> and hold %11.%1%2Click on the <t %5>minute hand of the watch</t> with %12 and drag it around to the time you wish to skip to. You may shift time by a maximum of 12 hours.%1%2If you have a <t %5>sleeping bag</t> in your inventory, you will have the option of saving your game. Such items are good for <t %5>one use</t> only. %1%2Select <t %5>OK</t>.
Key.Chinese: 老頭不能不睡覺。你可以透過<t %5>睡覺</t>儲存進度、治療傷口並移除任何威脅等級。同時你也能夠<t %5>快轉時間</t>。%1%2接近一張<t %5>床（或沙發）</t>然後按住 %11。%1%2使用 %12 點擊<t %5>手錶指針，並將其拖曳至你希望快轉至的時間。每次快轉上限為 12 小時。%1%2如果你的道具欄中有<t %5>睡袋</t>，你還能夠儲存遊戲。此道具只能<t %5>使用一次</t>。%1%2選擇<t %5>確定</t>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 老头需要休息。<t %5>睡眠</t>可以保存你的时度，治愈伤口，消除你得到的任何威胁等级。睡觉还可让你得以<t %5>跳过时间</t>。%1%2走近一张<t %5>床（或沙发）</t>并按住 %11。%1%2用%12点击<t %5>表盘的分针</t>，并将它拖动至你想跳至的时间。你可更改的时间以 12 小时为限。%1%2如果你的库存中有个<t %5>睡袋</t>，你可以选择保存游戏。此类物品只能<t %5>使用一次</t>。%1%2选择<t %5>OK</t>。

Key.Original: OBJECTIVE CANCELED
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标已取消

Key.Original: NATO has abandoned the Horizon Islands to CSAT and a deadly super-strain of malaria. But not everyone is giving up the fight...
Key.Chinese: NATO 放棄了 Horizon 群島，CSAT 取而代之；並且，致命的超級品系瘧疾席捲整個群島。不過，並非所有人都放棄了抗爭…
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约放弃了地平线群岛，让它落入广协和致命超级虐疾毒株的魔掌。但并非每个人都放弃了战斗...

Key.Original: OBJECTIVE ASSIGNED
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标已分配

Key.Original: Old Man
Key.Chinesesimp: 老头

Key.Original: The counteragent was passed to the Global Health Initative by a foreign doctor.
Key.Chinese: 一名外籍醫生將解藥交給了全球衛生倡議組織。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一位外国医生把解药交给了全球健康行动计划组织。

Key.Original: It found its way to a foreign doctor who in turn, passed it to the Global Health Initiative.
Key.Chinese: 解藥落到了一名外籍醫生的手中，而這名醫生將其轉交給全球衛生倡議組織。
Key.Chinesesimp: 解药落入一位外国医生手中，后者又将它交给了全球健康行动计划组织。

Key.Original: Thanks to his efforts, a cure and vaccine were synthesized and administered throughout the region.
Key.Chinese: 由於他的努力，現在解藥和疫苗都已經生產並用於整個地區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 多亏了他的努力，特效药和疫苗已经成功合成，并在整个地区使用。

Key.Original: The counteragent which he gave his life for, was also never recovered.
Key.Chinese: 他犧牲自己所換取的解藥最後不知所蹤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他为之付出生命的解药也未再能找到。

Key.Original: The counteragent which he gave his life for, was handed over to L'Ensemble.
Key.Chinese: 他犧牲自己所換取的解藥被 L'Ensemble 獲得。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他为之付出生命的解药落入大帮会手中。

Key.Original: Unable to synthesize a cure, it was selectively administered and forgotten, leading to many unnecessary deaths.
Key.Chinese: 由於他們無法生產解藥，他們把解藥選擇性用於少數幾人；此事也就此被遺忘；並最終造成了許多不必要的死亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由于无法合成特效药，仅少数人获得选择性地用药，大部分人被遗忘了，因此也导致许多不必要的死亡。

Key.Original: On Tuvanaka, CSAT abandoned their bioweapons program.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 放棄了他們在土萬納卡的生物武器計畫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在突瓦纳加，广协放弃了他们的生物武器计划。

Key.Original: The pretext for their intervention gone, international pressure to leave the Horizon Islands mounts.
Key.Chinese: 他們干預的接口已經消失，因此，要求他們離開 Horizon 島的國際壓力日漸增大。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们失去了进行干预的借口，国际上要求他们离开地平线群岛的压力越来越大。

Key.Original: On Tuvanaka, CSAT quietly resumed their bioweapons program.
Key.Chinese: 在土萬納卡，CSAT 悄悄地繼續他們的生物武器計畫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在突瓦纳加，广协悄悄恢复了他们的生物武器计划。

Key.Original: Rebuilding their facility and silencing all of those who knew too much.
Key.Chinese: 他們重建了他們的設施並抹殺了那些知情的人們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 重建他们的设施，让那些知道得太多的人保持沉默。

Key.Original: For some, Tanoa became a memory.
Key.Chinese: 對於一些人來說，塔諾雅成了一段回憶。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对一些人来说，塔诺亚已是过去的往事。

Key.Original: For others, it remained what it always was - a paradise, riven by disasters and war.
Key.Chinese: 也有些人認為，這是一個被災難與戰火摧殘的天堂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对其他人来说，它仍然是过去的样子 - 一个被灾难和战争撕裂的天堂。

Key.Original: As for the old legionnaire, several stories abound.
Key.Chinese: 至於那名老軍團兵，各種傳說眾說紛紜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 至于这位老兵，民间流传着关于他的几个故事。

Key.Original: The CTRG operative known as Keystone was successful in exposing CSAT's clandestine activities.
Key.Chinese: CTRG 特務 Keystone 成功揭發 CSAT 的秘密行為。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队代号为"基石"的特工成功地揭露了广协的秘密活动。

Key.Original: Smugglers and gun runners can sell items you won't find elsewhere. They also buy equipment and may offer better prices, depending on your
Key.Chinese: 走私犯和軍火商會出售其他地方找不到的道具。他們也可能會以更好的價格購買你的裝備，這將取決於
Key.Chinesesimp: 走私者和枪支贩子会出售你在其他地方找不到的物品。他们也会购买装备，可能会提供更好的价格，具体取决于你

Key.Original: reputation with insurgents
Key.Chinesesimp: 在叛乱分子中的声誉

Key.Original: Insurgents are constantly skirmishing with CSAT and raiding strategic sites. Supporting them can be useful, as you'll have a numerical advantage. Samjo will send you information when any attack is planned.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍不斷與 CSAT 戰鬥並爭奪戰略要地。協助他們可能會帶來很多好處，你將取得人數優勢。山姆卓會在擬定攻擊計劃後通知你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军不断与广协发生冲突，并袭击战略要地。支持他们是会给你带来好处，因为你会获得数量上的优势。如有任何攻击计划，"山姆卓"将发消息给你。

Key.Original: Safe Houses
Key.Chinesesimp: 密屋

Key.Original: Their maximum group size is
Key.Chinese: 他們的最大隊伍人數為
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的小组最大人数为

Key.Original: %1 men.
Their strength (skill and equipment level):
Key.Chinese: 他們的戰力（技能與裝備等級）：
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的实力（技能和装备等级）：

Key.Original: Insurgent Assaults
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军攻击

Key.Original: To increase their strength, they need either
Key.Chinese: 為了提升他們的力量，他們需要
Key.Chinesesimp: 如需提升他们的实力，他们需要

Key.Original: Not Available
Key.Chinesesimp: 不可用

Key.Original: win:
Key.Chinesesimp: 赢取：

Key.Original: %1 fight(s)
Key.Chinesesimp: %1 场战斗

Key.Original: Not Available
Key.Chinesesimp: 不可用

Key.Original: or they must get the equipment to the sum of
Key.Chinese: 或者，他們所取得的裝備總數必須達到：
Key.Chinesesimp: 或者，他们得到的装备总数必须达到

Key.Original: Actual cost / purchase prices:
Key.Chinese: 實際價值 / 購買價格：
Key.Chinesesimp: 实际成本/购买价格：

Key.Original: This can be achieved by way of several stashes, scattered across the islands.
Key.Chinese: 你能夠在島嶼四處的許多隱藏點中完成這一點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这可以通过散布在岛屿各地的几个存放点来实现。

Key.Original: Insurgent Team
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军队伍

Key.Original: There are insurgents who will assault a given target at a specific time.
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍會在特定時間突擊指定目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军会在特定时间攻击特定目标。

Key.Original: Availability:
Key.Chinesesimp: 获得方式：

Key.Original: Direct from camp:
Key.Chinesesimp: 直接从营地：

Key.Original: Over the phone:
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过电话：

Key.Original: Their total number is
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的总人数为

Key.Original: Their strength (skill and equipment level):
Key.Chinese: 他們的戰力（技能與裝備等級）：
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们的实力（技能和装备等级）：

Key.Original: Black markets
Key.Chinesesimp: 黑市

Key.Original: Their price per fighter is
Key.Chinesesimp: 每位士兵的价格为

Key.Original: At higher levels, they
Key.Chinesesimp: 等级越高，他们

Key.Original: have greater skill.
Key.Chinesesimp: 能力越强。

Key.Original: carry better equipment.
Key.Chinesesimp: 可携带更好的装备。

Key.Original: move faster to their target.
Key.Chinesesimp: 前往目标的速度更快。

Key.Original: The stronger your reputation is with L'Ensemble, the larger the size of your insurgent teams.
Key.Chinese: 你在 L'Ensemble 中的名聲越好，你的反抗軍隊伍的人數就越多。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在大帮会中的声誉越好，你的叛军队伍的规模就越大。

Key.Original: These hidden stockpiles allow you to:
Key.Chinese: 這些隱藏倉庫能夠讓你：
Key.Chinesesimp: 你可以通过这些秘密仓库：

Key.Original: make money
Key.Chinesesimp: 赚钱

Key.Original: increase your reputation with insurgents
Key.Chinese: 提升你在反抗軍中的名聲
Key.Chinesesimp: 提高你在叛军中的声誉

Key.Original: elevate insurgent teams to higher levels
Key.Chinesesimp: 将叛军队伍提升到更高等级

Key.Original: Stashes
Key.Chinesesimp: 存放点

Key.Original: L'Ensemble's insurgents have ties with hotels and hostels all over Tanoa. They can be used as hideouts or rest points.
Key.Chinese: L'Ensemble 的反抗軍和塔諾雅各處的旅館或旅社有關係。你可以使用這些地方當作藏身處或休息點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大帮会的叛军与塔诺亚各处的酒店和旅馆都有联系。这些地方可作为藏身处或休息点。

Key.Original: Price of accommodation:
Key.Chinesesimp: 住宿价格：

Key.Original: Insurgent Information
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军信息

Key.Original: Yes
Key.Chinesesimp: 是

Key.Original: However, a cure for the malaria super-strain was slow in being synthesized - leading to many deaths.
Key.Chinese: 然而，超級瘧疾的解藥生產過程非常緩慢－－這造成了許多人死亡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，治疗疟疾超级毒株的药物合成缓慢，导致许多人死亡。

Key.Original: The CTRG operative known as Keystone was unsuccessful in his mission.
Key.Chinese: CTRG 特務 Keystone 未能成功完成任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队代号为"基石"的特工没能成功完成任务。

Key.Original: Few know his fate. He has become one of the island's 'disparu' - one of those lost forever to the jungle.
Key.Chinese: 鮮有人知道他的命運如何。他已成為島嶼上的「失蹤者」之一——永遠消失在叢林之中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几乎没人知道他的命运如何。他已经成为岛上的“失踪者”之一u - 永远消失在丛林中。

Key.Original: The CTRG operative known as Keystone was unsuccessful in his mission.
Key.Chinese: CTRG 特務 Keystone 未能成功完成任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队代号为"基石"的特工没能成功完成任务。

Key.Original: His body was eventually discovered on the quiet islet of Sainte-Marie - a victim of intrigue and betrayal.
Key.Chinese: 他的屍體最終在寧靜的聖瑪莉小島上被發現－－他成了陰謀與背叛的犧牲者。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他的尸体最终在宁静的圣玛丽岛被发现 - 他成了阴谋和背叛的牺牲者。

Key.Original: After escaping in a stolen SDV, he disappeared. Presumably to live his twilight years in peace...
Key.Chinese: 在使用偷來的 SDV 逃脫後，他便從此消失。人們猜測，他正在安度晚年…
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶一辆偷来的 SDV 逃脱之后，他失踪了。大概是在安享晚年吧...

Key.Original: After escaping in a stolen aircraft, he disappeared. Presumably to live his twilight years in peace...
Key.Chinese: 在使用偷來的飛機逃脫後，他便從此消失。人們猜測，他正在安度晚年…
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶一架偷来的飞机逃脱之后，他失踪了。大概是在安享晚年吧...

Key.Original: After escaping in a stolen aircraft, he disappeared. Presumably to live his twilight years in peace...
Key.Chinese: 在使用偷來的飛機逃脫後，他便從此消失。人們猜測，他正在安度晚年…
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶一架偷来的飞机逃脱之后，他失踪了。大概是在安享晚年吧...

Key.Original: After escaping in a stolen boat, he disappeared. Presumably to live his twilight years in peace...
Key.Chinese: 在使用偷來的船隻逃脫後，他便從此消失。人們猜測，他正在安度晚年…
Key.Chinesesimp: 驾驶一艘偷来的船逃脱之后，他失踪了。大概是在安享晚年吧...

Key.Original: After escaping with his mysterious handler, he disappeared. Presumably to live his twilight years in peace...
Key.Chinese: 在和神秘的管理人一起逃脫後，他便從此消失。人們猜測，他正在安度晚年…
Key.Chinesesimp: 与他神秘的接头人一起逃脱之后，他失踪了。大概是在安享晚年吧...

Key.Original: But then, only the dead have ever really seen the end of war.
Key.Chinese: 不過，只有死者的戰爭才會真正結束。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是在那时，只有死去的人才能真正看到战争的结束。

Key.Original: CSAT: Xian
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：Xian

Key.Original: CIVIL: Infected Village Galili
Key.Chinese: 平民：受感染的加里里村莊
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：受感染的加利利村

Key.Original: Heavily guarded Xians at <marker name = '%1'>Aéroport de Tanoa</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 戒備森嚴的 Xian 位於<marker name = '%1'>塔諾雅機場</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 戒备森严的 Xians 位于<marker name = '%1'>塔诺亚机场</marker>。

Key.Original: There are reports of a malaria super-strain outbreak in the center of <marker name = '%1'>Galili</marker>. The village has now been locked down by CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 據報告，<marker name = '%1'>加里里</marker>中央爆發超級瘧疾瘟疫。此村莊現已被 CSAT 封鎖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有报告称，在<marker name = '%1'>加利利</marker> 中心区爆发了疟疾超级毒株疫情。广协已封锁了这个村庄。

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Saint George Airstrip)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（圣乔治机场）

Key.Original: A former civilian <marker name = '%1'>airstrip</marker>, now used by CSAT, on the Îles de Lijn.
Key.Chinese: 曾經是民用的 Îles de Lijn <marker name = '%1'>小機場</marker>，現在已被 CSAT 所征用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 原来的民用<marker name = '%1'>机场</marker>，目前被广协征用，位于里恩群岛。

Key.Original: There are four major military sites on Balavu's northern island. The first is in the <marker name = '%1'>town of Balavu</marker> itself. The second is north of Leqa, at a <marker name = '%2'>ferry station</marker>. The third and fourth are at <marker name = '%3'>Laikoro</marker> and <marker name = '%4'>Tavu</marker> respectively.
Key.Chinese: 巴拉夫北方島嶼有四個主要軍事基地。第一個是<marker name = '%1'>巴拉夫小鎮</marker>。下一個是樂加北方的一座<marker name = '%2'>渡輪碼頭</marker>。第三個和第四個是在<marker name = '%3'>賴可羅</marker>與 <marker name = '%4'>塔夫</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴拉武的北部岛屿有四个主要军事区域。第一个位于<marker name = '%1'>巴拉武镇</marker>本地。第二个位于勒卡北部的<marker name = '%2'>渡轮码头</marker>。第三个和第四个分别位于<marker name = '%3'>莱科罗</marker> 和<marker name = '%4'>他弗</marker>。

Key.Original: Accommodation in southern Balavu.
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴拉武南部的住处。

Key.Original: CSAT: Balavu (Bases)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：巴拉武（基地）

Key.Original: Accommodation in northern Tanoa.
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚北部的住处。

Key.Original: Military personnel have taken over the old <marker name = '%1'>ferry station</marker> on the southern side of Balavu Bridge.
Key.Chinese: 軍事人員佔領了巴拉夫橋南方的舊<marker name = '%1'>渡輪碼頭</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 军事人员已夺取了巴拉武桥北侧的<marker name = '%1'>老渡轮码头</marker>。

Key.Original: Accommodation in northern Balavu.
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴拉武北部的住处。

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Balavu Bridge)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（巴拉武桥）

Key.Original: Accommodation in the Îles de Lijn.
Key.Chinesesimp: 里恩群岛的住处。

Key.Original: An important CSAT <marker name = '%1'>base</marker> in the town of Balavu.
Key.Chinese: 巴拉夫小鎮中的一座重要 CSAT <marker name = '%1'>基地</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 位于巴拉武镇内的一个重要广协<marker name = '%1'>基地</marker>。

Key.Original: I betrayed my country.
Key.Chinesesimp: 我背叛了我的祖国。

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Balavu)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（巴拉武）

Key.Original: Accommodation in central Tanoa.
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚中心区的住处。

Key.Original: A commercial and now strategically important <marker name = '%1'>fuel depot</marker>, requisitioned by CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 一處商業性<marker name = '%1'>燃料庫</marker>，已被 CSAT 徵用，現在擁有很高的戰略價值。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一所目前具有重要战略意义的商业<marker name = '%1'>油库</marker>，已被广协征用。

Key.Original: CSAT: Aircraft
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：飞机

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Fuel Depot)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（油库）

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Temple Ruins Camp
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：寺庙废墟营地

Key.Original: Heavily guarded vertical take-off and landing (VTOL) jets, belonging to CSAT and located at <marker name = '%1'>Tanoa's main airport</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 守衛森嚴的垂直起降（VTOL）噴射機，原屬 CSAT，位於<marker name = '%1'>塔諾雅的主機廠</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 戒备森严的垂直起降（VTOL）喷气式飞机，属于广协，位于<marker name = '%1'>塔诺亚的主机场</marker>。

Key.Original: There is a sizeable <marker name = '%1'>gendarme station</marker>, next to a church in the town of Katkoula.
Key.Chinese: 卡特庫拉鎮上有個頗大的<marker name = '%1'>國家憲兵基地</marker>，就在一座教堂旁邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 凯特库拉镇的一所教堂旁有个较大的<marker name = '%1'>宪兵站</marker>。

Key.Original: GENDARMERIE: Base (Katkoula)
Key.Chinese: 國家憲兵：基地（卡特庫拉）
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队：基地（凯特库拉）

Key.Original: Aircraft
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞机

Key.Original: An insurgent encampment, near the ancient <marker name = '%1'>temple ruins</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 一座反抗軍營地，座落於遠古<marker name = '%1'>神殿遺跡</marker>附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个叛军营地，位于古老的<marker name = '%1'>寺庙废墟</marker>附近。

Key.Original: A well-defended CSAT<marker name = '%1'>base</marker> in Laikoro on Balavu's northern island.
Key.Chinese: 巴拉夫北方島嶼上的賴可羅有個戒備森嚴的 CSAT<marker name = '%1'>基地</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个防卫严密的广协<marker name = '%1'>基地</marker>，位于巴拉武岛北部的莱科罗。

Key.Original: A hangar containing several Xian VTOL jets, belonging to CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 停機坪上有許多 CAST 的 Xian 垂直起降噴射機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个停放着数架 Xian VTOL 喷气式飞机的机库，属于广协。

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Laikoro)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（莱科罗）

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Submarine)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（潜艇）

Key.Original: A small CSAT <marker name = '%1'>camp</marker> in the town of Nicolet.
Key.Chinese: 尼科列特小鎮的一個小型 CSAT<marker name = '%1'>營地</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 位于尼高力镇内的一个小型广协<marker name = '%1'>营地</marker>。

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Nicolet)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（尼高力）

Key.Original: CSAT have a small submarine, somewhere in <marker name = '%1'>Tavu harbor</marker>.
Key.Chinese: CSAT 有一艘小型潛水艇，就在<marker name = '%1'>塔夫碼頭</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协有艘小型潜艇，位于<marker name = '%1'>他弗港</marker>的某个地方。

Key.Original: A <marker name = '%1'>military base</marker> maintained by CSAT within the small town of Tavu.
Key.Chinese: 塔夫小鎮中的一座 CSAT <marker name = '%1'>軍事基地</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个由广协掌管的<marker name = '%1'>军事基地</marker>，位于他弗小镇。

Key.Original: CIVILIAN: Camp
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：营地

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Tavu)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（他弗）

Key.Original: A small <marker name = '%1'>aid station</marker> in the jungle, with sick locals who have fled from a super-strain malaria <marker name = '%2'>outbreak</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 叢林中的小型<marker name = '%1'>救助站</marker>，此處有許多因超級瘧疾<marker name = '%2'>瘟疫</marker>而逃離的當地患者。
Key.Chinesesimp: 丛林中的一个小型<marker name = '%1'>救护站</marker>，收治了从疟疾超级毒株传染<marker name = '%2'>疫情</marker>地区逃离的当地病患。

Key.Original: A ferry station, now being used as a <marker name ='%1'>harbor</marker> by CSAT for the reception of military-grade materials arriving on Tanoa.
Key.Chinese: 一座渡輪碼頭，現在被 CSAT 征用作為軍事<marker name ='%1'>碼頭</marker>，用於接收運送到塔諾雅的軍事補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个轮渡码头，目前被广协作为<marker name ='%1'>港口</marker>使用，用于接收抵达塔诺亚的军事物资。

Key.Original: A small aid station in the jungle, with sick locals who have fled from a super-strain malaria outbreak.
Key.Chinese: 叢林中的小型救助站，此處有許多因超級瘧疾瘟疫而逃離的當地患者。
Key.Chinesesimp: 丛林中的一个小型救护站，收治了从疟疾超级毒株传染疫情地区逃离的当地病患。

Key.Original: CSAT: Temporary Harbor
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：临时码头

Key.Original: CIVILIAN: Camp
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：营地

Key.Original: The sprawling dockyards at <marker name = '%1'>Blue Pearl Industrial Port</marker> are carefully monitored by Tanoa's gendarmerie. The site is well protected.
Key.Chinese: <marker name = '%1'>Blue Pearl 工業港口</marker>忙碌的船塢受到塔諾雅的國家憲兵嚴格監控。此處有著嚴密的保護。
Key.Chinesesimp: <marker name = '%1'>蓝珍珠工业港</marker>庞大的码头受到塔诺亚宪兵队的严密监控。这个场所防守严密。

Key.Original: A makeshift shelter for villagers blighted by the mysterious malaria epidemic.
Key.Chinese: 為受神秘瘧疾瘟疫影響的村民而建造的零時避難所。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为被神秘的疟疾传染所摧残的村民提供的临时避难所。

Key.Original: GENDARMERIE: Industrial Port
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队：工业港口

Key.Original: CIVILIAN: Port-Boisé (Outbreak)
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：博伊斯（疫情）

Key.Original: Syndikat gunrunners have hidden stockpiles across Tanoa. One of them is located near Balavu, close to the <marker name = 'BIS_BalavuBeachCache'>beach</marker>.
Key.Chinese: Syndikat 軍火商在塔諾雅到處都有秘密倉庫。其中一個就在巴拉夫<marker name = 'BIS_BalavuBeachCache'>海灘</marker>附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加的军火商在塔诺亚各处都有秘密仓库。其中一个位于巴拉武附近，靠近巴拉武<marker name = 'BIS_BalavuBeachCache'>海滩</marker>。

Key.Original: Residents in the seaside village of <marker name = '%1'>Port-Boisé</marker> have started getting sick. The area has been quarantined by CSAT.
Key.Chinese: <marker name = '%1'>Boisé 港</marker>沿海村莊的居民開始生病了。此區已經被 CSAT 隔離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 海滨城镇<marker name = '%1'>博伊斯</marker>的居民开始得病。广协已隔离了该地区。

Key.Original: SYNDIKAT: Cache (Balavu Beach)
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加：秘密仓库（巴拉武海滩）

Key.Original: GENDARMERIE: Lumberyard
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队：堆木场

Key.Original: Local guerrillas have been stashing weapons and equipment for months in preparation for their revolution. Some of their supplies are in an <marker name = 'BIS_BalavuCache'>old bunker</marker>, near the town of Balavu.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月以來，當地游擊兵隱藏了許多武器與裝備，準備發動革命。有一些補給就放在巴拉夫附近小鎮中的<marker name = 'BIS_BalavuCache'>舊碉堡</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月来，当地游击队一直在藏匿武器和装备，准备发动革命。他们的一些补给品存放于巴拉武镇附近的一个<marker name = 'BIS_BalavuCache'>老地堡</marker>。

Key.Original: Authorities have temporarily stored weapons and equipment in the vicinity of a <marker name = '%1'>lumberyard</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 當局暫時將武器和器材存放在<marker name = '%1'>木料場</marker>周圍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当局将武器和装备临时存放在<marker name = '%1'>堆木场</marker>附近。

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Cache (Balavu Ruins)
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍：隱藏點（巴拉夫遺跡）
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：秘密仓库（巴拉武废墟）

Key.Original: CIVILIAN: Savaka (Outbreak)
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：萨瓦加（疫情）

Key.Original: Syndikat gunrunners have hidden stockpiles across Tanoa. One of them is located in the <marker name = 'BIS_BlerickForectCache'>jungle</marker>, not far from the seaside village of Blerick.
Key.Chinese: Syndikat 軍火商在塔諾雅到處都有秘密倉庫。其中一個就在沿海村莊貝里瑞克附近的<marker name = 'BIS_BlerickForectCache'>叢林</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加的军火商在塔诺亚各处都有秘密仓库。其中一个位于<marker name = 'BIS_BlerickForectCache'>丛林</marker>里，离海滨村庄布勒瑞科不远。

Key.Original: The tiny coastal village of <marker name = '%1'>Savaka</marker> in southern Balavu has been hit by the deadly strain of malaria, sweeping Tanoa. CSAT have blocked all access.
Key.Chinese: 巴拉夫南部沿海小村莊<marker name = '%1'>薩瓦卡</marker>遭塔諾雅致命瘧疾侵襲。CSAT 已經封鎖此處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 位于巴拉武南部的海滨小村<marker name = '%1'>萨瓦加</marker>也遭受了席卷塔诺亚的致命疟疾袭击。广协已封锁了所有出入通道。

Key.Original: SYNDIKAT: Cache (Blerick Jungle)
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加：秘密仓库（布勒瑞科丛林）

Key.Original: CIVILIAN: Namuvaka (Outbreak)
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：纳木瓦加（疫情）

Key.Original: Syndikat gunrunners have hidden stockpiles across Tanoa. One of them is located on <marker name = 'BIS_cocoaIslandCache'>Cocoa Island</marker>.
Key.Chinese: Syndikat 軍火商在塔諾雅到處都有秘密倉庫。其中一個就在<marker name = 'BIS_cocoaIslandCache'>可可島</marker>上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加的军火商在塔诺亚各处都有秘密仓库。其中一个位于<marker name = 'BIS_cocoaIslandCache'>可可岛</marker>。

Key.Original: <marker name = '%1'>Namuvaka</marker> in northern Balavu is suffering from the new and deadly malaria epidemic. It has been quarantined by CSAT soldiers.
Key.Chinese: 巴拉夫北部的<marker name = '%1'>納姆萬卡</marker>受到致命瘧疾瘟疫影響。CSAT 已經隔離此處。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴拉武北部的<marker name = '%1'>纳木瓦加</marker>正在遭受致命的新型疟疾传染病的袭击。广协士兵已隔离此地。

Key.Original: SYNDIKAT: Cache (Cocoa Island)
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加：秘密仓库（可可岛）

Key.Original: CIVILIAN: Koumac (Outbreak)
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：库马克（疫情）

Key.Original: NATO operatives have concealed guns and gear on a <marker name = 'BIS_mountainCache'>mountain plateau</marker>, south-east of Red Spring Mine.
Key.Chinese: NATO 作戰人員將槍枝與裝備隱藏在紅全礦場東南方的<marker name = 'BIS_mountainCache'>山坡高地</marker>上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约特工在红泉矿山东南面的<marker name = 'BIS_mountainCache'>山原</marker>藏匿有枪支和装备。

Key.Original: The quiet village of <marker name = '%1'>Koumac</marker> near Bala Airstrip has been quarantined by CSAT personnel after mysterious cases of the super-strain malaria.
Key.Chinese: 巴拉小機場附近安詳的<marker name = '%1'>庫馬克</marker>村莊出現了秘的超級瘧疾疫情，並遭到 CSAT 人員隔離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巴拉小机场附近宁静的<marker name = '%1'>库马克</marker>村出现了神秘的超级毒株疟疾病例，之后被广协人员隔离。

Key.Original: CTRG: Cache (Mountains)
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队：秘密仓库（山区）

Key.Original: IDAP: Logistics Staging Area
Key.Chinesesimp: IDAP：物流暂存区

Key.Original: Local guerrillas have been stashing weapons and equipment for months in preparation for their revolution. Some of their supplies are in the <marker name = 'BIS_SE_fortress'>old World War 2 ruins</marker>, overlooking Kotomo.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月以來，當地游擊兵隱藏了許多武器與裝備，準備發動革命。有一些補給就放在克托摩附近的<marker name = 'BIS_SE_fortress'>二戰遺跡</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月来，当地游击队一直在藏匿武器和装备，准备发动革命。他们的一些补给品存放于一个俯瞰科托摩的<marker name = 'BIS_SE_fortress'>二战废墟</marker>内。

Key.Original: A resupply point, run by the International Development and Aid Project, located at the <marker name ='%1'>ferry station</marker> under the bridge linking northern and southern Balavu.
Key.Chinese: 國際開發與救援計畫的補給點就位於接通南北巴拉夫的橋樑底下的<marker name ='%1'>渡輪碼頭</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个由国际发展和援助项目运营的补给点，位于连接巴拉武北部和南部的桥梁下面的<marker name ='%1'>轮渡码头</marker>。

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Cache (Fortress)
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：秘密仓库（堡垒）

Key.Original: GENDARMERIE: Base
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队：基地

Key.Original: Local guerrillas have been stashing weapons and equipment for months in preparation for their revolution. Some of their supplies are in a <marker name = 'BIS_SE_foxHoleCache'>cave</marker>, a few kilometres from Vagalala.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月以來，當地游擊兵隱藏了許多武器與裝備，準備發動革命。有一些補給就放在瓦加拉拉幾公里外的<marker name = 'BIS_SE_foxHoleCache'>洞穴</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月来，当地游击队一直在藏匿武器和装备，准备发动革命。他们的一些补给品存放于距瓦加拉拉几公里距离的一个<marker name = 'BIS_SE_foxHoleCache'>洞穴</marker>内。

Key.Original: The center of operations for Tanoa's gendarmerie can be found in a small <marker name = '%1'>compound</marker> outside Georgetown. Any illegal weapons seized from Syndikat or L'Ensemble's insurgents eventually wind up here...
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅的國家憲兵作戰中心位於喬治鎮外的小型<marker name = '%1'>設施</marker>。任何從 Syndikat 或 L'Ensemble 反抗軍手中查封的武器最終會送到這裡…
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚宪兵队的行动中心设于乔治镇外的一个小<marker name = '%1'>院子</marker>里。从辛迪加或大帮会手中缴获的任何非法武器最终将出现在这里...

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Cache (Foxhole)
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：秘密仓库（散兵坑）

Key.Original: GENDARMERIE: Harbor
Key.Chinesesimp: 宪兵队：港口

Key.Original: Local guerrillas have been stashing weapons and equipment for months in preparation for their revolution. Some of their supplies are above the <marker name = 'BIS_RailroadCache'>railway cut</marker>, outside Georgetown.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月以來，當地游擊兵隱藏了許多武器與裝備，準備發動革命。有一些補給就放在喬治鎮外的<marker name = 'BIS_RailroadCache'>鐵道峽谷</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月来，当地游击队一直在藏匿武器和装备，准备发动革命。他们的一些补给品存放于乔治镇镇外的<marker name = 'BIS_RailroadCache'>铁路路堑</marker>上。

Key.Original: Tanoa's law enforcement is cooperating with CSAT. Many military-grade supplies are being stored in <marker name = '%1'>Katkoula Harbor</marker> .
Key.Chinese: 塔諾雅的執法單位正在和 CSAT 合作。許多軍事等級補給都存放在<marker name = '%1'>卡特庫拉港</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 塔诺亚的执法机构在与广协合作。许多军事级物资被存放于<marker name = '%1'>凯特库拉港</marker> 。

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Cache (Railway Depot)
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍：隱藏點（鐵道倉庫）
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：秘密仓库（铁路车场）

Key.Original: CSAT: Industrial Port
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：工业港

Key.Original: Syndikat gunrunners have hidden stockpiles across Tanoa. One of them is located in the <marker name = 'BIS_HarcourtForectCache'>jungle</marker>, not far from the town of Harcourt.
Key.Chinese: Syndikat 軍火商在塔諾雅到處都有秘密倉庫。其中一個就在哈爾科特小鎮附近的<marker name = 'BIS_HarcourtForectCache'>叢林</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加的军火商在塔诺亚各处都有秘密仓库。其中一个位于<marker name = 'BIS_HarcourtForectCache'>丛林</marker>里，离哈科特镇不远。

Key.Original: The docks at <marker name = '%1'>Blue Pearl Industrial Port</marker> are the conduit through which almost all of Tanoa's imports and exports flow. Consequently, it is well defended by CSAT.
Key.Chinese: <marker name = '%1'>Blue Pearl 工業碼頭</marker>的港口是塔諾雅進出口貿易的要地。因此，碼頭受到 CSAT 嚴密保護。
Key.Chinesesimp: <marker name = '%1'>蓝珍珠工业港</marker>的码头是塔诺亚几乎所有进出口货物的出入通道。因此，码头受到广协的严密保护。

Key.Original: SYNDIKAT: Cache (Harcourt Jungle)
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加：秘密仓库（哈科特丛林）

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Saint-George Airstrip)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（圣乔治机场）

Key.Original: CSAT: Base (Harcourt)
Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：基地（哈科特）

Key.Original: Local guerrillas have been stashing weapons and equipment for months in preparation for their revolution. Some of their supplies are in the <marker name = 'BIS_LakatoroJungleCache'>jungle</marker> surrounding the tiny village of Lakatoro.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月以來，當地游擊兵隱藏了許多武器與裝備，準備發動革命。有一些補給就放在拉卡托羅小村附近的<marker name = 'BIS_LakatoroJungleCache'>叢林</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月来，当地游击队一直在藏匿武器和装备，准备发动革命。他们的一些补给品存放于环绕着拉卡托罗小村的<marker name = 'BIS_LakatoroJungleCache'>丛林</marker>里。

Key.Original: The <marker name = '%1'>airstrip</marker> adjacent to the city of Lijnhaven is controlled by CSAT.
Key.Chinese: Lijnhaven 旁的<marker name = '%1'>小機場</marker>是由 CSAT 控制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与丽音赫文市毗邻的<marker name = '%1'>小机场</marker>由广协控制。

Key.Original: The harbor in the small town of Harcourt is under military jurisdiction and is rumored to be frequented by CSAT's doctors and medical teams.
Key.Chinese: 哈爾科特小鎮的碼頭屬於軍事轄區，據說，這裡常常有 CSAT 的醫生與醫療團隊出沒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈科特小镇的港口受到军事管辖，有传言称，广协的医生和医疗队经常造访此地。

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Cache (Lakatoro Jungle)
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍：隱藏點（拉卡托羅叢林）
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：秘密仓库（拉卡托罗丛林）

Key.Original: Syndikat gunrunners have hidden stockpiles across Tanoa. One of them is located somewhere in <marker name = 'BIS_LaRochelleCache'>La Rochelle</marker>.
Key.Chinese: Syndikat 軍火商在塔諾雅到處都有秘密倉庫。其中一個就在 <marker name = 'BIS_LaRochelleCache'>La Rochelle</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加的军火商在塔诺亚各处都有秘密仓库。其中一个位于<marker name = 'BIS_LaRochelleCache'>拉罗歇尔</marker>的某处。

Key.Original: CIVILIANS: Harcourt
Key.Chinesesimp: 平民：哈科特

Key.Original: SYNDIKAT: Cache (La Rochelle)
Key.Chinesesimp: 辛迪加：秘密仓库（拉罗歇尔）

Key.Original: Local guerrillas have been stashing weapons and equipment for months in preparation for their revolution. Some of their supplies are in the <marker name = 'BIS_LifouForestCache'>jungle</marker> surrounding the town of Lifou.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月以來，當地游擊兵隱藏了許多武器與裝備，準備發動革命。有一些補給就放在 Lifou 小鎮附近的<marker name = 'BIS_LifouForestCache'>jungle</marker>叢林</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月来，当地游击队一直在藏匿武器和装备，准备发动革命。他们的一些补给品存放于环绕着利福镇的<marker name = 'BIS_LifouForestCache'>丛林</marker>里。

Key.Original: INSURGENTS: Cache (Lifou Jungle)
Key.Chinese: 反抗軍：隱藏點（Lifou 叢林）
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军：秘密仓库（利福丛林）

Key.Original: Harcourt
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈科特

Key.Original: NATO operatives have concealed guns and gear near <marker name = 'BIS_LailaiCache'>Lailai</marker>.
Key.Chinese: NATO 作戰人員將槍枝與裝備隱藏在 <marker name = 'BIS_LailaiCache'>萊萊</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约特工将枪支和装备藏匿在<marker name = 'BIS_LailaiCache'>莱莱</marker>附近。

Key.Original: Harcourt
Key.Chinesesimp: 哈科特

Key.Original: CTRG: Cache (Lailai)
Key.Chinesesimp: 战研大队：秘密仓库（莱莱）

Key.Original: Investigate the harbor and search for any evidence linking CSAT to nefarious activity.
Key.Chinese: 調查碼頭並搜索任何關於 CSAT 惡行的證據。
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查港口，寻找证明广协与邪恶行径有关的任何证据。

Key.Original: Local guerrillas have been stashing weapons and equipment for months in preparation for their revolution. Some of their supplies are in the <marker name = 'BIS_NicoletRuinsCache'>World War 2 ruins</marker>, east of Nicolet.
Key.Chinese: 幾個月以來，當地游擊兵隱藏了許多武器與裝備，準備發動革命。有一些補給就放在尼科列特東邊的<marker name = 'BIS_NicoletRuinsCache'>二戰遺跡</marker>中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 几个月来，当地游击队一直在藏匿武器和装备，准备发动革命。他们的一些补给品存放于尼高力东面的<marker name = 'BIS_NicoletRuinsCache'>二战废墟</marker>内。

Key.Chinesesimp: 广协：关卡（塔诺亚山）
